font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I was travelling from Mumbai to Calicut by\nbus- a long journey of around 30 hours<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In Karnataka the bus stopped by a police jeep\non the side of the road.&nbsp; Three men in\nplain clothes entered the bus , did a search for 15 minutes and left.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Later, I noticed that a middle aged man was\nsilently crying \u2013 sitting on the opposite aisle seat. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I asked him why. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">He sobbed \u201c One policeman removed a 80 gram\ngold chain from my pouch and put it in his pocket . &nbsp; I am going home after 3\nyears of sweating my balls off in Saudi Arabia. &nbsp;I hoped to sell that gold chain and marry off\nmy eldest daughter. I am a very poor man\u2014a labourer\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This was a case of highway robbery by Indian\npolice . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I remembered the face of the policeman who\ndealt with this man. He looked like a son of a bitch. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">After a month I again traveled by same bus\nfrom Mumbai to Calicut--deliberately. &nbsp;This time I was ready with a camera and a tape\nrecorder<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The bus stopped in the same place .&nbsp; The same jeep. &nbsp;I recognized the policeman who stole the gold\nchain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I went to the forward part of the bus , stood\nnext to the driver and told loudly in English \u201c If anybody loses any personal\nvaluable while we are stopped here,&nbsp;\nshout out to me \u201c<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">And then I leant out of the bus and took a\nphoto of the police jeep. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I had brought my camera and a small tape recorder\n&nbsp;just for this .&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">And&nbsp; I\nkept staring at the mean son of a bitch who stole the gold chain, the previous\nmonth<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Needless to say , the inspection was cut\nshort immediately and we resumed our journey. The three Karnataka policemen\nslunk away . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; \u201d Are you a minister\u2019s son ?\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I told him \u201c Speak to me in Malayalam, I am a\nMalayalee \u201c<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I don\u2019t know what ministers\u2019 sons look like \u2013\nbut here I was wearing a thick gold chain outside my T shirt , tight jeans tucked\ninto knee length Columbian mafia boots having shoulder length hair \u2013 &nbsp;looking any day\ntougher than Salman Khan.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I guess my audacity blew them away. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">If I looked like a bumpkin they would have planted drugs on me and arrested me.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The previous month I had parted with my 1000\nbuck note \u2013 which I keep as reserve emergency money . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The man whose chain was robbed from his pouch\nwould not accept it. &nbsp;&nbsp;So I had to shove it\ninside his shirt pocket and told him not to go back to Saudi Arabia without marrying\noff his daughter. &nbsp; This Muslim guy had 4\ndaughters.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">He took it out , unfolded the\ncurrency note and exclaimed \u201cI have never seen such a big size Indian currency\nnote till today\u201d</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><i>PSSST - Whores in Brazil will always say GRAAANDE - &nbsp;I have never seen such a big prick in my life.</i></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This 1000 rupee note was 30% bigger than the\n1000 rupee currency note which were printed later. &nbsp; &nbsp;Those days this single note could buy a lot of things .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/xTbXeIhuKUQ/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/xTbXeIhuKUQ?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The police organization\nin India in its present form is based essentially on the Police Act of\n1861.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The police protected a foreign\ninvader . That was the primary task of the Indian police\u2014NOT to serve the\nIndian people.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the stroke of the\nmidnight hour on 15<sup>th</sup> Aug 1947, Indians expected that from now on\nIndian police would serve the people. This was not to be\u2014and it is still this\nway as of today.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Till Nehru died , there\nwas no major problem, thanks to the moral fibre of the men who ruled us.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The politicians were\nmen of great stature, endowed with vision and committed to pursuing the\nnational interests. The administrators were also thorough professionals, keen\non playing their role in the independent India. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The politicians drew\nfrom the professional experience and expertise of the civil servant who, in\nturn, benefited from the politicians\u2019 commitment to democracy and secularism.\nThere was mutual respect for each other, give and take in the pursuit of common\nobjective of taking the nation forward on the road to progress and modernity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After Nehru\u2019s death ,\nas &nbsp;the years rolled by, however, there\nwas unfortunately a qualitative change in the style of politics.&nbsp; &nbsp;The\nfire of idealism which had inspired the first generation of post-independent\npoliticians and civil servants started getting dim. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Power became an end in\nitself, and gradually a symbiotic relationship developed between the\npoliticians on the one hand and the civil servants on the other.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Civil servants were\nsecretly sourced from a DEN OF TRAITORS named JNU\u2014a commie island in the whole\nof North India, established in 1969.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here the collegium commie professors chose the\nnew commie professors with help from white Commie Jews abroad. There was NO\ncommitment to the watan.&nbsp; These new IAS\nofficers had a foreign funded agenda<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">25 May 2016:&nbsp; Commie Pinarayi Vijayan sworn in as Kerala\nchief minister.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">1 June 2016: Vijayan\nremoves Senkumar from the DGP\u2019s post and packs him off to a lower post. He\nappoints an officer junior to Senkumar as the police chief.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">24 April 2017: After\nCentral Administrative Tribunal (CAT), the Kerala High Court reject Senkumar\u2019s\npetitions, the Supreme Court orders his reinstatement, saying his transfer was\nunfair and arbitrary.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">29 April 2017: Senkumar\ngoes back to SC, saying the Kerala government is committing contempt of court\nby delaying his reinstatement.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">5 May 2017: The SC\npulls up the Vijayan government and orders immediate reinstatement of Senkumar.</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">6 May 2017: Senkumar\nassumes office as police chief again.</span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TP Senkumar is just the\nlatest case .&nbsp;&nbsp; CMs of different states\nhave time and again, removed or superceeded top police chiefs so that they can\nput their own spineless poodle in place.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Kerala High court opined\non the Senkumar case: \"The removal or displacement or transfer of an\nofficer from a sensitive post requires consideration and good reasons that can\nbe tested so the officer is not dealt with as a pawn in a game.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2007, the then\nCongress chief minister of Andhra Pradesh YS Rajasekhara Reddy appointed Shayam\nSunder Prasad Yadav as the DGP, overlooking two other seniors to him. &nbsp;&nbsp;In March 2009, the Election Commission\nordered Yadav\u2019s removal for violating election code of conduct, but once he returned\nto power after the polls, YSR Reddy brought him back as the DGP.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reddy was doing what\nTelugu Desam Party leader Chandrababu Naidu had done earlier as the Andhra\nPradesh chief minister. In 2002, Naidu appointed P Ramulu as the police chief,\noverlooking four officers senior to him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In February 2008, then\nMaharashtra chief minister Vilasrao Deshmukh appointed AN Roy as the police\nchief, superseding three officers. The CAT quashed the appointment in October\n2008 and its order was later upheld by the Bombay High court. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SS Virk was then appointed DGP, but, after\nhis retirement in 2009, the post was vacant for nearly three months because the\nCongress and its coalition partner Nationalist Congress Party of Sharad Pawar\ncouldn\u2019t agree on a successor.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Finally, Roy was\nbrought back as the DGP in January 2010. And when Roy retired, D Sivanandan\nreplaced him as the police chief. Sivanandan superseded two officers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">What Yogi Adityanath\ndid in Uttar Pradesh a month after he took over as BJP\u2019s Uttar Pradesh chief\nminister in March this year was something very different. He replaced Javeed\nAhmed with Sulkhan Singh as his police chief.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">When the earlier chief minister,\nAkhilesh Yadav, appointed Ahmed in January 2016 ( personal loyalty / minority appeasement ) , he superseded as many as seven\nofficers. By appointing Singh, the new BJP chief minister undid a wrong done by\nhis predecessor.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\">Before the recent\nAssembly elections, the BJP had demanded his removal, accusing him of being a\nstooge of Samajwadi Party.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE POLICE DEPT IS\nMEANT TO SERVE AND PROTECT THE PEOPLE , NOT THE CM OF THE STATE\u2014WHO ARE JUST PAST\nACTIVISTS AND GOONDAS MOST OF THE TIME .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE CAN SEE HOW MAMATA\nBANNERJEE IS USING THE POLICE IN WEST BENGAL TO SECURE HER MUSLIM VOTE BANK&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">EVERY POLICE MAN FROM\nTHE BOTTOM MOST POLICE CONSTABLE TO THE TOPMOST DGP MUST UNDERGO A SPECIAL COURSE AND A\nWRITTEN EXAM CONDUCTED BY THE HOME MINISTRY .&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE TOPMOST POLICE\nOFFICERS MUST UNDERGO ORALS AND A PSYCHOLOGICAL TEST TOO &nbsp;\u2014 FOR LOYALTY TO THE WATAN.. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">HE MUST KNOW WHAT HIS\nDUTIES ARE AND WHOM HE IS WORKING FOR ( THE WATAN ) . &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ONLY\nTHEN HE CAN RETURN BACK TO SERVICE.</span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">AS AN\nINCENTIVE --AS SOON AS A POLICEMAN ( CONSTABLE TO DGP ) PASSES THIS EXAM , &nbsp;HE MUST GET A SPECIAL STRIPE ON HIS UNIFORM , A MEDAL AND HIS WAGES MUST IMMEDIATELY RISE BY 50%..</b><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cPolice reforms are\ngoing on and on. Nobody listens to our orders.\u201d This is how a Supreme Court\nbench headed by Chief Justice J.S. Khehar reacted while declining the plea of a\nlawyer demanding immediate action to usher in major police reforms in the\ncountry (March 2017).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">BUT HEY,&nbsp; FOR OPENING CHAMIYA BAR WHOREHOUSES IN MUMBAI\nTHE COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY TOOK HAJAAR INTEREST\u2014 AND BURNT MIDNIGHT OIL &nbsp;. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">AS IF A COUPLE OF DOZEN\nGOOD LOOKING WOMEN COULD NOT GET A DECENT JOB IN MUMBAI<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The police organization\nin India in its present form is based essentially on the Police Act of\n1861.&nbsp; It constituted a single homogenous\nforce of civil constabulary for the performance of all duties which could not be\nassigned to the military arm.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The management of the force in each province was\nentrusted to an Inspector General who was assisted by Superintendents of Police\nin each district.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The British made sure that only the lowest illiterate strata\nof society joined the police service as a constable\u2014the <span style=\"background-color: white;\">RAGADKE KHAINI MOONH\nMEIN DHAAL</span> ones.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/a8xbtrLvFHc/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/a8xbtrLvFHc?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This was one way to\nensure that the Indian police never used their own brains , but followed the\norders of their white skinned superior police officers.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After Independence in\n1947, we inherited this police system.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/hNwPD0I5Tms/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/hNwPD0I5Tms?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If we increase the wages of the lowest ranked&nbsp; police constables and give them better terms\nand conditions we can convert this decadent police force to a SMART POLICE\nFORCE<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Crime, when initial\npolice organizations came up, was a petty offence not requiring any\nsophisticated methods of investigation and detection.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A <span style=\"background-color: white;\">Pandu Havaldar with a\nlathi </span>was good enough.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, crime\nnow is not only widespread and violent but also sophisticated with the abundant\nuse of technology. Fallout is raising fear in a community, especially among\nelders, women and children.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">WHEN OUR OWN POLICE IS\nUSED BY FOREIGN DESH DROHIS TO BLEED BHARATMATA , WITH JUDICIARY IN CAHOOTS IT\nIS NO LAUGHING MATTER.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/09/isro-spy-case-s-nambinarayanan.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/09/isro-spy-case-s-nambinarayanan.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a landmark judgment\non September 22, 2006, the Supreme Court ordered the setting up of three\ninstitutions at the state level with a view to insulating the police from\nextraneous influences, giving it functional autonomy and ensuring its\naccountability. These institutions are:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">State Security\nCommission which would lay down the broad policies and give directions for the\nperformance of the preventive tasks and service oriented functions of the\npolice;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Police Establishment\nBoard comprising the Director General of Police and four other senior officers\nof the department which shall decide all transfers, postings, promotions and\nother service related matters of officers of and below the rank of Deputy\nSuperintendent of Police and make appropriate recommendations regarding the\npostings and transfers of officers of the rank of Superintendent of Police and\nabove to the State Government; and&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Police Complaints\nAuthority at the district and state levels with a view to inquiring into\nallegations of serious misconduct by the police personnel.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Besides, the Apex Court\nordered that the Director General of Police shall be selected by the state\ngovernment from amongst the three senior-most officers of the Department who\nhave been empanelled for promotion to that rank by the Union Public Service\nCommission, and that he shall have a prescribed minimum tenure of two years.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Police officers on operational duties in the field like the Inspector General\nof Police of a Zone, Deputy Inspector General of a Range, Superintendent of\nPolice in-charge of a district and Station House Officer in-charge of a police\nstation would also have a minimum tenure of two years.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Court also ordered\nthe separation of investigating police from the law and order police to ensure\nspeedier investigation, better expertise and improved rapport with the people.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Union Government\nwas also asked to set up a National Security Commission for the selection and\nplacement of heads of Central Police Organizations, upgrading the effectiveness\nof these forces and improving the service conditions of its personnel.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The judicial directions\nwere to be implemented by December 31, 2006. Subsequently, the time limit was\nextended till March 31, 2007. There has been considerable resistance to\nimplementing the directions. The political leadership and the bureaucracy are\nnot prepared to loosen their stranglehold over the police. Eight states,\nnamely, Andhra Pradesh, Gujarat, Punjab, Jammu &amp; Kashmir, Karnataka,\nMaharashtra, Tamilnadu and Uttar Pradesh filed review petitions.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, all\nthese petitions were dismissed by the Supreme Court on August 23, 2007. The\nmajority of states nevertheless continued to drag their feet in implementation\nwhereupon the petitioner moved for contempt against the defaulting states\n(Gujarat, J &amp; K, Maharashtra, Rajasthan, Tamilnadu &amp; U.P) in April\n2007. The Court was however not inclined to issue any contempt notices to the\nstates.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A WORD OF ADVICE TO THE\nCOLLEGIUM JUDICIARY.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN A COURT RULES AND\nIT IS NOT FOLLOWED \u2014 IT CONSTITUTES <b style=\"background-color: white;\">CONTEMPT OF COURT .&nbsp; </b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN COURT AFFAIRS ARE\nDISRUPTED INSIDE THE COURT ROOM &nbsp;AND THE\nSYSTEM BREAKS DOWN \u2013 &nbsp;IT CONSTITUTES CONTEMPT OF COURT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TODAY WE CAN ABUSE THE\nPM, &nbsp;&nbsp;BUT CANT POINT A FINGER AT A LOWER COURT <b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">USELESS&nbsp;</b><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">LAWYER TURNED JUDGE TURNED GOD</span></b>&nbsp; \u2013&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE QUOTA ELEVATED JUDGE&nbsp; WILL PUT YOU INTO JAIL FOR &nbsp;\u201cCONTEMPT OF JUDGE\u201d .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS TYPE OF \u201c <b style=\"background-color: white;\">CONTEMPT\nOF JUDGE</b> \u201c NONSENSE EXISTS ONLY IN INDIA AND SOME DESERT KINGDOMS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The phenomenal rise in\nprivate security agencies accounts for the growing lack of trust in the\nstate police. &nbsp; This is a shameful but real state of affairs in most of India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">A SPECIAL\nFAST TRACK COURT DEDICATED TO POLICE MUST BE CONSTITUTED , WHERE &nbsp;A POLICE OFFICER CAN COMPLAIN AGAINST A CORRUPT POLITICIAN WHO TAKES UNDUE ADVANTAGE OF HIM -- TO USE HIM AS HIS </span><span style=\"color: red;\">PERSONAL &nbsp;KUTTA </span><span style=\"color: blue;\">(&nbsp;ATTACK DOG )</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">PUNISHMENT\nMUST ENTAIL \u2013 GETTING THE POLITICIAN DISMISSED AND DEBARRED FROM ELECTIONS FOR\nA FIXED PERIOD OF TIME.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; Kanda used the Haryana state police the way he wanted. &nbsp; The young girl Geetika Sharma who committed suicide had a very large and slack anal orifice ( autopsy report ).</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many young IPS officers\nhave lost their desh bhakti and idealism early in their careers, because of\nfear of vengeful politicians or sold out ( to politicians ) disloyal\nsubordinates.&nbsp;&nbsp; They, become deadwood,\nindifferent , just waiting for their month end salaries.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fears of proactive and dedicated officers\nabout reprisal over honest action against powerful men in society and politics\nare well-known. In UP/Bihar&nbsp; politicians\nwere using mafia sharp shooters and child kidnappers to threaten police\nofficers who do not play ball.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Citizens MUST be\nencouraged to report crime through email or over social media. This practice\ngives no option for the police but to act without fail and swiftly. &nbsp;&nbsp;The citizens\nmust report with their AADHAR card number.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The nation can no\nlonger afford a politician\u2019s police and it\u2019s time for desh bhakt people\u2019s\npolice. &nbsp;&nbsp;We know the desh drohi politicians\nwho went to JNU to support Kanhaiya Kumar and Umar Khalid.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/ULTBECr7ViM/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/ULTBECr7ViM?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/PXay0q1kJVw/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/PXay0q1kJVw?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; I don\u2019t need to do any physical\nwork on my ship.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-AjhKIMGLg0c/WWCgU6YR6qI/AAAAAAABUrk/MS9vl3C5rcQwN19T0yS8peUqQ6ePu1QmACLcBGAs/s1600/cfhg359seexetes_001.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"364\" data-original-width=\"500\" height=\"464\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-AjhKIMGLg0c/WWCgU6YR6qI/AAAAAAABUrk/MS9vl3C5rcQwN19T0yS8peUqQ6ePu1QmACLcBGAs/s640/cfhg359seexetes_001.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/draw-diagram-marine-two-stroke-main.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/draw-diagram-marine-two-stroke-main.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cPolice reforms are\ngoing on and on. font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">QUOTE : AS A SMALL SCHOOL BOY , MY MOTHER PRESENTED ME AN ATLAS ON MY BIRTHDAY</span><br /><br /><span style=\"color: blue;\">I opened the atlas and was looking at the map of India when my eyes fell on the narrow strip connecting the mainland to NE states over East Pakistan.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"color: blue;\">I said to myself \u201cIt is easy to cut off this arm \u2013 all that is required is for traitors to grab land at the narrow strip \u201d</span><br /><br /><span style=\"color: blue;\">I even identified the spot of </span><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Naxalbari </span></b><span style=\"color: blue;\">with Mechi river flowing past, with unrestricted crossing to Nepal for armed traitors to do HIT AND RUN guerilla tactics.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"color: blue;\">I was most shocked when this indeed happened in May 1967 \u2013 a few months later.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"color: blue;\">UNQUOTE</span></span><br />\n<br />\nLAND GRABBING BY INDIAN COMMIES KICKSTARTED AT NAXALBARI<br />\n<br />\nthe western part of gorkhaland will create a break and the entire north east part of india becomes an island ( like east and west pakistan ) --this is why china is supporting gorkhaland<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">INDIA MUST NEVER ALLOW THE \"CHICKEN NECK\" BE PART OF GORKHALAND</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br />GORKHAS HAD SUPPORTED ROTHSCHILD IN THE 1857 FIRST WAR OF INDEPENDENCE</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gorkhaland#/media/File:Gorkhaland_map.jpg</span><br />\n<br />\nWARNING-- MODI MUST IMMEDIATELY DECLARE THAT BENGALI CAN BE REJECTED BY GORKHA SCHOOLS AND ADMIN AND INSTEAD HINDI CAN BE USED<br />\n<br />\nForeign sponsored Bimal Gurung was formerly a Gorkha Volunteers Corps member who fought for the creation of a Gorkhaland state in India during 1986-1988 under the Gorkha National Liberation Front (GNLF)<br />\n<br />\nPrashant Tamang \u2013 a Kolkata police constable hailing from the Darjeeling hills \u2013 caught popular imagination by qualifying for the last rounds of the Indian Idol song contest.<br />\n<br />\nGurung helped Tamang\u2019s cause by reaching out to Nepali-speaking residents of Darjeeling and adjoining areas to vote via SMS for Tamang, who ultimately won the 2008 edition of the show.<br />\n<br />\nTamang was a mediocre singer<br />\n<br />\nAFTER THIS INCIDENT &nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">ISI FUNDED BIMAL GURUNG</span></b> THINKS OWNS THE GORKHAS .<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><br />https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GnBgGOa-bbU</span><br />\n<br />\nThe largest concentration of Indian Gorkhas is in north Bengal in the hill district of Darjeeling comprising subdivisions of Kurseong, Kalimpong, Darjeeling and parts of Dooars. It has a Gorkha population of nearly 24 lakh compared to six lakh in Sikkim, which became a state in 1975 following Indian annexation.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">The region is of great strategic value. It is contiguous -- or nearly contiguous -- to Nepal, China, Bhutan and Bangladesh.<br /><br />The vulnerable Chicken's Neck and Siliguri Corridor and the National Highway 31A to Sikkim along with the only road and rail links to the North East along the Tiger and Sevok bridges lie in this area.</span><br />\n<br />\nWHAT ARE OUR INDIAN SECURITY AGENCIES WORTH ?<br />\n<br />\nAS A SMALL BOY WITH AN ATLAS I WAS BETTER THAN THEM.<br />\n<br />\nPUT THIS COMMENT IN THE WEBSITES OF PM MODI, PMO, PRESIDENT, DEFENCE MINISTER, HOME MINISTER , AJIT DOVAL, ARMED FORCE CHIEF .<br />\n<br />\nNO-- DONT SEND IT TO THAT STUPID WOMAN MAMATA BANNERJEE<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/police-reforms-in-india-much-more-with.html?showComment=1499605976891#c6471107880195097395\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 9, 2017 at 6:42 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_196MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nTHIS BLOGSITE WARNS PM MODI<br />\n<br />\nWORK FOR BHARATMATA NOT JEW ROTHSCHILD<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br />ROTHSCHILDs SIDEKICK JEW MACRON HAS NOW TAKEN OVER WORLD LEADERSHIP TO PUSH THE KOSHER MOTIVED PARIS COP21<br /><br />PARIS COP21 KICKED METHANE AND NTROUS OXIDE UNDER THE KOSHER CARPET</span></b><br />\n<br />\nPM MODI WE THE PEOPLE OF INDIA WILL OT ALLOW YOU TO RUN TO MACRON IN DEC 2017 TO GIVE AWAY TAX PAYERS MONET TO FUND PARIS COPS 21<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK MODI<br />\n<br />\nWHY DO YOU MAINTAIN THAT ICE STATION IS ARCTIC NAMED HEMADRI-- WHERE THOSE IGNORAMUSES DO NOTHING ?<br />\n<br />\nTHIS PLANET HAS TALKED ABOUT METHANE EMISSIONS FROM ARCTIC DUE TO THAWING PERMAFROST<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>NOW A NEW MONSTER HAS REARED ITS HEAD IN THE PAST ONE MONTH<br /><br />THIS DANGEROUS MONSTER IS NITROUS OXIDE</b></span><br />\n<br />\nIf the GLOBAL WARMING POTENTIAL ( GWP ) is 1 for Carbon Dioxide, it is 302 for Nitrous oxide and 104 for Methane over a 20 year period.<br />\n<br />\nThe upper three metres of the Arctic permafrost are home to more than 75 billion tons of nitrogen.</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Thawing of permafrost peatlands of the Arctic is now releasing so much NITROUS OXIDE that our planet might never recover. &nbsp; These permanently frozen areas cover 630,000 square miles around the Arctic Circle</span></div>\n<br />\nAs nitrogen mineralises to its inorganic forms: nitrate and ammonium, it forms the basis for N2O production via processes known as nitrification and denitrification.<br />\n<br />\nPermafrost peatlands are formed as eons of dead vegetation accumulate. The dead plant material, peat, mixes with water to form a kind of slurry--and when the slurry freezes it becomes a permafrost peatland. When frozen, the organic material ceases to decompose.<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H2EpCoQjPu8<br />\n<br />\nThe permafrost is a vast reservoir of ancient carbon, protected from decay by microorganisms simply by its frozen state: it becomes increasingly vulnerable as the Arctic region warms.<br />\n<br />\nIf the Arctic peat columns were covered by vegetation, then emissions fall up to by 92%. If the peat soils were waterlogged, nitrous oxide release is entirely suppressed.<br />\n<br />\nThe highest post-thaw emissions of nitrous oxide come from the bare peat soils: these emissions were SIX fold those from still-frozen soils<br />\n<br />\nAs the permanently frozen peat thaws, microbial action will work on the dead organic matter.<br />\n<br />\nAbout 23% of all permafrost areas on earth are peat-based, but when a peat area thaws, bacterial go to work<br />\n<br />\nArctic soils contain humongous nitrogen stocks that have developed in the peat layer and can be several metres thick and hunndreds of thousands of years old. When they thaw, then very gradually, the stored nitrogen is released<br />\n<br />\nThe escape of N2O to the atmosphere after permafrost thaw can be attributed to two processes - direct release of (old) N2O, trapped during permafrost aggradation, and microbial production of N2O by nitrification (aerobic oxidation of NH4+ to NO3\u2212) or denitrification (anaerobic respiration using NO3\u2212 as an electron acceptor). The production of N2O depends on the supply of the mineral N species NH4+ and NO3\u2212, either by direct release from permafrost or through post thaw organic matter mineralization and nitrification.<br />\n<br />\nThe amount of net atmospheric N2O release will strongly depend on the reduction of N2O to dinitrogen (N2) during denitrification, a process that reduces the amount of N escaping from the soil as N2O.<br />\n<br />\nMineral N forms, predominantly ammonium (NH4+) and nitrate (NO3\u2212), fuel nitrification and denitrification, respectively, the two dominant processes generating the strong greenhouse gas nitrous oxide (N2O) in soils<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/04/most-potent-greenhouse-gases-nitrous.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/arctic-ice-melt-and-methane-time-bomb.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/06/methane-time-bomb-arctic-ice-meltdown.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_196BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "229", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/5725784735396864134/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "5619189538808701393", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2017-07-05T14:14:00+05:30", "updated": "2017-07-07T10:57:54+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNDk5NDA1Mjc0MTY3Cm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/ethical-nlp-neuro-linguistic_5.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/5619189538808701393", "title": "Ethical NLP, Neuro-Linguistic Programming sans covert manipulation and predatory deception, Part 17 - Capt Ajit Vadakayil", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS POST IS CONTINUED FROM PART 16, BELOW-</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/07/ethical-nlp-neuro-linguistic_3.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/07/ethical-nlp-neuro-linguistic_3.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just as you have\npositive, empowering beliefs, you can also have negative, is empowering\nbeliefs. If you had the misfortune of being bullied at school.&nbsp;&nbsp; You may have developed a belief that people,\nin general, aren\u2019t pleasant. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Being bullied at school\nis a very traumatic experience .&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;I saw a Hollywood movie where after several\ndecades , at an old school reunion, the school bully started off all over again\n.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Trauma inflicted by\nbullies at school can scar the soul. You may not even notice when someone\nresponds in a friendly manner because your belief filters aren\u2019t geared to\nnoticing pleasant people. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A friendly remark will always\nbe subjected to the LOADED REMARK filter \u2013and this is most unfortunate<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/the-bully-reloaded-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/the-bully-reloaded-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-7Lsc7r--smk/WV0QAjpmx6I/AAAAAAABUqE/UV_Q6J7arFIKvwetQLHqtNGzqUkyTb-6wCLcBGAs/s1600/imwages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-7Lsc7r--smk/WV0QAjpmx6I/AAAAAAABUqE/UV_Q6J7arFIKvwetQLHqtNGzqUkyTb-6wCLcBGAs/s400/imwages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;A belief or belief system can support a\nparticular value. Values are the why you do something.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Beliefs direct your behavior,\nwhich then helps you to fulfil a value \u2013 provided of course your unconscious\nmind creates no conflicts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Values are the \u2018hot\nbuttons\u2019 that drive all your behaviours and are your unconscious motivators and\ndemotivators: you act because of your values.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After you\u2019ve acted, you\nuse these values to judge whether the deed was good or bad. For instance, if\nyou value honesty you may decide to pick up a wallet you find in the street for\nsafe-keeping and feel good about handing it over to the police.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-nag_nERoXf0/WV0QGqKKWXI/AAAAAAABUqI/7kIANP6Y2u4WxoI37gEkKoYksTaGffSvwCLcBGAs/s1600/i00llmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"224\" data-original-width=\"224\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-nag_nERoXf0/WV0QGqKKWXI/AAAAAAABUqI/7kIANP6Y2u4WxoI37gEkKoYksTaGffSvwCLcBGAs/s400/i00llmages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Values affect the\nchoice of your friends and partners, the types of goods you purchase, the\ninterests you pursue, and how you spend your free time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The values at the top of the hierarchy are\nusually more abstract than those further down and exert the most influence in\nyour life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your values are\nessentially formed over three periods in your life:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;### The imprint period occurs from the time of\nyour birth to when you\u2019re approximately seven years old. During this time you\nlearn largely unconsciously from your parents.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;### The modelling period occurs between the\nages of 8 and 13 when you learn by consciously and unconsciously copying\nfriends. Some of your most important values \u2013 core values \u2013 are formed when\nyou\u2019re around 10 years old.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">### The socialisation\nperiod occurs between the ages of 14 and 21 years.&nbsp; &nbsp;The\nsocialisation period occurs between the ages of 14 and 21 years. During this\ntime you acquire values that affect your relationships.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Beliefs are contextual-- they arise from learned experiences, resulting from the cultural and\nenvironmental situations we have faced. Values are not based on information\nfrom the past and they are not contextual. Values are universal. Values\ntranscend contexts because they are based on what is important to us: They\narise from the experience of being human.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-jeTiftcy0fQ/WV0QToIEvXI/AAAAAAABUqM/q5DOyqdQC08Be5T47q_yhMNi-6opkCkbgCLcBGAs/s1600/do44wnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-jeTiftcy0fQ/WV0QToIEvXI/AAAAAAABUqM/q5DOyqdQC08Be5T47q_yhMNi-6opkCkbgCLcBGAs/s400/do44wnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Values are intimately\nrelated to our needs: Whatever we need\u2014whatever is important to us or what is\nmissing from our lives\u2014is what we value.&nbsp;\nAs our life conditions change, and as we mature and grow in our\npsychological development, our value priorities change. values guide the way we\nlive our lives and the decisions we make.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A value may be defined as something\nthat we hold dear, those things/qualities which we consider to be of worth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An attitude is a belief\nabout something. It usually describes what we think is the \u2018proper\u2019 way of\ndoing something. The attitudes that we feel very strongly about are usually\ncalled values. Other attitudes are not so important and are more like opinions.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-pwrtwn0yVBM/WV0QaIljuTI/AAAAAAABUqQ/scBeH9NB2ZkC6SbMHHU6RasF1Tq7_a2DgCLcBGAs/s1600/downlomkad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"184\" data-original-width=\"274\" height=\"268\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-pwrtwn0yVBM/WV0QaIljuTI/AAAAAAABUqQ/scBeH9NB2ZkC6SbMHHU6RasF1Tq7_a2DgCLcBGAs/s400/downlomkad.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sometimes our own attitudes can make us blind to other people\u2019s values,\nopinions and needs. Attitudes will always have a positive and negative element\nand when you hold an attitude you will have a tendency to behave in a certain\nway toward that person or object.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Beliefs and values (and\ncriteria) are closely related. In fact, they are interdependent. That is, they\ncannot be separated from each other. In essence, beliefs provide context for\nour experiences, and connect our experiences to our values and criteria.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Core values can help\npeople to know what is right from wrong; they can help companies to determine\nif they are on the right path and fulfilling their business goals; and they\ncreate an unwavering and unchanging guide<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/core-values-exemplary-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/core-values-exemplary-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN ANCIENT INDIA WE\nWENT TO THE HIGHEST NOTCH \u2013DHARMA</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/dharma-in-hinduism-core-values-of.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/dharma-in-hinduism-core-values-of.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1645919579636313916\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_62M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal;
