font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_60B_box\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_61B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c659826451040699164\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_61M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/ethical-nlp-neuro-linguistic_5.html?showComment=1499322454064#c659826451040699164\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 6, 2017 at 11:57 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_61MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF PM MODI, PMO, DEFENCE MINISTER, HOME MINISTER, PRESIDENT OF INDIA, ALL DEFENCE CHIEFS ( ARMY/ AIRFORCE / NAVY ) , AND IMPORTANT DESH BHAKT POLITICIANS</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n</div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_62b+seedePkD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1159803623850038465\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_108M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/ethical-nlp-neuro-linguistic_5.html?showComment=1499343891821#c1159803623850038465\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 6, 2017 at 5:54 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_108MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nPM MODI LISTEN UP--<br />\n<br />\nWHY DO YOU HAVE A LAW MINISTER WHO DOES NOT KNOW HIS JOB AND IS NOT A SELF STARTER ?..<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">PM MODI-- CALL PRASAD FOR AN INTERVIEW --OFFICIAL<br /><br />ASK HIM IS HE CAN EXPLAIN TO YOU IF \"COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY \" IS ALLOWED AS PER THE INDIAN CONSTITUTION.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nASK HIM TO REPEAT HIS SWEARING IN PLEDGE AS A LAW MINISTER..<br />\n<br />\nASK HIM IF OUR CONSTITUTION ALLOWS A COLLEGIUM SYSTEM ( LIKE JNU COMMIE PROFESSORS ) WHERE JUDGES ELECT JUDGES...<br />\n<br />\nMODI, ASK PRASAD IF ANY OTHER NATION ON THIS PLANET HAS A COLLEGIUM SYSTEM..<br />\n<br />\nPM MODI --WHY DO YOU ALLOW COLLEGIUM JUDGES TO CREATE NEW LAWS VIA PIL ROUTE ?<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: #cc0000;\">PM MODI, ASK PRASAD IF THE JOB OF JUDGES IS TO CREATE NEW LAWS OR INTERPRET LAWS MADE BY THE LEGISLATURE..</span></b><br />\n<br />\nWE KNOW COLLEGIUM JUDGES HAVE FOREIGN SUPPORT WHEN THEIR LEGISLATE , AND DO EXTREME JUDICIAL OVERREACH . . . . .<br />\n<br />\nWHEN WE MOVE AGAINST TRAITORS-- JEW NOAM CHOMSKY EXERTS HIS STRANGE INFLUENCE ON THE COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY. . ..<br />\n<br />\nMore often than not, the subordinate judges are recruited from a pool of unsuccessful DUFFER lawyers. They and other not-too-competent lawyers eventually become judges in higher courts.<br />\n<br />\nThe quality of justice administered depends on the quality of those who administer it.<br />\n<br />\nArticle 312 of the Constitution provides for the creation of an all-India Judicial Service common to the Union and the States.<br />\n<br />\nJudges can be recruited at a young age, very much similar to officials in IAS and IPS.<br />\n<br />\nAn All-India Judicial Service system will go a long way towards attracting the brightest and the best talent available in the country.<br />\n<br />\nThis is a five-decade-old demand but it has not been implemented on account of vested interests both in the political and judicial systems.<br />\n<br />\nTheir intention is to perpetuate nepotism and favouritism in judicial appointments. This goes against objectivity, fairness, sensitivity and professional approach to the judiciary\u2019s working.<br />\n<br />\nWE NEED THE LAWYERS TO HAVE A TECHNICAL BRAIN . RIGHT NOW THESE LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES ARE MENTALLY DUD .<br />\n<br />\nThe AIJS would be able to attract the best talent. Disciplinary and service matters of the AIJS could be managed by a separate body.<br />\n<br />\nThe judiciary has always closed its doors to public scrutiny. It has created a veil of secrecy. Every organ of state in a democracy needs to be accountable to the public.<br />\n<br />\nPeople need to know how judges are appointed, what criteria they have been evaluated on.<br />\n<br />\nDelayed justice, poor appreciation of evidence, and incapacity to apply constitutional and legal principles to real-life situations play havoc with people\u2019s lives.<br />\n<br />\nFailure of justice extracts a heavy toll from the society and economy. This has forced people to pick up a gun.<br />\n<br />\nPeople are more aware now and demand more transparency. All organs of state, except the judiciary, have responded to that demand. Only an AIJS will make the judiciary more accountable and professional.<br />\n<br />\nThere is a CRYING NEED to create AIJS, 47 years after the first recommendation by the Law Commission, and nearly 30 years after the constitutional amendment facilitating its formation.<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br />AFTER THE KARNAN INCIDENT, THE JUDICIAL SYSTEM HAS BROKEN DOWN..</span></b>.<br />\n<br />\npunch into Google search , read all 7 parts -- -<br />\n. . . . . . .. .. . ..... .FOREIGN FUNDED TROJAN HORSE NGOs , PIL, JUDICIAL OVERREACH, UNHOLY NEXUS VADAKAYIL ......... . . . . . . . . . . .. .<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_108BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/ethical-nlp-neuro-linguistic_5.html?showComment=1499343966252#c804554347492716726\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 6, 2017 at 5:56 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_107MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN PM MODIs, PMO, LAW MINSITER, HOME MINISTER, PRESIDENT OF INDIAs, AND WEBSITES OF ALL DESH BHAKT INDIANS WHO MATTER ..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_108b+seedBEbOD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_108b+seedBEbOD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Memories can be a\nwonderful gift or a terrible scourge. They can cradle you softly or bind you in\ncoils of barbed wire; they can propel you towards your dreams or trap you in\nthe past. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HANG PICTURES IN YOUR\nHOME AND OFFICE WHICH GIVE BRINGS YOU JOYFUL MEMORIES<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NOBODY CAN INSULT YOU\nWITHOUT YOUR CONSENT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your brain is a\nlearning machine that needs to be kept occupied. If it isn\u2019t, it can start to\ndwell on the negative and get you into all kinds of trouble. &nbsp;&nbsp;An idle mind is a devil\u2019s workshop.&nbsp; As a human being, you need to use all your\ningenuity to direct your brain towards helping you to achieve your goals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TO FINISH A JOB FIRST\nBEGIN<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A journey of a thousand\nmiles must begin with a single step, For you to turn your dream into a concrete\nreality you have to take that first vital step, because without it you may not\nbuild up sufficient momentum to take the next step . . . and then the next\nstep.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2018In interactions\nbetween people, the person with the most flexibility of behaviour can control\nthe interaction.\u2019 Or more directly: \u2018If it ain\u2019t working, do something\ndifferent.\u2019 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a normal life,\nhowever, expecting to score perfect 10s for everything, all the time, is\nunrealistic. Life just isn\u2019t like that. When you\u2019re working hard, another\naspect of your life may slip down the agenda<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The act of writing down\nyour goal switches on your <span style=\"background-color: white;\">RAS--&nbsp; Reticular\nActivating System</span> . The RAS works by filtering all sensory information we\nreceive, and channelling them into either our unconscious or conscious mind. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-c8s8Gil-rGU/WV41_k-6d7I/AAAAAAABUqs/2Y2Bgr3uBboJr3_lot6FB-0YEvZ-9OBFACLcBGAs/s1600/a7c18f8791d1e4252BB9dd215e72c40a91--reticular-formation-reticular-activating-system.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"267\" data-original-width=\"300\" height=\"355\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-c8s8Gil-rGU/WV41_k-6d7I/AAAAAAABUqs/2Y2Bgr3uBboJr3_lot6FB-0YEvZ-9OBFACLcBGAs/s400/a7c18f8791d1e4252BB9dd215e72c40a91--reticular-formation-reticular-activating-system.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The RAS is that little\nbundle of cells you have in the back of your brain known as the \"control\ncenter\", it serves as the filter for what enters your conscious and\nunconscious mind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We are able to act on\nonly those information that are currently in our conscious mind. The capacity\nof our conscious mind is limited, while that of our unconscious mind is\nunlimited. Our beliefs, attitudes, values, and conditioning act as the filters\nin our RAS. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Setting goals is one of\nthe best ways to set our RAS filters.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Everything deemed\nirrelevant by our filters, \u201cdisappears\u201d into our unconscious. They become\n\u201cunseen\u201d by us. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;You can think of the\nRAS as a camera lens as it focuses on a subject and blurs the unnecessary\nthings in the background to produce a good photograph.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The RAS is a\nself-filtering system that chooses what you accept and reject based upon your\nbeliefs, values and prejudices.. Your brain is assaulted by thousands of\nmessages each second. Everything you see, hear, smell, feel and touch is a\nmessage entering your brain. The RAS filters through all these messages and\ndecides which ones will get page one treatment - that is, arouse the brain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The RAS is a structure\nin the brain stem that is responsible for arousal and sleep. The RAS is\nresponsible for getting your up in the morning and putting you asleep at night\n- it makes sense then why your RAS awakens you, alerts you like an alarm to\nthose things that are in the forefront of your consciousness.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9kO6WGoAggU/WV42OPu35ZI/AAAAAAABUqw/1uD4NdWnPRoZuthqj-G4djz3Ga-2noKeACLcBGAs/s1600/maxresdXXefault%2B%25282%2529.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"677\" data-original-width=\"951\" height=\"454\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9kO6WGoAggU/WV42OPu35ZI/AAAAAAABUqw/1uD4NdWnPRoZuthqj-G4djz3Ga-2noKeACLcBGAs/s640/maxresdXXefault%2B%25282%2529.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">AT SEA MY SHORE BOSSES\nALWAYS WONDERED HOW CAPTAIN MET EACH AND EVERY OF HIS SCHEDULES AND HIS GOALS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SIMPLE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">I HAVE A WHITE BOARD ON\nTHE WALL IN FRONT OF MY OFFICE CHAIR<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">ON IT WAS WRITTEN DOWN\nIN MY OWN HAND, MY LIST OF PRIORITIES FOR THE DAY. THESE PRIORITIES CHANGED\nEVERY SINGLE HOUR .&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">I USED THREE COLOURS \u2013&nbsp; RED FOR IMMINENT TASKS <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">BASICALLY THIS \u201cRAS\nSTIMULATION\u201d BOARD DID PERFECT TIME MANANAGEMENT FOR ME</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">RAS is a small group of\ncells at the base of your brain stem. &nbsp;Its function is to act like a sorting office,\nevaluating the incoming information and prioritising that information in the\nform of messages that need your attention. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Memories are normally\ncreated when information from the RAS is sent to the part of the brain called\nthe amygdala, where the data are given an emotional weighting before being\npassed on to the hippocampus. The hippocampus evaluates the data against those\nheld in long-term memory and presents them to the cortex for analysis and\nre-filing back into long-term memory.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 6, 2017 at 8:25 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_110MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nNLP SERIES IF FOR THINKERS...<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE KEPT THE INTELLECTUAL LEVEL AT ROCK BOTTOM --FOR LOWEST COMMON DENOMINATOR ( LCD )<br />\n<br />\nSO LAY OFF FOR A WHILE --<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">WATCH BOLLYWOOD MOVIES AND CRICKET</span></b></div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_111b+seedBWnRD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_111b+seedBWnRD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Discovering how to say \u2018no\u2019 sometimes is one\nof the greatest skills for modern living, if you\u2019re to protect yourself from\nbeing overloaded and then becoming sick with the stress.</span>&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To\nstay productive, and minimize stress, you have to learn the Gentle Art of\nSaying No \u2014 an art that many people have problems with.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You\nneed to be firm, and unapologetic about guarding your time from time bandits.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It\u2019s often much easier\nto pre-empt requests than to say \u201cno\u201d to them after the request has been made.</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Instead\nof providing an answer then and there, it\u2019s often better to tell the person\nyou\u2019ll give their request some thought and get back to them.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">This will allow\nyou to give it some consideration, and check your commitments and priorities.\nThen, if you can\u2019t take on the request, simply tell them: \u201cAfter giving this\nsome thought, and checking my commitments, I won\u2019t be able to accommodate the\nrequest at this time.\u201d&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At least you gave it some consideration.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Saying\n\u201cyes\u201d, all the time can be draining and you need to draw the line on when and\nhow to say \u201cno\u201d. It may feel like you are disappointing others by saying no but\nif you constantly say yes, people will take advantage of you.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">IF SOME CUNT INSIST ON\nKNOWING WHY YOU SAID NO\u2014TELL HIM IT IS PART OF YOUR PERSONAL POLICY.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">OR BLUNTLY\nSAY THAT YOU ARE MAKING ROOM FOR SAYING \u201cYES\u201d TO SOMEONE WHO DOES NOT DESERVE A \"NO\" ( IF THIS PERSON DESERVED NO TACT )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some requests are\nunreasonable or inappropriate, and they issue from people who have no power\nover you OR misrepresent their powers over you<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">I WAS BLUNT AT SEA WITH\nMY SHORE BOSSES \u2013IT WAS THE USUAL \u201cFUCK OFF\u201d&nbsp;\n--DONT DO THIS UNLESS YOUR SHIT DOES NOT SMELL IN THAT COMPANY .</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Time displays a\nstrange, elastic quality: it goes fast when you\u2019re engaged in something\ninteresting and stretches when you allow yourself to get bored.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some\npeople are stuck in the past, others have their gaze firmly staring into the\nfuture, and some people just live in the moment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your unconscious mind\nneeds direction Yogis liken the unconscious mind to a mischievous monkey,\nalways leaping from tree to tree. The way to keep the monkey occupied and out\nof mischief is to stick a pole in the ground and direct the monkey to climb up\nand down the pole. If your conscious mind doesn\u2019t provide a direction for your\nunconscious mind, the latter looks to find direction wherever it can. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Your unconscious mind needs direction and\nfocus or it may create destructive behaviours in you. In order to direct the\nunconscious mind, you need to open up communication channels between your\nconscious and your unconscious minds. This rapport is developed by finding a\nquiet time for meditation or relaxation and examining the memories presented to\nyou by your unconscious mind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your unconscious mind \u2013\nthe preserver of memories that all your experiences are recorded faithfully in\nmemory.&nbsp; Part of the function of the\nunconscious mind is to repress memories with unresolved negative emotions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your unconscious mind\nis a lean, mean learning machine. Your unconscious thrives on new experiences.\nIt needs to be fed with new possibilities and gets you into trouble when you\ndon\u2019t keep it from getting bored.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You can find\nconstructive ways of keeping your mind occupied, such as reading, or taking up\na hobby&nbsp; which interests you . Activities\nlike these make your brain cells grow more physical dendrites (the branches of\na brain cell) and keep you mentally fitter.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;Blogging has wired by own brain\nvia different pathways.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A terrorist can kill\nand destroy without qualms because his moral code teaches him that he\u2019s a\nfreedom fighter. He therefore believes that he\u2019s in fact being amoral person in\nfighting against a criminal society.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If, however, your\nunconscious mind decides that you deserve to be punished, you can be wracked\nwith guilt and exhibit behaviors designed to punish yourself<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/LWasiz1HM48/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/LWasiz1HM48?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1044944259776353879\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_175M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. text-decoration-line: none;\">July 6, 2017 at 1:56 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_67MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nAnand Vijayan, Bombay<br />\nUllas TS, Kochi<br />\nSuhana Rashee, Punalur<br />\nAnumita Mitra, AIPWA, Kolkata<br />\nBinitha V Thampi, IIT Chennai<br />\nRajashree R, Young India Fellow, Asoka University<br />\nNisha Jayan, New York<br />\nAjith Unnikrishna Pillai, Alappuzha<br />\nSeema Krishnakumar, Photographer, Coimbatore<br />\nAdv Rajif, KOzhikode<br />\nDelton, Human Rights Activist, KKozhikode<br />\nAshwain Babu, HUman Rights Activist, Kozhikode<br />\nKP Lijukumar, Social Activist, Kozhikode<br />\nNadi, Human Rights Activist, Kozhikode<br />\nJasmine, Youth Dialogue, Kozhikode<br />\nKP Sasi, Filmmaker / Activist<br />\nDeepu, Pedestrian Pictures, Bangalore<br />\nBindulakshmi Pattadath, TISS, Mumbai<br />\nArathi PM, Council for Social Development, Delhi<br />\nIndu Harikumar, Artist, Mumbai<br />\nMadhurima Bakshi, Kolkata<br />\nAravind VR, Kochi<br />\nSreejith D, Journalist, Delhi<br />\nDarshana Sreedhar Mini, University of Southern California<br />\nSajith Muhammed, Trivandrum<br />\nAnirban Kapil Baishya<br />\nReshma Koroth, Oregon State University, Corvallis<br />\nCharu Gupta, Delhi University, Delhi<br />\nTT Sreekumar, Academician, Ahmedabad<br />\nSidharth Rajmohan, Trivandrum<br />\nDr AK Jayashri, activist, Kannur<br />\nPadmini Swaminathan, TISS Hyderabad<br />\nA. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 6, 2017 at 1:59 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_68MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">http://www.indianjobs4u.com/resmi-r-nair-arrest<br /><br />http://indianexpress.com/article/india/india-news-india/two-organisers-of-keralas-kiss-of-love-protest-arrested-for-allegedly-running-sex-racket/</span></div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_69b+seedEHoVD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_69b+seedEHoVD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">IS THIS JNU COMMIE PROFESSOR NIVEDITA MENON MENTALLY FIT TO TEACH INDIAN STUDENTS ?</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/4ZFCMTSbsRo/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/4ZFCMTSbsRo?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">TO BE CONTINUED--</span></b><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-UcxVF_Kkk0g/WVym-IwQ-FI/AAAAAAABUp0/OT_GG8xVwE4CLWPxfv9Qu9fVj3EByppzwCLcBGAs/s1600/20151129_210108.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"1018\" data-original-width=\"595\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-UcxVF_Kkk0g/WVym-IwQ-FI/AAAAAAABUp0/OT_GG8xVwE4CLWPxfv9Qu9fVj3EByppzwCLcBGAs/s640/20151129_210108.jpg\" width=\"374\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n..</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "232", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/5619189538808701393/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "4797069632469095026", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2017-07-03T13:05:00+05:30", "updated": "2017-07-05T14:16:09+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNDk5MjQ0MzY5NDEzCm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/ethical-nlp-neuro-linguistic_3.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/4797069632469095026", "title": "Ethical NLP, Neuro-Linguistic Programming sans covert manipulation and predatory deception, Part 16 - Capt Ajit Vadakayil", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS POST IS CONTINUED FROM PART 15, BELOW--</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/07/ethical-nlp-neuro-linguistic.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/07/ethical-nlp-neuro-linguistic.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The NLP conmen has\ninfused vague and amorphous language, out of context metaphors and pointless\njargon, but also because of the diversity of its supposed applications; from\n\u2018traditional\u2019 therapeutic settings, to sports coaching, to corporate training\nseminars, to slimy seduction and criminal stealing . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It aspires to include\nsomething for everyone; the best way to maximise the market and therefore the\npotential profit. &nbsp;One relatively common\ntheme is focused on teaching communication skills in order to facilitate the\nlearner\u2019s personal and professional relationships. &nbsp;On the surface this sounds reasonable, but the\ncommunication theory that its based on has absolutely zero empirical support. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NLP-conmen talk about\nbeing able to \u2018reprogram\u2019 their own (and other\u2019s) brain. &nbsp;NLP has given credence to Jew Noam Chomsky\u2019s\nmindless \u201cColorless green ideas sleep furiously\u201d &nbsp;linquistics . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chomsky can fool the\nwhole planet, but NOT Capt Ajit Vadakayil who knows when the emperor walks\nnaked.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/10/avram-noam-chomsky-karl-marx-of-new.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/10/avram-noam-chomsky-karl-marx-of-new.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chomsky's linguistics\nare as warped as his double agent politics.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Noam Chomsky invented\nsomething called 'universal grammar' which is somehow programmed into us at\nbirth. &nbsp;&nbsp;In India almost everybody knows\natleast 3 languages .&nbsp; It is pretty\nobvious to us that there is no such thing as 'universal grammar'.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is bullshit that we\nformulate 'deep structures' in our heads using 'universal grammar'\u2014and that too\nin a stupid language called English<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The combination of junk science and junk\npolitics has made Chomsky an attractive - and unstoppable - juggernaut in the kosher&nbsp; controlled Western academic world.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Linguists who reject\nthe bullshit Chomskyan paradigm are marginalized , blackballed and shut out of\nthe profession entirely<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chomsky is a Rothschild\nbacked prophet who demands that people believe him. Since his claims cannot be\nproved, they have to be taken on faith.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Universal grammar (UG)\nin linguistics, is the theory of the genetic component of the language faculty,\ncredited to Noam Chomsky. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The basic postulate of\nUG is that a certain set of structural rules are innate to humans, independent\nof sensory experience. With more linguistic stimuli received in the course of\npsychological development, children then adopt specific syntactic rules that\nconform to UG<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chomsky argued that the\nhuman brain contains a limited set of constraints for organizing language. This\nimplies in turn that all languages have a common structural basis: the set of\nrules known as \"universal grammar\" ( sic )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanskrit is the mother\nof all language .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I know Sanskrit\u2014Chomsky does not. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">My mother\ntongue Malayalam is the closet language on this planet to Sanskrit-- and I studied Sanskrit in school &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanskrit is the oldest language on this\nplanet , while Malayalam ( the language of Danavas ) is second oldest.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every vestige of\nancient Indian knowledge is Danava . &nbsp;I\nam a Danava.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Sanskrit every word\n(except adverbs and particles) is inflected, and the grammatical inflexion\nitself shows the. relation in which one word stands to another. Thus\ngrammatically speaking, there is no order as such that need be much attended to\n....&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But if there is no grammatical order, there is a sort of logical sequence\nof ideas, which must follow one another in a particular order. ... Words must\nbe so arranged that the ideas will follow one another in their natural order,\nand the words in their natural connection<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanskrit grammarians\nwere interested in grammar but not in syntax. Only stupid languages like\nEnglish have syntax and spelling.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nSyntax is the arrangement of words and phrases to create well-formed\nsentences in a language<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Sanskrit the\ngrammatical inflexion itself shows the relation of one word to another, and no\nharm or inaccuracy occurs, if the student does not observe the usual order of\nwords in a sentence. Take, for example, the English sentence, \"Rama saw\nGovinda.\"&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the order of the words 'R\u0101ma' and 'Govinda' be changed, there\nwill be a very great difference in the meaning; it will, in fact, be a\ndifferent sentence altogether. &nbsp;If the\norder of the words be changed, in Sanskrit no difference occurs in the meaning thing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanskrit and Malayalam &nbsp;is a word-order free language .&nbsp; You can take a Sanskrit sentence, jumble its\nwords the way you wish and the resulting sentence would still mean the same as\nthe original one<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All the sentences given\nbelow mean exactly the same.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;\u201cA man abandons worn-out clothes to wear other\nnew ones.\u201c<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">and so on\u2026till\nthousands of permutations are exhausted!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Try to change the\nposition of even a single word in the CUNT language English &nbsp;and you will see the sentence become\nmeaningless. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">English is a weakly\ninflected language. An inflection of a word is a different form of that word\nand is used for enhancing the meaning of the original word. English rarely uses\ndifferent forms of a word, to convey enhanced meanings of that word. Instead,\nit uses totally new unrelated words to convey the enhanced meanings.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For\nexample, to convey \u201cthe meat was eaten by a dog\u201c, we are using a totally new\nunrelated word \u2018by\u2019, instead of using a different form of the word \u2018Dog\u2019<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Highly inflected\nlanguages are those which depend heavily on inflections to convey the enhanced\nmeanings of a word. For example, the sentence \u201cthe meat was eaten by a dog\u201d\nwritten in Sanskrit, would be-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092e\u093e\u0902\u0938\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0916\u093e\u0926\u093f\u0924\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0915\u0941\u0915\u094d\u0915\u0941\u0930\u0947\u0923</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0965</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The meat was eaten by a\ndog .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In English, to convey\nthe information that dog is the agent by whom the action(of eating) is being\nperformed, we are using a totally new unrelated word by. But in Sanskrit, we\nare using a different form(inflection) of the word </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0915\u0941\u0915\u094d\u0915\u0941\u0930</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here, </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0915\u0941\u0915\u094d\u0915\u0941\u0930\u0947\u0923</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\nis an inflection of the original word </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0915\u0941\u0915\u094d\u0915\u0941\u0930</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">,\nwhich conveys the extra information that </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0915\u0941\u0915\u094d\u0915\u0941\u0930</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\nis the agent by whom the action is being performed. Similarly, while English\nused the word was to convey that the meat is already eaten, Sanskrit uses </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0916\u093e\u0926\u093f\u0924\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; \u2013 a different form of the word </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0916\u093e\u0926\u0928</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\u2013 to convey that the action(</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0916\u093e\u0926\u0928</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">) is already performed.\nThe word&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0916\u093e\u0926\u093f\u0924\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\nis an inflection of the original word </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0916\u093e\u0926\u0928</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanskrit grammarians\nwere interested in sambandha and not in abhisambandha, and accordingly in\ngrammatical relations but not necessarily in word order<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sambandha &nbsp;is the relation of one word to another within\na sentence (as shown, e.g., by grammatical inflexion)'.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The grammar of the\nSanskrit language has a complex verbal system, rich nominal declension, and\nextensive use of compound nouns.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-p4RNWLtvzj8/WVn0siA3ZoI/AAAAAAABUos/YtGq3uu9VGQtiDiRdNcXvWBIzuMc9-jrQCLcBGAs/s1600/dnnevah12.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"412\" data-original-width=\"640\" height=\"412\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-p4RNWLtvzj8/WVn0siA3ZoI/AAAAAAABUos/YtGq3uu9VGQtiDiRdNcXvWBIzuMc9-jrQCLcBGAs/s640/dnnevah12.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">CHOMSKY HAS NO RIGHT TO\nCALL HIMSELF A LINGUISTICS EXPERT WITHOUT BASIC UNDERSTANDING OF SANSKRIT\u2014THE MOTHER\nOF ALL LANGUAGES .&nbsp; </span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SRUTI OF VEDAS IN\nSANSKRIT IS 400 CENTURIES OLD.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chomsky spAke\u2014\u201cA\ngrammar contains a syntactic component, a semantic component and a phonological\ncomponent...The syntactic component consists of a base and a transformational\ncomponent. The base, in turn, consists of a categorial subcomponent and a\nlexicon. The base generates deep structures. A deep structure enters the\nsemantic component and receives a semantic interpretation; it is mapped by\ntransformational rules into a surface structure, which is then given a phonetic\ninterpretation by the rules of the phonological component\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In above grammar model\nof <b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">CHOOT CHOMSKY</span></b> , syntax is given a prominent, generative role, whereas\nphonology and semantics are assigned secondary, interpretive roles<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The theoretical\nconstructs and principles of the generative grammar introduced by Chomsky &nbsp;such as deep structures, transformations,\nautonomy and primacy of syntax, etc. deserve to be shat on and thrown on Chomsky\u2019s\nface. &nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">I am sorry, I have been reduced to\nthis.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">Mindless Chomskyanism\nhas been the dominant paradigm in linguistics for nearly forty years. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">So, so , so-- If you toe CHOOT Chomsky\u2019s\nline, &nbsp;you are a genius ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">Not any more !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc;
