margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img kasperskylab_antibanner=\"on\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7551482142041976854\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_14M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/07/ethical-nlp-neuro-linguistic_3.html?showComment=1499083427187#c7551482142041976854\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">July 3, 2017 at 5:33 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_14MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nMONIER MONIER WILLIAMS JUST HAS 50% OF SANSKRIT WORDS.<br />\n<br />\nTECHNICAL WORDS WERE NOT INCLUDED TO SHOW INDIA AS A HEATHEN NATION FIT ONLY TO SERVE WHITE NATIONS<br />\n<br />\nLIKE HOW ISRAEL COMPILED A NEW HEBREW LEXICON FULL OF MODERN TECHNICAL WORDS-- INDIA MUST DO TOO<br />\n<br />\nHINDI CAN NEVER EVER BE UPGRADED TO A TECHNICAL LANGUAGE --IT IS AN INFERIOR LANGUAGE REJECTED BY NON-HINDI SPEAKING STATES WHO HAVE OWN SUPERIOR LANGUAGES<br />\n<br />\nUPGRADING SANSKRIT TO A MODERN LANGUAGE WILL BE THE ULTIMATE SERVICE TO BHARATMATA<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">LET US HAVE PEACOCK AS NATIONAL BIRD--NOT CROW&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\nQUALITY OVER QUANTITY ALWAYS<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n</div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_15b+seedgocD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When people do\nsomething good \u2013 they take the credit for it. When something goes wrong \u2013 its\nsomeone else\u2019s fault! This is a basic illustration of self deception.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mind is incredibly\ngood at \u2018deleting\u2019 information that it doesn\u2019t want to know, based on what it\nwants to believe. So we may conveniently \u2018forget\u2019 the times we let people down,\nWe think we\u2019re somehow special inside, and that \u2018everyone else is just the same,\npart of the masses\u2019.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some people will say\nthat they have a good awareness of themselves, that they know how they come\nacross, and are totally comfortable with themselves. This is more-than-likely\nself-deception again, protecting the delicate ego!&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You only have to show such a\nperson a candid video or even just a sound recording of themselves, and see how\nthey squirm in discomfort when they\u2019re forced to acknowledge the massive gap\nbetween how they see themselves, and how others see them.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When a person doesn\u2019t\neven acknowledge or recognise they are self-deceiving, the results can be\ncatastrophic. . Or those spooky cult leaders like our PADMA VIBHUSHAN rogue\ngurus in India ( sponsored by white Jews/ UN/ Rothschild controlled Freemasons/\nBenami media &nbsp;&nbsp;) who think they are Gods chosen one, with\npower over the people.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Beliefs have a nasty\nhabit of self-perpetuating and reinforcing themselves through distorted\nthinking.&nbsp; We notice and pay attention to\nthe things that reinforce what we think, and ignore, delete and deny those that\nchallenge what we believe. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The power of this\neffect is staggering \u2013 people will cling to beliefs in the face of\nover-whelming evidence, irrationally finding ways to justify themselves. Yet,\nthey\u2019ll later use much weaker, flimsy evidence to support another belief.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Its so important to\nbecome challenging of our beliefs, to ensure that our distortions don\u2019t runaway\nwith themselves. Its important enough with matters in the outside world, but\nwhen it comes to beliefs about ourselves, we may as well make the effort to get\nit right.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today we have sports\ncoached trained in NLP\u2014who kill joy in the sport. &nbsp;It is all about their own ego, spent forces and\ndeadwood thinking that they are king makers &nbsp;.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NLP powers self\ndeception.&nbsp; Self deception describes the\nprocess of how we lie to ourselves without realising that we\u2019re doing it \u2013\nliterally believing our own beliefs, perceptions and thoughts.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Self deception happens\nbecause we all have fragile egos. The subconscious mind works very hard to\nprotect your feelings from harm and confusion, so twists and distorts where\npossible to make you feel better than you would otherwise.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your memories determine\nwhat you anticipate and how you behave and communicate with other people.\nMemories from your past can affect your present and your future. The problem\noccurs when your memories don\u2019t stay in the order in which they were recorded.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When memories get jumbled up, they bring along all the emotions of when they\nactually happened. By this we mean that your current experience invokes old\nmemories and you find yourself responding to memories and emotions of the past\nrather than to the experience you\u2019re currently having.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When my crew behave in\nan inappropriate way, I know their past experiences are influencing their\ncurrent behavior. I have always given them a way out taking personal pains to\nmentor them\u2014and they have been grateful .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The easier way was to sack them. I\nnever did that as I held the firm belief that these poor souls are working\ntheir asses off at sea, to put bread on the table at home.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; This filtration process\nis influenced by your values and beliefs<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Spirituality allows you\nto cultivate good values and count your blessings rather than your sorrows .\nLife dished out a mixed bad. Don\u2019t dwell too much on your sorrows<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Like all humans, you\nrespond in accordance with the map of the world you hold in your head. This map\nis based on what you believe about your identity and on your values and beliefs\nas well as your attitudes, memories, and cultural background. There is much in\nIndian culture to take pride in; much that is hard to find elsewhere.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In India we marry someone of our own culture.\nThere is a clean identification of one's duties at home . When a cup of tea as\nto be made there is no doubt who is gonna make it. When it comes to protection\nfor the family there is no doubt who will provide it.&nbsp; Our wives and daughters don\u2019t go to office or\nschool with condoms in the purse/ school bag or a extra pair of panties like in\nthe west.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is greater survival chances of the society with moderate\nfreedom for individuals. Cooperation among both the genders instead of\ncompetition contributes to the survival of society. Indian culture promotes\nstability and harmony not utopia of ultra-freedom.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"India is, the\ncradle of the human race, the birthplace of human speech, the mother of\nhistory, the grandmother of legend, and the great grand mother of tradition.\nour most valuable and most instructive materials in the history of man are\ntreasured up in India only.\" - <span style=\"background-color: white;\">Mark Twain.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"India was the\nmotherland of our race, and Sanskrit the mother of Europe's languages: she was\nthe mother of our philosophy; mother, through the Arabs, of much of our\nmathematics; mother, through the Buddha, of the ideals embodied in\nChristianity; mother, through the village community, of self-government and\ndemocracy. Mother India is in many ways the mother of us all\" - <span style=\"background-color: white;\">Will\nDurant.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE WHITE INVADER TRIED\nTHEIR BEST TO MAKE INDIANS FEEL AN INFERIORITY COMPLEX \u2013THAT WESTERN CULTURE IS\nSUPERIOR TO OURS.&nbsp; IT DID NOT WORK.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THEY WERE FORCED TO RESORT TO MONETARY\nBRIBES AND SOPS TO CONVERT THE POOREST OF THE POOR.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE WHITE INVADER\nCREATED HUNDREDS OF &nbsp;FAKE MUTTS TO\nTROUBLE POOR PEOPLE AND GIVEN THEM A \u201cFALSE SENSE OF HISTORY\u201d THAT THE POOR DALITS WERE TROUBLED FROM TIME IMMEMORIAL. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; soldiers were\nkilled.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; ----&nbsp; the punishment for non-adherence was </span></span><b style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">SEVERE whipping\ninside jail</span></b><span style=\"color: purple;\"> , administered by a Sikh Indian.</span></span></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Parvez was later\narrested on 15 September by Indian officials from his home in Srinagar.[9]\nLater on 16 September 2016, Jammu Kashmir Coalition of Civil Society stated\nthat Khurram Parvez has been detained without formal arrest or notifications,\nand in violation of his rights to information, and legal counsel.[10][11][12]\nOn 21 September, a day after a sessions court ordered his release, Khurram\nParvez had been detained a second time under Public Safety Act (PSA).[13][14]\nAfter 76 days of detention,[15] on 30 November he was finally released from\nprison following the orders[16] of Jammu and Kashmir High Court.[17]<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">WHY IS NOAM CHOMSKY SO\nMUCH INTERESTED IN SAVING INDIAN DESH DROHIS?&nbsp;\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;JUST WHO THE HELL IS HE ? </b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><a href=\"http://leagueofindia.com/resource/binayak-sen-case-statement-prof-noam-chomsky-and-81-others\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://leagueofindia.com/resource/binayak-sen-case-statement-prof-noam-chomsky-and-81-others</a><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">WHY DOES OUR COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY SAVE NAXALS AND SEPARATISTS WHO INFLICT A THOUSAND CUTS WITH FOREIGN KNIVES ON BHARATMATA ? &nbsp;</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">WE KNOW WHO THESE JUDGES ARE !</span></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THERE IS NO NEED TO\nCHEAT ANYONE WITH UNETHICAL NLP SLIME .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IF YOU WANT A BETTER\nRELATIONSHIP TRY THIS SIMPLE EXPERIMENT \u2013 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">GIVE A LIFT IN YOUR CAR\nTO SOMEONE FOOT SLOGGING , YOU ALWAYS IGNORED -</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WISH \"HAPPY NEW YEAR\" TO\nSOMEONE YOU ALWAYS IGNORED -WITH A GENUINE SMILE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mind and body are\ninterlinked and affect each other .&nbsp;\nHolistic medicine like Ayurveda works on the premise that the mind affects\nthe body and the body affects the mind.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In order to maintain a healthy human\nbeing, a medical practitioner needs to do more than just suppress the symptoms.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">They have to examine\nthe mind and body and treat both together.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6200 year old Ayurveda wrote on emotion at the cellular level in the\nbody\u2014it&nbsp; shows just how integrated the\nmind\u2013body connection is. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Neurotransmitters are\nchemicals that transmit impulses along your nerves. They are the means by which\nyour brain communicates with the rest of your body. Each thought you think\nreaches out to the farthest, miniscule cell in your body via neurotransmitters.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Patanjali\u2019s Yoga teaches\nyou to use the conscious mind constructively to send BONAFIDE messages to one\u2019s\nsubconscious mind.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Here are Patanjali\u2019s\nYoga Sutras penned down 7000 years ago.&nbsp;\nThere is NO slime of deceit or covert manipulation. &nbsp;The effects are permanent saturated in\ngoodness .<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><b>CAN <span style=\"color: red;\">CHOOT</span> CHOMSKY, <span style=\"color: red;\">CUNT</span>\nBANDLER OR<span style=\"color: red;\"> PRICK </span>GRINDER EVEN UNDERSTAND THIS ?</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/07/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_27.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/07/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_27.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/07/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_41.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/07/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_41.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/07/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_22.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/07/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_22.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/07/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_21.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/07/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_21.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/07/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_19.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/07/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_19.html</a></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/07/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_18.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/07/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_18.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Have you ever wanted to\ndo something consciously ( ex- I wont take drugs ) but ended up doing something\ntotally different?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You can decide\nconsciously that you want to achieve a goal, but if your unconscious mind isn\u2019t\non-board it may \u2018assist\u2019 you by fulfilling its own agenda \u2013 which may be\ncontrary to what you consciously think you want.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The conscious mind can be\ncompared with the tip of an iceberg and the unconscious mind with the\neight-tenths of the iceberg that\u2019s submerged underwater.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your unconscious can\u2019t\nprocess negatives: it interprets everything you think as a positive thought.\nThis is one of the reasons children often do the opposite of what we told them\nnot to do.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hypnotherapists never\nuse negatives in their hypnotic suggestions..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;So if you think, \u2018I don\u2019t want to be poor,\u2019\nyour subconscious mind focuses on the \u2018poor\u2019 and, because it doesn\u2019t do negatives,\nthe focus becomes \u2018poor\u2019 and everything you associate with poor.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Being poor\nthen becomes the goal in your unconscious mind and like a young child,\ndesperate to please, it helps you behave in a way that keeps you poor; which is\nobviously not what you wanted!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mind works like a\ncomputer and you get what you program. If you\u2019re programming in negativity,\nthen that is exactly what you will get. If you continuously \u2018feed\u2019 your mind\nwith negative stories, words and images, your mind does not \u2018automatically\u2019\ndelete the negatives, but amplifies them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your conscious can\nunderstand negatives, if somebody says \u201cNo\u201d you know what they mean, however\nour subconscious mind is one based more on instinct and survival. Negatives do\nnot exist on that level.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Instead of saying to\nyour child \u201cDon't throw that rock\u201d you should say \u201cPut the rock down NOW\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The subconscious only\nthinks in the present.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since our Mind Power\ncomes from our subconscious, it\u2019s essential to know the differences between it\nand the conscious mind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The subconscious does\nnot know the difference between what is real and what is imagined.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While your conscious\nmind is your logical, rational, analytical mind\u2026your subconscious is your\nil\u2013logical, ir-rational, non-analytical mind. It will believe ANYTHING whether\nit makes logical sense or not. It never questions what you tell it.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So when trying to accomplish goals know in\nyour conscious mind it takes time to attain them.&nbsp;&nbsp; But program your Subconscious into believing\nyou have attained them NOW.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whatever information\nyou have received in your entire life via reading, touching, seeing, smelling,\ntasting, felt has been stored in your subconscious mind.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A normal human can\nspeak at the speed of 200 to 300 words per minute whereas the subconscious can\nthink at the rate of 1000+ words per minute. More amazing than that is the mind\ncan perform millions of operations \u2013 much faster than any normal computer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without your actually\nknowing, your subconscious mind is regulating your breathing, hear beats,\nmaintain blood pressure, regulating body temperature and multiple other body\nrelated functions which is made up of about 6 trillion cells.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The information\nprocessing capability of sub conscious mind is mind boggling. It can process 40\nMillion bits of information per second! Compare it to the almost tiny\ncapability of conscious mind which can process about 40 bits of information per\nsecond.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Subconscious Mind\nmakes up 88% of the human brain\u2019s capacity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Subconscious Mind\ndoes not work on any logic, therefore, it believes anything that it is told by\nthe conscious mind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It has a perfect\nmemory. The subconscious mind contains your whole lifetime history in detail.\nIt contains all the reasons you do what you do and believe what you believe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While subconscious mind\nis an amazing, most powerful tool you have, it has certain limitations too. It\nis an excellent and most obedient servant who cannot decide what is good or bad\nfor you..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your subconscious mind\ndoes not have any filter to let good come in and kick out the bad or unhealthy\ninformation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A harmless non\nmedicinal tablet (may be sugar pill) given to patients who have psychosomatic\nproblem. The patients report improvement of their condition or curing of the\nproblem. This is called the \u201cplacebo effect\u201d. This is because such persons\nbelieve that the medicine is going to work.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is an opposite\nprocedure or process of the mind, where it contributes to the disease of the\nbody (instead of curing the body). The person reads or learns about the diseases\nand believes that he is going to have the same disease, thereby developing the\nsymptoms in his body.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In nutshell, whatever\nbelief you hold in your mind, that becomes your reality. This has been\nexpounded in 7000 year old Vedic philosophy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The purpose of reaching\nout to your subconscious is to re-align your beliefs, emotions and re-program\nthem to become more supportive of the desired behavior pattern. The new set of\nbeliefs and behavior will help you achieve your improved self image and do self\ndevelopment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FOR RIGHT HANDERS , THE\nRIGHT BRAIN LOBE IS THE SUBCONSCIOUS BRAIN.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Think of your\nsubconscious mind as incredibly fertile soil that will grow any seed you plant\nin it. Your conscious mind is like the gardener that tends to the soil. It\u2019s\nyour responsibility to be aware of how this process works, choosing wisely what\nreaches the inner garden \u2014 your subconscious..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The subconscious doesn\u2019t\ndiscriminate, judge, or censor. It will manifest success, abundance, and health\njust as easily as failure, ill health, and misfortune. Your subconscious\naccepts what is impressed upon it with feeling and repetition, whether these\nthoughts are positive or negative.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It does not evaluate things like your\nconscious mind does. Your thoughts define you.. Always imagine a positive outcome\nof your problems, feel the enthusiasm from within and believe what is about to\nhappen. All your feelings and positivity must be clearly accepted by your\nsubconscious..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The subconscious creates our emotions, often independently of\nthe input of the conscious mind. This explains why emotions can appear so\nirrational and \u201cinappropriate\u201d \u2013 why we can wake-up in the morning grumpy or\nanxious and find ourselves completely happy and optimistic at lunchtime,\nwithout that \u201clogically\u201d anything had really changed. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The subconscious help us define ourselves and\nmake sense of the world. It uses emotions, memories, core values and beliefs as\n\u201cfilters\u201d to sift through the otherwise overwhelming amount of information we\nare exposed to and condense it to a size that is consciously comprehensible. In\nother words, whatever we perceive as \u201creality\u201d is largely determined by our\nsubconscious filter.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The subconscious\noversees all physiological functions of the body; we don\u2019t regulate our heart\nrate, breathing, kidney function or digestion with our conscious mind. If we\nwould, the collection of trillions of cells that comprise our body, wouldn\u2019t\nwork together as effectively and harmoniously as it usually does.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even\ndeliberate movement, such as walking, requires the precise coordination of many\ndifferent muscles, a challenge that we would not able to master consciously. &nbsp;&nbsp;Unexpressed and unresolved memories and\nemotions that are stored within the subconscious mind can function as negative,\nlimiting filters and lead to chronic anxiety, phobias, depression, addictions\nand low-self-esteem.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Limiting core beliefs, such as \u201cI am not good enough\u201d or\n\u201cI am not safe\u201d are imprinted on subconscious levels and can keep us stuck and\nprevent us from seeing who we really are and accessing our true potential. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Patanjali\u2019s Yoga asked us not to place too\nmuch emphasis on the conscious mind \u2013but to rely on the &nbsp;subconscious one. Subconscious in its simplest\nterms can be considered that part of you that is outside of your conscious\nawareness, that creates automatic programs (Beliefs, Behaviors &amp; Attitudes)\nto make life for you easier to operate in without having to place too much\nfocus and attention on everything you are doing<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">Yoga taught us to be <b>IN\nTHE ZONE</b> and to be <b>IN THE FLOW</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/in-zone-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/in-zone-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/in-flow-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/in-flow-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/gut-feeling-and-intuition-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/gut-feeling-and-intuition-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">THERE IS NO NEED TO\nDECEIVE YOURSELF ( OR OTHERS ) BY SLIMY NLP</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ANCIENT INDIA KNEW THE\nVALUE OF GRATITUDE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YOU WILL NEVER FIND A\nHINDU SANSKRIT MANTRA WITHOUT GRATITUDE INFUSED IN IT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NO HINDU MOB WILL RUSH\nOUT OF A TEMPLE AFTER FRIDAY PRAYERS TO LYNCH EMMASSE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; text-size-adjust: none; vertical-align: baseline; word-wrap: break-word;\">\nCHINESE ECONOMY IS SINKING.. A BUBBLE WITHIN A BUBBLE\u2026. CHINA KO L0DA LAGNE WAALAH HAI\u2026 CHINAs SURVIVAL DEPENDS ON OBOR\u2026..CHINAs DEBT TO GDP RATIO IS A SHOCKING 400 % (total Chinese debt at all levels (household, corporate, bank and government)) ..... Construction and debt is driving China's growth.. Chinese Government rely on infrastructure development to sustain artificial growth.. China has a 7.9 trillion USD shadow banking sector\u2026 On May 24th 2017 , the rating agency Moody\u2019s downgraded China\u2019s credit rating for the first time since 1989 on concerns over rising debt and slowing economic growth\u2026 The IMF forecast China\u2019s gross domestic product to grow 6.7 per cent this year --the real rate is just 3.9%.. Most of the debt is coming from the Chinese corporate sector. Unlike USA these are mostly state-owned enterprises, controlled by the Chinese government..... It does not include the WMPs, which are technically investments kept off the balance sheets of the book. A wealth management product is an uninsured financial product sold in China by banks and other financial institutions. Typically they offer a high rate of interest, and, sometimes, guaranteed return. .. It also does not include provincial obligations that take the form of guarantees. Those will have to be bailed out by Beijing\u2026 Chinese banks rely on sales of new WMPs to redeem the old ones at maturity. Today, when a customer wants his money back, the bank sells a new WMP, and uses that money to cash out the redeeming customer. .. The banks use sales of WMPs to invest in the riskiest development projects and state-owned enterprises (SOEs) on the edge of bankruptcy\u2026 The new investor steps into the shoes of the old with the same bad underlying investment\u2026 These institutions behind these projects, financed by the original WMPs, cannot repay them. So most of the WMPs will never be repaid\u2026 That means they may have to be bailed-out by the government when the bubble bursts-- when the system finally crumbles\u2026 Chinese WMPs\u2019 are the greatest Ponzi scheme in history\u2014a scheme devised by MAD MEN .. WMPs are something like the collateralized debt obligations (CDOs)-- the pooled assets \u2013 such as mortgages, bonds and loans \u2013 are essentially debt obligations that serve as collateral for the CDO\u2026 Much of Chinese debt is denominated in U.S. dollars so the situation is made even worse by the strong dollar and the global dollar shortage. Both of those factors make dollar-denominated debt much harder to repay\u2026</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-box level0 highlight\" data-childcount=\"\" data-email=\"ajitvadakayil@gmail.com\" data-id=\"-1\" data-index=\"-1\" data-level=\"0\" data-plugin=\"comment\" data-user=\"ajitvadakayil Vadakayil\" data-userid=\"2868881\" id=\"cmt-1\" style=\"background: rgb(237, 242, 245); But one dysfunction that cannot be finessed is cash-flow. As every entrepreneur and small businessperson knows, cash never lies. You either have it or you don\u2019t\u2026 Because of excessive debt and inability to pay, cash flow problems are now reaching epidemic proportions in China\u2026. Clearly there are no easy answers to China\u2019s debt problem\u2026 The only painless escape would be on a wave of economic growth-- and China thinks their OBOR road will solve it ( DUMPING GOODS ) -- B A LL S IT WILL TAKE OFF !... China is faced with a mountain of unpayable debt, weaker growth, and a stronger dollar that will make the debt even harder to repay. The Chinese credit bubble has only one feasible solution, China must use its hard currency reserves to bail-out the entire banking and SOE sector and try to start over with a relatively clean balance sheet\u2026. ONLY INDIA HAS A HEALTHY ECONOMY\u2026. OUR GROWTH TODAY IS 10.1 % .. OUR TRAITOR MAIN STEAM MEDIA AND THEIR FOREIGN PAYROLL DESH DROHIS LOVES TO RUN DOWN INDIAs ECONOMY\u2026 Currently, Chinese shadow banks fund approximately 24 % of Chinese debt\u2026 With the global slowdown, many of China\u2019s factories closed resulting in approximately 20 million workers unemployed. China\u2019s leaders responded by instituting a $600 billion stimulus plan to build and boost the nation\u2019s infrastructure and provide jobs to its people and dump these goods on the OBOR road\u2026 For the next few years China is unlikely to manage growth rates above 3.8% on an average\u2014hence this headlong rush into ONE BELT ONE ROAD\u2026. Stimulus is becoming less effective, requiring four units of credit for each unit of growth. If this trend continues, China and its local government entities will pay much more in order to borrow and ultimately get a lower return on every unit borrowed.. If interest rates in the United States continue to rise, funds will flee China, causing immense capital outflows. If President Trump imposes tariffs on Chinese goods into the United States, this will reduce demand causing China\u2019s economy to slow down--OBOR road or no OBOR road\u2026 China\u2019s growth has been largely driven by investment, but this has started to slow because of declines in infrastructure and property investment\u2026</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-box level0 highlight\" data-childcount=\"\" data-email=\"ajitvadakayil@gmail.com\" data-id=\"-1\" data-index=\"-1\" data-level=\"0\" data-plugin=\"comment\" data-user=\"ajitvadakayil Vadakayil\" data-userid=\"2868881\" id=\"cmt-1\" style=\"background: rgb(237, 242, 245); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: 21px; margin-bottom: 20px; padding: 0px; text-size-adjust: none; vertical-align: baseline; word-wrap: break-word;\">\nRecent Chinese growth has primarily been driven by the real estate bubble, and that too in second tier cities. First tier cities are saturated and they don\u2019t want negative publicity from western tourists \u2026 The Chinese have a middle-class of several hundred million people with a high propensity to save. Most Chinese don\u2019t get to invest overseas, so they are limited to real estate, gold and local investment products, mostly sold through banks\u2026 When customers go into a bank, they are offered a standard bank deposit paying about 2%, or a \u201cwealth management product,\u201d (WMP) that pays about 8%.... Many customers naturally take the 8% return and invest in bank-managed WMPs. Customers believe the WMPs are guaranteed by the bank or the government. They\u2019re not \u2014 WMPs are just unsecured investments\u2026. Along with wealth management products from banks, online lenders are jumping into the game, adding to the risks. There are PONZI online Chinese finance companies fleecing merrily\u2026 China has depended on debt to grow its economy. China uses debt as the key mechanism to build its infrastructure and expand businesses\u2026 However, the problem is that private and public debt are not only linked, but that both are growing at unsustainable rates . To expand their operations and be competitive, businesses borrow through bank loans and issuing bonds. \u2026. This expansive lending has occurred for over a decade resulting in $23,600 in bank loans, bonds, and other debt obligations for each person in China. The problem is that businesses in China are state-owned enterprises (SOEs) run and owned by the government in order to keep people working. .. Loans come mainly from state-owned banks resulting in money being shifted from one pocket to another in the Chinese government accounting methodology\u2026 Compounding matters is that Chinese businesses often guarantee each other\u2019s loans and debt obligations. This way of doing business makes it easier for a company to obtain a loan that would otherwise be very difficult. The state-owned banks complicate this situation by lending primarily to SOEs since they have implied governmental guarantees\u2026. There is also the role of shadow banking. Shadow banking is bank-mediated business-to-business loans, allowing lending to occur when a potential borrower has been refused by a Chinese bank or not able to float a bond offering.. Mortgage lending has increased sharply, and made up the largest share of bank loans.. Shadow banking is booming in China.. Chinese growth ( unlike India ) is still driven mainly by debt-fuelled spending and \u00adexports.. China has an insatiable demand for credit. With stringent controls on banking activities, shadow banking had spiraled high with a debt-to-GDP ratio climbing to a towering 300%. China will NOT admit this\u2026 China is now this planets No 1 in shadow-banking asset and No 1 in the shadow-banking sector\u2026</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-box level0 highlight\" data-childcount=\"\" data-email=\"ajitvadakayil@gmail.com\" data-id=\"-1\" data-index=\"-1\" data-level=\"0\" data-plugin=\"comment\" data-user=\"ajitvadakayil Vadakayil\" data-userid=\"2868881\" id=\"cmt-1\" style=\"background: rgb(237, 242, 245); , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hypnosis is essentially\nthe subject\u2019s fixation of attention, and while in that state of\nhyper-suggestability, receiving a suggestion from the hypnotist.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every type of hypnotic\ninduction involves a fixation of attention, which is what Obama accomplishes\nwith his extraordinarily slow and rhythmical and powerful speech pattern and hand\ngestures</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hypnotists use tonality\nand changes in tonality while speaking to hypnotize and send subconscious\nmessages.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The unconscious mind\nresponds to openings, opportunities, metaphors, symbols and contradictions.\nEffective hypnotic suggestion, then, should be \u201cartfully vague\u201d, leaving space\nfor the subject to fill in the gaps with their own unconscious understandings -\neven if they do not consciously grasp what is happening.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The skilled\nhypnotherapist constructs these gaps of meaning in a way most suited to the\nindividual subject - in a way which is most likely to produce the desired\nchange.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Obama intentionally use\nof Ericksonian hypnosis techniques and NLP slime.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Using metaphor in\nhypnosis is especially effective because it engages the conscious and\nunconscious mind at the same time, communicating logically while activating\nimagination and emotion allows the use of \u201cultracompelling\ncommunications.\u201d&nbsp; Imagination is a\npowerful hypnotic tool because creativity is an altered state of consciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An emotional response\nis an unconscious response. Raising of emotion is a fundamental technique in hypnosis\nto make the subject more programmable, more effectively, because emotion is a\nsubconscious reaction, and can be connected to other subconscious elements,\nincluding commands<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You will notice Obama\nhas all of these in his speeches, unnaturally slow language in simplistic\nphrases which catch and hold your attention, and countless images that grab and\nhold your imagination, such as--</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The phrase is a\nvisual and hypnotically captivating statement that you cannot disagree with\nbecause it makes your subconscious associate relaxation, pleasure, and other\nemotions and your most tranquil moment with his voice, preparing you for his\nfollowing sentence, \u201cand change is in the air.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The more a hypnotist\npaces and leads you, and uses other hypnotic speech patterns in succession, the\nmore effective they become at manipulating you because the repetition wears\ndown your critical factor.&nbsp;&nbsp; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Doing what Obama does\nonce or twice doesn\u2019t do as much, but doing it throughout a speech, and\ncontinuously throughout a campaign, subconsciously brainwashes you</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Embedded suggestions are messages within other\nmessages, in which while the conscious mind is receiving one message (the\nsurface structure), the subconscious is receiving another, the real message. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">This can be done a number of ways, including\nby change in tone, or pauses, even ones so subtle the audience is not\nconsciously aware of it, such as a split second pause or breath by the hypnotist\nat a specific time.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The subconscious mind\ndoes not interpret and analyze as the conscious mind does, and often many words\nare removed \u201cdeleted\u201d from what you experience, and only specific portions fall\nthrough to the subconscious mind.&nbsp; His\nstatement is heard by the audience in one way, but subconsciously received\nanother way, the way actually intended by Obama.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A pause in speaking by\nthe hypnotist, even is only for a split second, even if you are not even\nconsciously aware of it, can turn that hidden meaning into a subconscious\ncommand because it is isolated, and emphasized in the subconscious.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Notice how his pauses are designed to have you\nreflect and ponder, and have your mind wander during each pause.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As your mind\nwanders, his words echo in the subconscious mind while your conscious mind is\nleft hanging. The dominant hemisphere is\nsent on an assignment using the linguistic processes and imagination. The\ncritical factor is thus occupied, to make the non-dominant hemisphere and\nsubconscious more susceptible to suggestion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Obama asks you to imagine sixteen months, so you do. You follow where the\nstoryteller takes your mind and so you try to imagine thousands of miles, and\ncontinue following along where he leads you. However, the conscious mind cannot\nimagine a million voices, the number is too big, though Obama tricks you with\nthe first two numbers into trying, by leading you down a path of increasingly\ndifficult concepts to imagine consciously.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He cleverly he leads you\ndown a path which causes the dominant hemisphere to be distracted, and tune out\nof trying to do exactly what he is asking you to do. Your mind tries to imagine\na million and is distracted, sent off on an assignment it can\u2019t perform, tuning\nout, and exposing your subconscious mind. This is a calculated and pre-scripted\nhypnotic induction technique, and the only specific and logical explanation\nthat makes any sense for what he is saying.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\u201cFour years ago, I\nstood before you and told you my story, of the brief union between a young man\nfrom Kenya and a young woman from Kansas who weren\u2019t well-off or well-known,\nbut shared a belief that in America their son could achieve whatever he put his\nmind to. The story starts past tense, to have\nyou imagine another time and place.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The story is a\npacing statement, \u201cI stood before you and told you my story\u201d which is a present\naccount of exactly what he is doing now, an accurate current representation of\nthe subject\u2019s ongoing verifiable experience because he is standing before us\nnow telling a story. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">This is a very powerful\ntrance induction technique, because Obama tells a story, forcing you to apply\nand use imagination, an altered state of mind and different perspective, to\nlook at the present situation. He is making you apply an altered and\nsubconscious state of mind to your present experience of watching his speech.</span><i>\u201d</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><br /></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Notice JEW Obama's words,\n\u201cpromise\u201d, \u201chard work\u201d, \u201csacrifice\u201d, \u201ceach of us can pursue our individual\ndreams\u201d and then ends the paragraph with \u201cThat is why I stand here tonight.\u201d\nPromise, hard work, sacrifice, each of us pursue our dreams are beautiful\nconcepts nobody can disagree with, and they are pacing statements. &nbsp;In no logical way however does Obama connect\nthese beautiful concepts to why he would make a great President.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Obama says -- \u201cthat is\nwhy I stand here tonight\u201d, your subconscious mind accepts that as absolutely\ntrue. &nbsp;But the question is, which\ninterpretation? 1. That he is literally standing there tonight? or &nbsp;2. That he is standing there so his parents\u2019\ndream will be realized? or &nbsp;3. That he is\nstanding there is because that promise, hard work, sacrifice, and our\nchildren\u2019s dreams is the reason why he is there? &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mind is distracted with this\ntrans-derivational problem that occurs below the level of awareness. Meanwhile,\nthe subconscious mind accepts all three interpretations as absolute truth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The subconscious mind\ncannot make rational distinctions. Once the subconscious mind labels this\nstatement (that is why I stand here tonight) as absolutely true, it accepts it,\nincluding all of its meanings, including hidden meanings. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You look at him standing there tonight and\nconfirm below your level of awareness that that statement is true on one level,\nand that acts as a confirmation of the other meanings in the paragraph, that\nhis parents dream will be realized, and that promise, hard work, sacrifice, and\nour children\u2019s dreams is the reason why he is there.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And remember, this all\nawhile you are entranced by his unnaturally slow, poetic, melodic, hypnotic\nstorytelling, imagination provoking, emotion provoking, and passion provoking\ncontent. font-size: large;\"><br /></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He paces everyone in\nthe audience by talking about \u201cordinary men and women, teachers, students, \u2026.\u201d\nfor identification. &nbsp;Then, notice how he\npoints to the audience when he says \u201cdefining moments\u201d, as if voting for him\nwill define us e.g., as open minded, as courageous.
