, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Milton Model is a\nseries of techniques used in conversational hypnosis, a way of putting someone\ninto trance unnoticed as part of a normal conversation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A direct hypnotic\nsuggestion is a specific instruction such as 'You will now go into a deep\ntrance' <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because hypnotic words\nare not exactly defined, during conversational hypnosis the client must stop\nand consider the meaning of those hypnotic words. This causes the client to\nsearch their subconscious mind to fill in the missing bits, or to decide how to\napply the words to their own personal experience.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because the\nsubconscious mind has to spend time thinking about many different possible\nmeanings, it is much more likely that the client will find something in their\npast that fits, and will be more effective than a direct suggestion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In conversational\nhypnosis the Milton Model suggestions need a bit more work to prepare but have\nthe advantage of avoiding resistance.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large;\"></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;\u201cSuggestion\u201d in the hypnosis world is actually\na suggestion into the subconscious, something your mind will take as\nunquestionably true, thus, in effect, more powerful than even a command as we\nuse this term.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The hypnotist paces the\nsubject by providing the mind with information that is undeniably true,\nsomething the subject strongly believes, or is absolutely and immediately\nverifiable, in successive patterns until the subject\u2019s guard is lowered.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>A quarter century ago,\nI had walked into a captains cabin to take over command of the ship.&nbsp; The outgoing master was in animated\nconference with the bosun and the ships laundryman.&nbsp; From the laundryman\u2019s \u201c I don\u2019t give a damn \u201c\n, body language I could see that he that he was on the warpath.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Both sailors were sent\naway and we settled down to the formal process of handing / taking over\ncommand. I could see that the outgoing captain could not harness his mind to\nthe job\u2014his mind was chattering . So I asked him, what transpired with the\nlaundryman.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>To cut a long story\nshort, the laundryman had refused to do a particular job. He was right, and he\nhad a point. For he was employed to wash stewards uniforms ( white tunics and\npants ) \u2013 not civilian clothes. At the same time the stewards had a point, as\nthey had won civilian clothes on duty due to water rationing at a long\nanchorage.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>I told the captain \u201c\nyou just call him back and I will make him agree to what he refused to do ,\njust a few minutes ago\u2014 even if he was sacked or his knee caps were broken\u201d.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>I then took a A4 size\npaper and wrote down 10 questions , whose answers required the answer YES.&nbsp; The last and 10th question would be \u201c are you\nwilling to wash the clothes , you refused to wash\u201d .<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The captain was clean\nbowled.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Here was a guy telling\nthat he could do the impossible. He wanted to see the questionnaire , and I\ngave it to him. All I wanted him to do was sit in the bedroom behind the\ncurtains and hear the proceedings\u2014to check if I followed the script.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>So pretty soon the\nbosun and laundryman were called back.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>I shot off the first\nquestion, after introducing myself as the new captain.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>1)Are you the\nlaundryman ?\u2014YES<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>2)Is you name Mr so and\nso? \u2013 YES<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>3)You have come to the\nship to earn money for your family?\u2014YES<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>4)You have refused to\nwash the stewards civilian clothes?\u2014YES ( he started to give an explanation \u2013I\nstopped him by raising my hand )<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>5)These civilian\nclothes were worn during water rationing \u2013YES<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>6th to 9th is\nclassified-<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>10TH QUESTION \u2014 SO WILL\nYOU WASH THE CLOTHES NOW , SO THAT I DON\u2019T HAVE TO SEND YOU HOME \u2013&nbsp; \u201cYES SIR!\u201d<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The average human mind\nis not programmed or intelligent enough&nbsp;\nto open its doors wide and then suddenly slam shut.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>If you can indeed slam\nit shut and give NO answer after 9 consecutive YES answers \u2013then you are a\nsuper genius\u2014like the legendary James Bond.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<i style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></i>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The hypnotist purposely\ndescribes absolute truths on multiple levels related to the subject\u2019s current\nreality, and thereby tricks the subject\u2019s critical factor into lowering its\nguard and gets the subject to accept the hypnotist as a source for information\nto be taken into the subconscious as absolutely true.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The brain regularly\nabsorbs representations of the subject\u2019s current ongoing experience, what the\nsubject sees, hears, feels, as a natural part of communication between the\nconscious and subconscious mind. Pacing works by disguising information as part\nof the subject\u2019s ongoing verifiable experience to trick the critical factor\ninto letting that information pass through to the subconscious.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By repeatedly providing\ninformation to the subject that the subject genuinely believes to be true, the\nhypnotist disguises himself as a source for absolutely true information acceptable\nto your subconscious.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The hypnotic commands of the hypnotist can be disguised\nas information being communicated in between the conscious and unconscious mind\nof the subject.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The subject trusts this information believing it is approved by\nthe conscious mind, and the command slips through the critical factor of one\nperson hypnotized, or millions watching on TV.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NLP was never really\nclearly defined in the first place, which makes it highly malleable and\nadaptable to any pseudo-scientific new-age trends that come along. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In my opinion the real\nstroke of genius in NLP, and perhaps the reason why it\u2019s been so successful, is\nsimply the name. &nbsp;These days conmen like Seepak Chopra &nbsp;are\nputting QUANTUM prefix in front of everything.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Below: If anybody thinks these two jokers are smarter than Capt Ajit Vadakayil -- raise your hands !</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even my detractors wont do it !!</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/S2OXsa2lm2E/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/S2OXsa2lm2E?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Back in the \u201970s, NEURO\nthis was way ahead of its time.&nbsp;\nObviously there\u2019s nothing remotely \u2018neuro\u2019 about it, though. Plus the\n\u2018programming\u2019 bit has a deliciously Orwellian appeal; promising the potential\nto effect change in oneself or others, if you just know the right techniques.</span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NLP derives from the\nquick-fix mentality of the self-help movement and is doomed to failure because\nof it. Does it actually help people? NEVER other than placebo effect . Because\nof its vague nature, it\u2019s not even really clear how its effectiveness would be\nmeaningfully assessed anyway.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NLP with its ridiculous\nnay mindless &nbsp;kichdi of psychology,\nphilosophy, linguistics and new-age twaddle with absolutely no support from any\nreputable sources, has never been really challenged by intelligent people\u2014the reason\nwhy it thrives almost like a AMWAY Ponzi scheme .&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bandler has kept on developing (and ruthlessly\ntrademarking) a load of new techniques including \u2018Design Human Engineering, or\n\u2018Charisma Enhancement\u2019. &nbsp;A lot of his\nrecent work include hypnosis. His website is essentially one big advertisement\nfor his books, CDs and speaking gigs; and there are literally thousands of\nindividuals, businesses, and \u2018institutes\u2019 offering NLP training for a\nbewildering variety of purposes and people.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"261\" data-original-width=\"193\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-9vbyp_j6p5s/WVOlUOr6xBI/AAAAAAABUkc/i4pYxstnH_EtkATiv-yZJm5PtAG5CWf1ACLcBGAs/s400/doswwnload.jpg\" width=\"295\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6000 years ago in the middle\nof the Kurukshetra battlefield , Krishna takes on his VIRAAT roop and tells\nArjuna <span style=\"background-color: white;\">overcome by self delusions</span> -- \u201c Be in the moment,&nbsp; and do your duty \u201c.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Krishna tell Arjuna\n,&nbsp; \u201c The soul never dies.&nbsp;&nbsp; There has never been a time when you and I\nhave not existed, nor will there be a time when we will cease to exist \u2026 the\nwise are not deluded by these changes\u201d</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Krishna says, \u2018When one\nsees eternity in things that pass away and infinity in finite things, then one\nhas pure knowledge.\u2019<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-SLz3q52f3LQ/WVOliGHFLNI/AAAAAAABUkg/a58Uc_VLMe4iFovKKDjffjkknqiX_NsjQCLcBGAs/s1600/dowSSWnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"154\" data-original-width=\"327\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-SLz3q52f3LQ/WVOliGHFLNI/AAAAAAABUkg/a58Uc_VLMe4iFovKKDjffjkknqiX_NsjQCLcBGAs/s640/dowSSWnload.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NLP revels in fleeting self\ndeception.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Self-deception is a\nprocess of denying or rationalizing away the relevance, significance, or importance\nof opposing evidence and logical argument.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\nSelf-deception involves convincing oneself of a truth (or lack of truth)\nso that one does not reveal any self-knowledge of the deception.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Self-deception calls\ninto question the nature of the individual, specifically in a psychological\ncontext and the nature of \"self\". <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Irrationality is the\nfoundation upon which the argued paradoxes of self-deception stem&nbsp; Rationalization is influenced by a myriad of\nfactors, including socialization, personal biases, fear, and cognitive\nrepression. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Such rationalization\ncan be manipulated in both positive and negative fashions; convincing one to\nperceive a negative situation optimistically and vice versa. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Repression is often\nconfused with denial, which is the refusal to admit to certain unacceptable or\nunmanageable aspects of reality. Whereas repression relates to mental or\ninternal stimuli, denial relates to external stimuli. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Having\nsaid that (<span style=\"background-color: white;\"> do I sound like that asshole Suhel Seth</span> ) &nbsp;repression and denial often work together, and\ncan be difficult to disentangle.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/hNwPD0I5Tms/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/hNwPD0I5Tms?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 28, 2017 at 6:20 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_18MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\npatanjal yog talks about the power of \"sankalp\" its like u r taking a sankalp/ will power/ power of subconscious to get things done for yourself. similarly while we do any puja or hawan/yagya on any auspicious day the pandit takes sankalp while lighting a ghee fed diya, water in our hands and makes us repeat few lines... shruti smriti....thats actually so that our 5 gyan sesnsors n the 5 elements of nature can get in synch (agni/diya, water/ in kamandal, earth as v r sitting on it, sky, vaayu already there) and our subconscious mind creates an image and that power of the will then gives us back what we prayed for. hence the importance of \"sankalp\" in hindu prayers</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_18BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_17T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_17TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_18b+seedFqi3D\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_17B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8238564082107615659\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_17M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/04/rape-of-subconscious-mind-capt-ajit.html?showComment=1498655343127#c8238564082107615659\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 28, 2017 at 6:39 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_17MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSankalpa in Sanskrit and Malayalam means INTENTION.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/04/vedic-quantum-intention-experiment.html</span><br />\n<br />\nSankalpa is the forerunner of any penance<br />\n<br />\nSabarimala is a pilgrimage of sankalpa<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/sabarimala-makaravilakku-three-light.html</span><br />\n<br />\nSankalpa means a one-pointed resolve to focus both psychologically and philosophically on a specific goal. A sankalpa is a tool meant to harness the will, and to focus and harmonize mind and body.<br />\n<br />\nSankalpa has been given pride of place in Sanatana Dharma<br />\n<br />\nA VRAT is a self resolution.<br />\n<br />\nIt is about accepting some rigid self discipline and sticking to it.<br />\n<br />\nPeople when they want to even TURN OVER A NEW LEAF , do a vrat as a ritual. It is a thousand times more stronger than a bullshit new year resolution.<br />\nIn order to achieve a particular motive and to achieve a particular aim a specific resolve in the form of penance is necessary which should be accompanied by Sankalpa.<br />\n<br />\nThe practice of Yoga-Nidra allows the Sankalpa to go very deep in one\u2019s psyche. Sankalpa is a call to awakening. It makes one able to direct consciousness through the chakras<br />\n<br />\nThe idea of repeating a sankalpa is to create the life we are meant to embrace and enjoy. The purpose is to transform one \u2018s life physically, mentally, emotionally and spiritually.<br />\n<br />\nWhen made on a mind that is calm and relax, the sankalpa is impressed on the subconscious. We then plant the seed of our sankalpa at the deep level of our soul, knowing that when the time is right, in the divine timing, this is what we will be experiencing in our lives.<br />\n<br />\nKalpa means vow or promise, and should be the rule to be followed above any other. San refers to an association with the highest validity. Sankalpa is then a vow and a commitment we make as a cornerstone to support our highest truth.<br />\n<br />\nA sankalpa should respect and uphold the deeper meaning of our life and is a declaration you can call upon to reinforce your true beliefs and guide the choices you make through life.<br />\n<br />\nThe sankalpa should be a short and positive statement and commitment you make to yourself, and should be repeated three times, ensuring that you do so with feeling and commitment and thinking of higher power as your witness.<br />\n<br />\nSankalpa is not a mundane new year\u2019s resolution of the white man. Sankalpa is an intent when in a receptive state. Sankalpa is a short, positive statement or affirmation, mentally repeated whilst sinking into a deeply relaxed alpha mind state. It acts as a foundation in accomplishing the task or reaching the goal.<br />\n<br />\nA sankalpa mentally stated with conviction, faith, and determination used daily will grow very strong roots and will bloom willingly. Awareness is directed to a particular possibility that exists within, presenting a goal which, with repeated use, will gradually manifest.<br />\n<br />\nModern society trains the individual to ignore that the power of transformation lies within. There is always a tendency to blame external factors for unhappiness and difficulties.<br />\n<br />\nCAN NLP FOUNDERS EVEN UNDERSTAND WHAT IS WRITTEN IN THE POST BELOW ABOUT INNER WORKINGS OF THE MIND .<br />\n<br />\nIF YOGA IS THE SANCTUM SANCTORUM , &nbsp;NLP IS THE GUTTER FULL OF SHIT OUTSIDE THE TEMPLE<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br />RIGHT NOW I AM WAIST DEEP IN NLP SHIT. &nbsp; I AM NOT ENJOYING IT.</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/08/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_5.html</span><br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_18b+seedFqi3D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_18b+seedFqi3D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-88ehkfMuYII/WVOryGJf3cI/AAAAAAABUkw/wy27Sy2kSpkAADCqaau54NIxWmUP1HMygCLcBGAs/s1600/B742images.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"168\" data-original-width=\"300\" height=\"224\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-88ehkfMuYII/WVOryGJf3cI/AAAAAAABUkw/wy27Sy2kSpkAADCqaau54NIxWmUP1HMygCLcBGAs/s400/B742images.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Self deception is &nbsp;the reshaping of reality to suit one\u2019s inner\nneeds. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Projection is the\nattribution of one\u2019s unacceptable thoughts and feelings to others. &nbsp;Like distortion, projection necessarily\ninvolves repression as a first step, since unacceptable thoughts and feelings\nneed to be repudiated before they can be attributed to others. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Classic examples of\nprojection include the envious person who believes that everyone envies him,\nthe covetous person who lives in constant fear of being dispossessed, and the\nperson with fantasies of infidelity who suspects that his partner is cheating\non him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Intellectualization\nshould not be confused with rationalization, which is the use of feeble but\nseemingly plausible arguments either to justify something that is painful to\naccept (\u2018sour grapes\u2019) or to make it seem \u2018not so bad after all\u2019 (\u2018sweet\nlemons\u2019). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-dFeAKrHFsx0/WVOu4avSpnI/AAAAAAABUlA/t5-g4vn9Tg0EBaO69DOMFjmTflvrylfGwCLcBGAs/s1600/dSAownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"154\" data-original-width=\"327\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-dFeAKrHFsx0/WVOu4avSpnI/AAAAAAABUlA/t5-g4vn9Tg0EBaO69DOMFjmTflvrylfGwCLcBGAs/s640/dSAownload.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For instance, a person\nwho has been rejected by a love interest convinces himself that she rejected\nhim because she did not share in his ideal of happiness (sour grapes), and also\nthat her rejection is a blessing in disguise in that it has freed him to find a\nmore suitable partner (sweet lemons).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If a person is angry at\nhis boss, he may go home and kick the dog, or he may instead go out and play a nice\ngame with his friend . The first instance (kicking the dog) is an example of\ndisplacement, the redirection of uncomfortable feelings towards someone or\nsomething less important, which is an immature ego defense. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The second instance\n(playing a nice game ) is an example of sublimation, the channelling of\nuncomfortable feelings into socially condoned and often productive activities,\nwhich is a much more mature ego defense.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People in modern\nsocieties are more anxious than people in traditional or historical societies,\nno doubt because of the strong emphasis that modern societies place on the self\nas an independent and autonomous agent.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Highly stressed people in cities are\nvulnerable to the NLP bait of self deception<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-_3HoEEcKtKo/WVOuxDGcOfI/AAAAAAABUk8/Fqvk5Zc7S38739cOhWqnRAJgFenTpVKLQCLcBGAs/s1600/iB53mages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every body with a huge\nego LIES.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I am not talking about\ndeliberate, bold-faced white lying. &nbsp;&nbsp;No,\nthis type of dishonesty is far harder to detect and admit. &nbsp;&nbsp;It is the kind of lying that comes from not\nbeing psychologically strong enough to be honest with ourselves. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the biggest obstacle to living a\nfulfilling life.&nbsp; &nbsp;Indian Vedic philosophy has stripped this carpet\nbare.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We fool ourselves into\nbelieving things that are false and we refuse to believe things that are true.&nbsp; Peoplelie to themselves about everything from\nseemingly insignificant facts to massive life-altering realities. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today with FACEBOOK we\nall know how people lie.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the core, we deceive\nourselves because we don\u2019t have enough psychological strength to admit the\ntruth and deal with the consequences that will follow. Yet, understanding our\nself-deceptive nature is the most effective way to live a fulfilling life.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;For\nwhen we acknowledge who we really are, we have the opportunity to change.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The use of Facebook, promotes\nfalse presentation of the self, &nbsp;which is\nmost unhealthy based on false-self theories<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People often present\nthemselves in a manner which is inconsistent with who they really are and with\ntheir set of real beliefs and values..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The gap between the\nreal self and the ideal self is called incongruity and it &nbsp;leads to the creation of \u201cfalse self\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Delusions of grandeur\nis principally a subtype of delusional disorder that occurs in patients\nsuffering from a wide range of mental illnesses<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The students &nbsp;who are at the bottom of the school cerebral\nbarrel become lawyers and finally judges.&nbsp;\nWhen they become judges they think they are the salt nay bounty of the\nplanet. To put it bluntly the worst wingers finally consider themselves as the\nbest singers .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A delusion is a belief\nheld by an individual or group that is demonstrably false, patently untrue,\nimpossible, fanciful, or self-deceptive. A person with delusions, however,\noften has complete certainty and conviction about their delusory beliefs. They\nresist arguments and evidence that they are wrong.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The most written about\nof all delusions, paranoia, has been shown to follow various stages: general\nsuspiciousness; selective perception of others; hostility; paranoid\n\u201cillumination\u201d in which all things fall into place; and, finally, paradoxical\ndelusions of influence and persecution.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Delusions often totally preoccupy\npeople and cause them considerable distress because they do not doubt their\nbeliefs are correct. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; THIS IS NOT A VESTED \u201cNOBEL PRIZE \u201c<br />\n<br />\n1) NIKOLA TESLA<br />\n2) DIMITRI MENDELEYEEV<br />\n3) IE IRODOV<br />\n4) ARYABHATTA<br />\n5) SRINIVASAN RAMANUJAN<br />\n6) CHANAKYA<br />\n7) ADI SHANKARACHARYA<br />\n8) APOLLONIUS ( AN INDIAN SAGE \u2013WHO LEGACY WAS SHIFTED ON TO A COOKED UP JESUS IN 325 AD )<br />\n9) \"JOHN DOE\"<br />\n10) JULIAN ASSANGE<br />\n11) SWAMI CHINMAYANANDA<br />\n<br />\nCCC) DOWN THE SHIT HOLE----<br />\n<br />\n1) SUHEL SETH<br />\n2) PRITISH NANDI<br />\n3) DILIP CHERIAN<br />\n4) PRANNOY JAMES ROY<br />\n5) AROON PURIE<br />\n6) VINEET JAIN<br />\n7) SHEKHAR GUPTA<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">8) SAGARIKA GHOSE AND HUSBAND RAJDEEP SARDESAI</span></b><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NLP induced self\ndeception has been the trigger for extreme cruelty.&nbsp; Later when you realize you have been wrong,\nit creates pangs of regret and guilt.&nbsp;\nLooking back at life with regret is one of the toughest to get over\nbecause you cannot change your choices in the past, only your choices in the\npresent.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/YpEeSa6zBTE/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/YpEeSa6zBTE?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b>ONLY INTELLIGENT PEOPLE\nCAN FIGURE OUT THAT ALMOST ALL OF &nbsp;\u201c NLP REFRAMING \u201c IS AN SLIMY EXERCISE IN &nbsp;SELF DECEPTION.</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Everything that happens\nin nature is absolute. It\u2019s neither good nor bad, unless we give it meaning,\nunless we put a frame around it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6 from your perspective\ncan be 9 from the opposite side<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What is amrit for one\nperson can be poison for another. Stripped of all meaning and boiled down to\nitself, it's just a situation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Killing &nbsp;someone is inherently bad .&nbsp; But killing a black mamba who has come to\nbite you baby is a good thing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A soldier killing\nenemies while defending his country, is a brave man of honour.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Same way, a jawan shooting\ndown a Naxal with a bomb.&nbsp; The family of\nthe criminal will definitely see the shooting as bad,but for the cop this\nkilling was a good act in the service of society and he might even believe that\nhe deserves a medal.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The personal frame of\nreference we put around life situations determines to a great extent our\ninterpretations of these situations and hence our emotional states. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Something happens, we observe\nit, based on what we know we give meaning to it and then we either feel good or\nbad about it. How good we feel about it depends entirely on whether or not we\nsee any benefit in it. If we see a benefit, we feel good and if we don't or if\nsee a harm, we feel bad.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is the &nbsp;frame and not the situation that usually\nresults in our emotions, can we change our frame thereby causing a change in\nour emotions? Absolutely. This is the whole idea behind re-framing. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE HAVE PATHETIC\nCOLLEGIUM JUDGES WHO DO NOT UNDERSTAND THE \u201cPERIMETER OF CONTEXT\u201d OR EVEN THE CONCEPT\nOF \u201cNATURAL JUSTICE\u201d .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THEY THINK THE WINNER\nIN A BLOODY FIGHT IS A BAD MAN.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NEVER MIND THAT THIS\nWINNER HAD KILLED A BASTARD WHO TRIED TO RAPE HIS 12 YEAR OLD DAUGHTER\u2014 SEE ROTHSCHILD\nTAUGHT THIS JUDGE THAT &nbsp;JUSTICE &nbsp;MUST BE &nbsp;BLIND.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THESE COLLEGIUM JUDGES REGULARLY\nSAVE THE BLACK MAMBAS &nbsp;.&nbsp; WE KNOW WHO THEY ARE . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Naxal thinker Binayak\nSen was such a black mamba .&nbsp; The\ncollegium judges ordered that he must be released from jail to receive a\nRothschild award in USA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://leagueofindia.com/resource/binayak-sen-case-statement-prof-noam-chomsky-and-81-others\">http://leagueofindia.com/resource/binayak-sen-case-statement-prof-noam-chomsky-and-81-others</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Binayak_Sen\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Binayak_Sen</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The holy goal of\nre-framing is to view a seemingly negative situation in such a way that it\nbecomes positive.&nbsp; &nbsp;It involves changing your perception of an\nevent so that you can focus on the opportunity that it provides you with,\ninstead of the difficulty that it mires you in. &nbsp;This inevitably leads to a change in your\nemotions from negative to positive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you're facing tough\nwork conditions then instead of cursing your job you can see it as an\nopportunity to enhance your skills and problem-solving abilities or even gain\nhands on experience . You could also see it as an opportunity to develop\nresilience.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you failed in a test\nthen instead of calling yourself a failure you can see it as an opportunity to\ndo better next time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The whole 'positive\nthinking' phenomenon is nothing but re-framing. You teach yourself to see\nthings in a positive way so that you can get rid of the unwanted emotions. &nbsp;You are asked to BE IN THE MOMENT without\nstaring at the rear view mirror .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-eJ-u5WUXDhE/WVSx62NoOaI/AAAAAAABUmQ/yNx_Xh1LCU8W_nJ9MY-6EhCgyAjd2vxWwCLcBGAs/s1600/imag9es.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-eJ-u5WUXDhE/WVSx62NoOaI/AAAAAAABUmQ/yNx_Xh1LCU8W_nJ9MY-6EhCgyAjd2vxWwCLcBGAs/s1600/imag9es.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There\u2019s a fine line\nbetween re-framing and self-deception. &nbsp;&nbsp;NLP is all about self deception. Vedic\nphilosopy was lofty , it never had a negative bone in it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Re-framing is good as\nlong as it is done within reason.&nbsp; &nbsp;But outside of reason, it leads to\nself-deception. &nbsp;&nbsp;Many people are\ndesperate to think \u2018positively\u2019 and so they create a fantasy world of positive\nthinking and escape to it whenever life gives them a hard time.&nbsp; &nbsp;But\nwhen reality hits, it hits hard.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The human mind cannot\naccept re-framing that is not backed by reason for long. &nbsp;&nbsp;NLP gives bullshit reasons&nbsp; and lead you on self destructing paths. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Sooner or later it makes\nyou realize that you've been deceiving yourself with \u201cthem grapes are sour\nstuff \u201c. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">Most of the NLP gurus are from unhappy homes</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">as they took their NLP shit home with them.</span></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-lUq2TCE2cBI/WVSxkhsAkbI/AAAAAAABUmM/m6AexA_1vPo2XLVG1GQOfvl07nZMBIHsgCLcBGAs/s1600/iBBRmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-lUq2TCE2cBI/WVSxkhsAkbI/AAAAAAABUmM/m6AexA_1vPo2XLVG1GQOfvl07nZMBIHsgCLcBGAs/s400/iBBRmages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Neuro-Linguistic\nProgramming (NLP) was invented in the mid-70s by Richard Bandler (a psychology\nand philosophy graduate) and John Grinder (a linguist). It originally grew out of\nobservations made in therapy, and a metaphorical extension of some of the\nconcepts of Chomsky\u2019s transformational grammar. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Transformational\ngrammar (TG) is, the study of linguistics, part of the theory of generative\ngrammar, especially of naturally evolved languages, that considers grammar to\nbe a system of rules that generate exactly those combinations of words which\nform grammatical sentences in a given language.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Noam Chomsky developed\nthe BULLSHIT&nbsp; idea that each sentence in\na language has two levels of representation \u2014 a deep structure and a surface\nstructure. The deep structure represents the core semantic relations of a\nsentence, and is mapped onto the surface structure (which follows the\nphonological form of the sentence very closely) via transformations.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All this\nin a BULLSHIT language called English.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chomsky emphasized the\npriority of generative syntax over semantics in linguistics. When some of his former\nstudents proposed generative semantics, Chomsky denounced them with such\nvehemence that they couldn\u2019t get published in mainstream linguistics journals.&nbsp; Hey, &nbsp;\u201cSyntax without semantics is meaningless.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A sentence like\n\"They criticized the party on the beach\" is ambiguous.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The consituent \"on\nthe beach\" could relate to either \"the beach\" or\n\"criticized\", and thus two different parse trees (syntactic\ninterpretations) can describe this sentence. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The two semantic\ninterpreations corresponding to the trees would be:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">E.g. They criticized\nthe party, which took place on the beach.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">or <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They criticized the\nparty while walking on the beach.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While the first\ninterpretation stands out as more likely, one could imagine a context, where\nthe second interpretation is possible. This is why English is a BULLSHIT\nlanguage . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mantras language must&nbsp; have\u2014<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; More than 5000 years old<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Accurate expression<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Clear speech and perfect pronunciation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; No changes since it was first made<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Must have a meaning built into every word\nand hence must have immense vocabulary.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Must have precise golden ratio sound\nharmonics ( Fibonacci/ Sri Yantra )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">7)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Mathematical and geometrical precision<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">8)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Phonetic\u2014direct link between sound and\nsigns<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">9)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Script must be based on the spoken form<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">10)&nbsp; Cannot have spellings like English<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">11)&nbsp; Cannot have silent alphabets<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">12)&nbsp; Words must unfold from seed forms<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">13)&nbsp; Natural continuity is word making<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">14)&nbsp; Natural continuity in sentence making<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">15)&nbsp; Sound must have vibration<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">16)&nbsp; Sounds must have resonance\u2014 (this is just the\ntip of the iceberg )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">17)&nbsp; Alphabets must form in cymatics when uttered<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">18)&nbsp; Must not have proper nouns<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">19)&nbsp; Must be polite with no bad words in the&nbsp; un- abridged dictionary<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">20)&nbsp; Mantras in this language must be approved by\na gifted seer and the effect felt on his chakras<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only Sanskrit &nbsp;qualifies for all above.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CUNT NOAM CHOMSKY MUST\nLEARN SANSKRIT \u2013AND THEN BURN ALL HIS BULLSHIT BOOKS ON LINGUISTICS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><b>INSTEAD OF UNDERSTANDING IT\u2014&nbsp; BOTH WERE BUSY WRITING DOWN THE 14 LINE CODE\nAND THE DIAGRAM IN 3D HE DREW .</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b>NO TEAM BOSS IN AN IT COMPANY WANTS A JUNIOR\nROOKIE SMARTER THAN HIM IN AN OFFICE MEET<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;
