max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3265642792554725019\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_167M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/06/ethical-nlp-neuro-linguistic_28.html?showComment=1498821341893#c3265642792554725019\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 30, 2017 at 4:45 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_167MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOME OF MY SHORE PERSONNEL MANAGERS WERE VERY CANDID<br />\n<br />\nTHEY WOULD TELL ME-- \" AJIT, YOU MUST KNOW WHY YOUR SHORE TECHNICAL BOSSES LOVE YOU LIKE THE PLAGUE. THEY KNOW YOU ARE BETTER THAN ALL OF THEM COMBINED TOGETHER \"<br />\n<br />\nTO THIS I WOULD REPLY-- \" I KNOW !\"<br />\n<br />\nI joined a company where the top technical boss was an India marwari Jew RxxVxxSxI<br />\n<br />\nOne of my well wishers told me \" Dont argue with him on engineering matters -as he is considered as the BEST INDIAN ENGINEER . He like his employees to be humble \"<br />\n<br />\nI replied \" HUMILITY has never been my forte --and that too with ignorant CUNTS. However I promise this --I wont go to him, he will come to be for a HEAD ON fight-- and I will cut his EGO down to size forever\"<br />\n<br />\nI did NOT have to wait long for this confrontation -- between a intelligent / competent ship captain and a ego laden top honcho who thought he was ZE cat's whiskers\"<br />\n<br />\nThe ship was loading cargo at Richard's Bay ( Soth Africa )<br />\n<br />\nThe Fore Peak ballast tank valve spindle broke --with the tank full --and ship would go down by head<br />\n<br />\nBefore I made arrangements to pump out the water using a quickly made EDUCTOR -- I warned Chief Engineer--make sure machinery lub oil pressures are maintained--as most sumps have aft suction.<br />\n<br />\nWe were down by the head for about three hours at berth.<br />\n<br />\nWhile sailing out , the ship was in the narrow channel with pilot on board .<br />\n<br />\nI got a frantic call from Chief Engineer ( a senior engineer )--that main engine lub oil pressure is falling rapidly and that he is stopping engines<br />\n<br />\nI told him firmly --I DONT CARE IF THE ENGINES BREAK INTO A THOUSAND PIECES--YOU SHALL NOT STOP THE ENGINES. I AM REDUCING SPEED TO MINIMUM -- FOLLOW MY ORDERS<br />\n<br />\nThere was NO time to call tugs and tie up-- so i got the ship out of the breakwater , moved out of the entry channel and dropped anchor--with a 5 knot aghulas current flowing across<br />\n<br />\nJust after dropping the anchor I informed the agent and port control. I said \"We have a critical engine problem which must be solved before I move out \"<br />\n<br />\nTo cut a long story short-- we found a chinese make polyster shirt enveloping the main engine lub oil sump--it was removed and the problem was solved.<br />\n<br />\nAfter I got off this ship--I was doing a professional course in Mumbai --when the company personnel head in Mumbai called me / he said \" Ajit , big boss has flown in from Hong Kong--he wants to meet you \"<br />\n<br />\nThe top Honcho was sitting in an empty cabin and I knew he wanted no witnesses<br />\n<br />\nHe hisses at me \" Captain, you told the Richards Bay port control, that your engines had a critical problem. Why did you call this small problem CRITICAL-- the chief engineer agrees with me it was a small problem which was immediately resolved<br />\n<br />\nI hissed back -- furious --<br />\n<br />\nI can get so fuckin' furious that CUNTS shit in their pants<br />\n<br />\n\" DONT MAKE ME SAY ANYTHING . &nbsp; IS THERE A GREATER PROBLEM TO AN ENGINE THAN LOSS OF LUB OIL PRESSURE &nbsp; &nbsp;? CAN YOU START THE ENGINES ON EMERGENCY STATIONS DIRECT CONTROL ( FUEL/ AIR ) WITHOUT LUB OIL PRESSURE ?\"<br />\n<br />\nHis face became white-- I guess he was out of touch<br />\n<br />\nI got and and said \" Have you finished ? \"<br />\n<br />\nAs I passed the door I turned back and told him \" The Chief Engineer is still on board. Tell him that ship DIRECT EMERGENCY CONTROL MEANS --IT MUST BYPASS THE GOVERNOR. &nbsp; Right now it is via the woodward governor-- and then I told him how to bypass the governor \"<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">ANY MARINE ENGINEER WORTH HIS SALT WILL VOUCH-- THAT IT IS THE BHAGAWAD GITA OF ENGINEERING</span></b><br />\n<br />\nMy question bank today below is used all over the planet today-- written by a deck boy quack<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/12/marine-engineering-self-examiner-ships.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">IF I\nGIVE A SPEECH LIKE THIS ON MY SHIP, MY CREW WILL NOT WAIT FOR ME TO FINISH\u2014 &nbsp;THEY\nWILL THROW ME OVERBOARD</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/kb9espyQWOs/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/kb9espyQWOs?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In this speech, NLP trained JEW Obama\nessentially said \u201cas I stand before you tonight\u201d three separate times, around\nthe beginning, middle, and end of the speech to continue pacing the audience\nthroughout, as follows:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. That\u2019s why I stand\nhere tonight. Because for two hundred and thirty two years, at each moment when\nthat promise was in jeopardy, ordinary men and women - students and soldiers,\nfarmers and teachers, nurses and janitors \u2014 found the courage to keep it alive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. The fundamentals we\nuse to measure economic strength are whether we are living up to that\nfundamental promise that has made this country great - a promise that is the\nonly reason I am standing here tonight.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. But I stand before\nyou tonight because all across America something is stirring. What the\nnaysayers don\u2019t understand is that this election has never been about me. It\u2019s\nbeen about you.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NLP trained JEW Obama\nsays \u201cnow is the time\u201d six times throughout. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. Now is the time to\nend this addiction, and to understand that drilling is a stop-gap measure, not\na long-term solution. Not even close.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. Now is the time to\nfinally meet our moral obligation to provide every child a world-class\neducation, because it will take nothing less to compete in the global economy.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. Now is the time to\nfinally keep the promise of affordable, accessible health care for every single\nAmerican.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4. Now is the time to\nhelp families with paid sick days and better family leave, because nobody in\nAmerica should have to choose between keeping their jobs and caring for a sick\nchild or ailing parent.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5. Now is the time to\nchange our bankruptcy laws, so that your pensions are protected ahead of CEO\nbonuses; and the time to protect Social Security for future generations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6. And now is the time\nto keep the promise of equal pay for an equal day\u2019s work, because I want my\ndaughters to have exactly the same opportunities as your sons.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">HULLO OBAMA--</span></b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">NOW IS THE TIME TO TELL THE PEOPLE THAT YOUR MOTHER WAS A WHITE JEWESS ANN DUNHAM&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/donald-trump-for-president-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/donald-trump-for-president-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Obama \u201cthis moment\u201d five times, serving NLP pacing purpose.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. We meet at one of\nthose defining moments - a moment when our nation is at war, our economy is in\nturmoil, and the American promise has been threatened once more.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. This moment - this\nelection - is our chance to keep, in the 21st century, the American promise\nalive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. You have shown what\nhistory teaches us - that at defining moments like this one, the change we<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">need doesn\u2019t come from\nWashington.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4. America, this is one\nof those moments.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5. At this moment, in\nthis election, we must pledge once more to march into the future<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Obama\u2019s entire NLP campaign,\nessentially, can be summarized as:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. The economy is bad,\nor the country is going in the wrong direction (pace) or we need to get aneducation\nfor every child (whatever statements no one can disagree with (pace) and\ntherefore creates a \u201cyes-yes-yes\u201d response, or \u201cyes room.\u201d)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. Change (can be used\nas a pace, an anchor, and/or a preprogrammed response)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. And or because or\nthat is why (conjunction linking statement)</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4. I will be your next\nPresident. (subconscious lead)</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/hqPc9btW1rM/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/hqPc9btW1rM?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Obama uses phrases that\nare subconscious pacing statements because they are immediately and verifiably\ntrue by their most simplistic terms, and cause the subconscious to accept the\nNLP cunt as a source for such absolute truth.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/9ZjtS7h6huY/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/9ZjtS7h6huY?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Notice how for each\ninstance without exception, &nbsp;Obama has\nwords before or after \u201cmoment\u201d to make it absolutely immediately and verifiably\ntrue, such as \u201cwe meet at\u201d, or \u201cthis election\u201d, moments \u201clike this one\u201d, or\n\u201cthis is one of those moments.\u201d &nbsp;&nbsp;This is\ncarefully crafted hidden NLP pacing.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/260w0wCgcc4/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/260w0wCgcc4?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Obama uses a variety of\nother statements nobody can disagree with as pacing statements. More simplistic\nare statements like \u201cwe need change\u201d,&nbsp;&nbsp;\n\u201cWe are the hope of our future,\u201d and \u201cYes we can.\u201d&nbsp;&nbsp; They are logically meaningless but they hit\na chord, a subconscious chord, especially in younger people.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/h4aB6vvVliE/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/h4aB6vvVliE?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The communications we\nare aware of are called the \u201csurface structure\u201d \u2013 that is what the subject\nhears and realizes. The science of hypnosis requires understanding the \u201cdeep\nstructure\u201d of what the subject sees, hears, and experiences \u2013 the communication\nthat is designed for our subconscious to receive. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our brains delete,\nchange, distort, and jumble content on its way to the subconscious mind.\nHypnotists speak in a manner to put us into trance, and then intentionally send\n\u201cdeep structure\u201d communications designed for only our subconscious minds\nwithout conscious awareness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indirect suggestion is\na pivotal part of conversational hypnosis.&nbsp;\nObama has used as part of pacing, statements such as \u201cwe rise OR fall as\none nation.\u201d That sounds powerful and true. In fact it is something no one can\nargue with, as all pacing is. But why the \u201cor fall\u201d part if he is trying to be\noptimistic&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is not just that the\nnation rises and falls, but as we breathe, our chest \u201crises and falls\" We\nare not aware of it consciously, but with this statement we are being\nsubconsciously paced by Obama\u2019s words. Thus, without even realizing it, Obama\nelicits a subconscious response - us subconsciously increasingly seeing Obama\nas a source of acceptable absolute truth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For \u201cchange we can\nbelieve in\u201d \u2013 the word \u201cbelieve\u201d is key \u2013 it is one of the most powerful words\nin hypnosis, and a word anchored continually by Obama\u2019s apparently innocent\nhand gestures. He sprinkles speeches with \u201cwe\u201d and \u201cyou\u201d \u2013 \u201cYes we can\u201d and\n\u201cyou have done what the cynics said we couldn\u2019t do\u201d \u2013 as if he were as much\nguiding a movement as running for president. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Obama rarely if ever\nasks for our vote in his speeches.&nbsp; After\nrepeated and continual pacing an entire audience of millions with statements\nthat are undoubtedly true that lower our critical factors\u2019 defenses, Obama just\nslips in the hypnotic command (the lead) e.g. \u2026\u201cand that is why I will be your\nnext President.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The hyper-confidence\nObama uses, after having used multiple language patterns to lower rational\ndefenses, is because he must speak in a way that your subconscious mind will\nhave no reason to doubt. This does not raise suspicion because politicians\ngenerally have to sound over-confident, e.g. saying they will win. The reason\nObama sounds so hyper-confident with certain language patterns is because he\nhas to in order to input a command effectively so your subconscious takes it as\nabsolute truth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ericksonian \u201clinking statements\u201d\nmimic the way the brain accepts information.&nbsp;&nbsp;\n\u201cWe need change\u2026and\u2026that is why I will be your next President.\u201d is a\nbasic pace and lead. No person can disagree with \u201cwe need change.\u201d Change is\ninevitable anyway, certainly when problems exist. However, the fact that change\nwill happen, or that we need change, has absolutely nothing to do with being a\nvalid reason why the choice for President should be none other than Barack\nObama.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The people walk away\nbelieving we need change, therefore we need Obama. It doesn\u2019t matter whether\nthe cause and effect linking statement has any truth or logical connection to\nit. It works because it links statements the subject knows subconsciously to be\ntrue, with statements from the hypnotist, that the hypnotist tricks the\nsubconscious mind to believe are connected, and thus also absolutely true at\nthe subconscious level.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Obama says he is the\nperson with judgment, and he says he is the person to solve our problems\nbecause he recognizes what is wrong, but these are logically empty arguments.\nHis arguments based on his \u201cability to see\u201d what is wrong provides no real\nlogical basis. His point is no more advanced nor specific than the average\nlistener\u2019s viewpoint. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He opposed the war in\nIraq in 2003, but so did half the world, logically, making Obama no more\nqualified than half the planet to be President. However, because he uses pacing\nand leading so effectively, he says, \u201cbecause we need change, that is why I\nwant to be your next President\u201d - it is absorbed into the subconscious as\nabsolute truth. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fact that this\nargument has no logic is irrelevant to such feelings. Similarly, just because\nObama powerfully says \u201cits time for new energy and new ideas\u201d doesn\u2019t mean he\nactually has any new ideas, but through his hypnotic techniques, that\u2019s what\npeople walk away feeling.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Obama\u2019s speeches as one\nbig hypnotic trance induction using extra slow speech, rhythm, tonalities,\nvagueness, visual imagery, metaphor, and raising of emotion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Everyone knows the\nsensation of hanging on Obama\u2019s every word as he speaks. It is no accident. In\nfact, Obama intends to speak in such a way that it is almost impossible to\nlisten at all without hanging on his every word. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His unnaturally slow,\nrhythmical, four to eight word phrases with huge pauses after, are delivered to\nbe complete ideas by themselves on some level, even though only part of a\nsentence or complete thought. He is sensitive to exactly how to speak to fixate\nyour attention based on his understanding of hypnosis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Obama takes people on\nwith his powerful metaphors, and captivating visual images and sensations, and\npassionate emotion as his speeches accelerate from unnaturally slow, into\nfireworks. &nbsp;His main audience is mostly na\u00efve\nblacks. &nbsp;One bumpkin cheers and everybody\nfollows suit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4748555098650161193\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_71M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/06/ethical-nlp-neuro-linguistic_24.html?showComment=1498508697268#c2408201449342269540\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 27, 2017 at 1:54 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_224MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">GOD HAS PROVIDED A \"BLOOD BRAIN BARRIER\"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">WOOD SMOKE CANNOT INVADE THIS CRITICAL BARRIER</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">More than 100 years ago it was discovered that if blue dye was injected into the bloodstream of a HUMAN or an animal, that tissues of the whole body EXCEPT the brain and spinal cord would turn blue.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Endothelial tissue has small spaces between each individual cell so substances can move readily between the inside and the outside of the vessel. However, in the brain, the endothelial cells fit tightly together and substances cannot pass out of the bloodstream.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The BBB has several important functions:</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Protects the brain from \"foreign substances\" in the blood that may injure the brain.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Protects the brain from hormones and neurotransmitters in the rest of the body.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Maintains a constant environment for the brain.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The brain is precious, and evolution has gone to great lengths to protect it from damage.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Whereas the skull, meninges and cerebrospinal fluid protect against physical damage, the blood\u2013brain barrier provides a defence against foreign particles, disease-causing pathogens and toxins that may be present in our blood.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">6200 year old Ayurveda wrote about this barrier. Maharishis and Ayurveda physicians could temporarily open the BBB by chanting the harmonics of OM and then close it immediately. &nbsp; My revelations now jump to </span><b><span style=\"color: red;\">50.3%</span></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The purpose of the blood\u2013brain barrier is to protect against circulating toxins or pathogens that could cause brain infections, while at the same time allowing vital nutrients to reach the brain.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The West found it only 55 years ago.</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; I would love to hear from you on Jainism and how the two Dharmas stack up. Jainsim also had a strong oral tradition and Jain cosmology is also got time lines which are very old and long. I guess initially there must have been only Dharma and probably no names. We believe for instance that Shiva is an import into Hinduism much later and it is Lord Adinatha or Rishabdeva. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hypnosis \u2013 or trance \u2013\nis just a natural state of focused attention, one in which you become\nen-tranced, where your main focus is on your internal thoughts and feelings\nrather than the external world around you.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NLP views hypnosis and everyday\ntrance as a effective route to your unconscious (which in this context means\nother than conscious). Your unconscious signifies the thoughts, feelings, and\nexperiences of which you\u2019re currently unaware.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Erickson said that his\npatients were having problems because they were out of rapport with their\nunconscious minds, suggesting that good mental health involves a rapport\nbetween the conscious and unconscious minds.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;In this altered or dream-like state, the mind\nis relaxed. When the unconscious mind becomes more available, the therapist\nhelps a client make changes.&nbsp; The truth\nis that hypnosis works only if you\u2019re a willing participant in the process.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Remember that only you have\nthe power to control your thoughts, actions, and words.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Girls, take the same safety\nmeasures that you\u2019d use when going on a blind date. In particular, be cautious\nof entering a private home or space where you\u2019re alone with the person. If in\ndoubt, taking a friend with you is a wise move.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NLP methods push people\ninto self deception.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To really delve into\nchallenging your own self-deceptions is a tough and challenging task, and one\nthat may be quite uncomfortable at times.&nbsp;\nHowever, ultimately you are far closer to peace of mind, and self\nacceptance.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rather than clinging to\nfalse notions and lies with a frightened grip, you can really just relax in the\nknowledge that you are who you are, and thats ok.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-bB-m3RfhYnU/WVOWkUg8ULI/AAAAAAABUj4/dnDCFsDn0nwVpvvcJC-Ml9qhuWC_wvVjgCLcBGAs/s1600/imS2ages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"223\" data-original-width=\"226\" height=\"394\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-bB-m3RfhYnU/WVOWkUg8ULI/AAAAAAABUj4/dnDCFsDn0nwVpvvcJC-Ml9qhuWC_wvVjgCLcBGAs/s400/imS2ages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Try this-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ask your wellwishers\nfor feedback about yourself. \u201cIf there was one thing about me you\u2019d change,\nwhat would it be?\u201d&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Be careful here,\nbecause the point of the exercise isn\u2019t to feel like a piece of shit, it is to\nrecognise things about yourself that you may have previously been denying. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I repeat the world well\nwishers. &nbsp;&nbsp;Sometimes your own wife will tell you a lie so\nthat she can enjoy at your expense.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Don\u2019t allow the\nopportunity to get taken advantage of by people who are willing to make you\nfeel bad as a way to make themselves feel more powerful- this happens at the\nworkplace<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-SsgfjwjOG5I/WVOXazyASII/AAAAAAABUkA/1J887vggpXsvprJyHjVal7F4A57M5UjSACLcBGAs/s1600/imaCEges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"258\" data-original-width=\"195\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-SsgfjwjOG5I/WVOXazyASII/AAAAAAABUkA/1J887vggpXsvprJyHjVal7F4A57M5UjSACLcBGAs/s400/imaCEges.jpg\" width=\"302\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>THIS POST IS NOW CONTINUED TO PART 14, BELOW--</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/06/ethical-nlp-neuro-linguistic_28.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/06/ethical-nlp-neuro-linguistic_28.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-jMwGT-tBmk0/WVJo3I4o32I/AAAAAAABUjM/1YkWLsOG_2A1Be1XbkC_w95BFTQyDbslgCLcBGAs/s1600/D.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"896\" data-original-width=\"419\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-jMwGT-tBmk0/WVJo3I4o32I/AAAAAAABUjM/1YkWLsOG_2A1Be1XbkC_w95BFTQyDbslgCLcBGAs/s1600/D.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n..</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "236", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/7945606795465691389/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "2108300513268206590", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2017-06-24T07:28:00+05:30", "updated": "2017-06-26T19:39:47+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNDk4NDg2MTg3MTQwCm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/06/ethical-nlp-neuro-linguistic_24.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/2108300513268206590", "title": "Ethical NLP, Neuro-Linguistic Programming sans covert manipulation and predatory deception, Part 12 - Capt Ajit Vadakayil", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS POST IS CONTINUED FROM PART 11, BELOW---</span></b><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/06/ethical-nlp-neuro-linguistic_20.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/06/ethical-nlp-neuro-linguistic_20.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-size: large;\">NLP uses DELIBERATELY vague\nconversations to con you..</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Humans have an amazing\ncapacity to make sense of what people say \u2013 even when it\u2019s utter\ngobbledygook.&nbsp;&nbsp; Sometimes, being artfully\nvague is valuable \u2013 when you\u2019re non-specific in the content of what you say you\nenable other people to fill the gaps for themselves.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\">When your language\nconstruction is deliberately vague, people can take what they need from your\nwords in a way that\u2019s most appropriate for them.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Milton Model is a\nset of language patterns that you can use to take somebody into a trance state,\nan altered state of consciousness, in which they can access unconscious\nresources, make changes, and solve their own problems. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Milton Model is\nnamed after Milton H Erickson, a conman, one of the most influential of all\nhypnotherapists.&nbsp; Milton H Erickson pretended\nto be a healer.&nbsp; He would often make\nyoung attractive women strip naked.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Milton Hyland Erickson specialized\nin medical hypnosis and family therapy. &nbsp;&nbsp;He was founding president of the American\nSociety for Clinical Hypnosis and a fellow of the American Psychiatric\nAssociation, the American Psychological Association, and the American\nPsychopathological Association.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He is noted for his approach to the unconscious\nmind as creative and solution-generating. He is also noted for influencing\nbrief therapy, strategic family therapy, family systems therapy, solution\nfocused brief therapy, and of course NLP deception.. He developed an extensive\nuse of therapeutic metaphor and story as well as hypnosis and coined the term\nbrief therapy for his method of addressing therapeutic change in relatively few\nsessions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Erickson was a poor\nfarmer\u2019s son with NO basic education. He rose because of his glib tongue and\nstreet smartness. He was a late developer and was both dyslexic and color\nblind- a poor specimen of the human race.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Erickson did bullshit brief\ntherapy . It was touted as highly strategic, exploratory, and solution-based\nrather than problem-oriented. It is less concerned with how a problem arose\nthan with the current factors sustaining it and preventing change.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brief therapy\ndoes not adhere to one \"correct\" approach, but rather accept that\nthere being many paths, any of which may or may not in combination turn out to\nbe ultimately beneficial.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Conman Richard Bandler,\nthe co-founder of NLP, took up Ericksons\u2019s&nbsp;\nbrief therapy like a duck to water. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bandler&nbsp; wrote:---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"It's easier to\ncure a phobia in ten minutes than in five years... I didn't realize that the\nspeed with which you do things makes them last... I taught people the phobia\ncure. They'd do part of it one week, part of it the next, and part of it the\nweek after. Then they'd come to me and say \"It doesn't work!\" If,\nhowever, you do it in five minutes, and repeat it till it happens very fast,\nthe brain understands. That's part of how the brain learns... I discovered that\nthe human mind does not learn slowly. It learns quickly. I didn't know that.\n\"&nbsp; BALLS&nbsp; !!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Where classical\nhypnosis is authoritative and direct and often encounters resistance in the\nsubject, Erickson's approach was permissive, accommodating and indirect\u2014in a\nslimy manner .&nbsp;&nbsp; For example, where a\nclassical hypnotist might say \"You are going into a trance\", an\nEricksonian hypnotist would be more likely to say \"you can comfortably\nlearn how to go into a trance\". In this way, he provides an opportunity\nfor the subject to accept the suggestions they are most comfortable with, at\ntheir own pace, and with an awareness of the benefits. <span style=\"background-color: white;\">BALLS !</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The subject knows they\nare not being hustled and takes full ownership of, and participates in, their\ntransformation.&nbsp; Because the induction\ntakes place during the course of a normal conversation, Ericksonian hypnosis is\noften known as Covert or Conversational Hypnosis. <span style=\"background-color: white;\">SLIME AT ITS BEST !</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Conman Erickson\nmaintained that it was not possible consciously to instruct the unconscious\nmind, and that authoritarian suggestions were likely to be met with resistance.\nThe unconscious mind responds to openings, opportunities, metaphors, symbols,\nand contradictions.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Effective hypnotic suggestion, then, should be\n\"artfully vague\", leaving space for the subject to fill in the gaps\nwith their own unconscious understandings - even if they do not consciously\ngrasp what is happening. The skilled hypnotherapist constructs these gaps of\nmeaning in a way most suited to the individual subject - in a way which is most\nlikely to produce the desired change.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For example, the\nauthoritative \"You will stop smoking\" is likely to find less leverage\non the unconscious level than \"You can become a non-smoker\". The\nfirst is a direct command, to be obeyed or ignored (and notice that it draws\nattention to the act of smoking); the second is an opening, an invitation to\npossible lasting change, without pressure, and is less likely to raise\nresistance. <span style=\"background-color: white;\">BALLS !</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Richard Bandler and\nJohn Grinder identified this kind of \"artful vagueness\" as a central\ncharacteristic of their 'Milton Model', a systematic attempt to codify\nErickson's hypnotic language patterns. <span style=\"background-color: white;\">WE CALL THIS DECEPTION!</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A confused person has\ntheir conscious mind busy and occupied, and is very much inclined to draw upon\nunconscious learnings to make sense of things. A confused person is in a trance\nof their own making - and therefore goes readily into that trance without\nresistance. Confusion might be created by ambiguous words, complex or endless\nsentences, pattern interruption or a myriad of other techniques to incite\ntransderivational searches. <span style=\"background-color: white;\">HEY , NO WONDER THESE SLIMY BASTARDS ARE TOTAL FAILURES\nAT HOME</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Among Erickson's\nbest-known innovations is the hypnotic handshake induction, which is a type of\nconfusion technique. The induction is done by the hypnotist going to shake\nhands with the subject, then interrupting the flow of the handshake in some\nway, such as by grabbing the subject's wrist instead.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;If the handshake\ncontinues to develop in a way which is out-of-keeping with expectations, a\nsimple, non-verbal trance is created, which may then be reinforced or utilized\nby the hypnotist. All these responses happen naturally and automatically\nwithout telling the subject to consciously focus on an idea.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The various\ndescriptions of Erickson's hypnotic handshake, including his own very detailed\naccounts, indicate that a certain amount of improvisation is involved, and that\nwatching and acting upon the subject's responses is the key to a successful\noutcome. <span style=\"background-color: white;\">ANY STREET MAGICIAN CAN DO THIS</span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/VK8a_QLiRQE/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/VK8a_QLiRQE?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Erickson described the\nroutine as follows:---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Initiation: When I\nbegin by shaking hands, I do so normally. The \"hypnotic touch\" then\nbegins when I let loose. The letting loose becomes transformed from a firm grip\ninto a gentle touch by the thumb, a lingering drawing away of the little\nfinger, a faint brushing of the subject's hand with the middle finger - just\nenough vague sensation to attract the attention. As the subject gives attention\nto the touch of your thumb, you shift to a touch with your little finger. As\nyour subject's attention follows that, you shift to a touch with your middle\nfinger and then again to the thumb.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This arousal of\nattention is merely an arousal without constituting a stimulus for a response.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The subject's\nwithdrawal from the handshake is arrested by this attention arousal, which\nestablishes a waiting set, and expectancy.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then almost, but not\nquite simultaneously (to ensure separate neural recognition), you touch the\nundersurface of the hand (wrist) so gently that it barely suggests an upward\npush. This is followed by a similar utterly slight downward touch, and then I\nsever contact so gently that the subject does not know exactly when - and the\nsubject's hand is left going neither up nor down, but cataleptic.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Termination: If you\ndon't want your subject to know what you are doing, you simply distract their\nattention, usually by some appropriate remark, and casually terminate.\nSometimes they remark, \"What did you say? I got absentminded there for a\nmoment and wasn't paying attention to anything.\" This is slightly\ndistressing to the subjects and indicative of the fact that their attention was\nso focused and fixated on the peculiar hand stimuli that they were momentarily\nentranced so they did not hear what was said.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Utilisation: Any\nutilisation leads to increasing trance depth. All utilisation should proceed as\na continuation of extension of the initial procedure. Much can be done\nnonverbally; for example, if any subjects are just looking blankly at me, I may\nslowly shift my gaze downward, causing them to look at their hand, which I\ntouch and say \"look at this spot.\". This intensifies the trance\nstate. Then, whether the subjects are looking at you or at their hand or just\nstaring blankly, you can use your left hand to touch their elevated right hand\nfrom above or the side - so long as you merely give the suggestion of downward\nmovement. Occasionally a downward nudge or push is required. If a strong push\nor nudge is required, check for anaesthesia.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Richard Bandler was a\nkeen proponent of the handshake induction, and developed his own SLIMY variant,\nwhich is commonly taught in NLP workshops.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Any habitual pattern\nwhich is interrupted unexpectedly will cause sudden and light trance. The\nhandshake is a particularly good pattern to interrupt because the formality of\na handshake is a widely understood set of social rules. Since everyone knows\nthat it would be impolite to comment on the quality of a handshake, regardless\nof how strange it may be, the subject is obliged to embark on an inner search\n(known as a transderivational search, a universal and compelling type of\ntrance) to identify the meaning or purpose of the subverted pattern.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Erickson, as a\npsychiatrist ABUSED his patients by tying them up in straitjackets.. This was Erickson's\nauthoritarian approach as \"prison-camp therapy\" and\n\"therapist-as-boss\".&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Erickson was modeled\n(Milton model) by Richard Bandler and John Grinder, the co-founders of\nNeuro-linguistic programming (NLP).</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It\u2019s possible to get\ncertified in NLP in 4 days or sooner, which is patently ridiculous. Nobody with\n4 days experience should be attempting to coach or offer intervention processes\nPERIOD.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: red; font-size: large;\">These NLP bastards damage the human psyche irreversibly</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/lQAI1EFg2b4/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/lQAI1EFg2b4?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; Why does Sadguru Jaggi Vasudev ( who thinks karma does not catch up behind closed doors ) need to dress like Osho ? &nbsp;Why does he need to speak English with a gora accent ? &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; UNLESS YOU KNOW SPEED READING A SINGLE MORTAL CANT DO THIS&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2823814934027922146\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_62M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://draft.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt.
