text-decoration-line: none;\">June 24, 2017 at 1:23 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_62MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nI NOW DUMP <span style=\"color: red;\"><b>BANDLER AND GRINDER</b></span> ( NLP FOUNDERS ) WITH ALL THEIR BULLSHIT THEORIES INTO MY GARBAGE BUCKET&nbsp;.<br />\n<br />\nAAA ) HERE IS THE LIST OF MAHA MERUS WHO FOOLED THE WORLD , WHOM I HAVE TRASHED INTO THE GARBAGE BIN OF THE PLANET.<br />\n<br />\nGARBAGE BUCKET LIST:<br />\n<br />\n1) BERTRAND RUSSEL<br />\n2) ROMILA THAPAR<br />\n3) IRFAN HABIB<br />\n4) NOAM CHOMSKY<br />\n5) RAMCHANDRA GUHA<br />\n6) SHELDON POLLOCK<br />\n7) SIGMUND FREUD<br />\n8) GEORG WILHELM HEGEL<br />\n9) AMARTYA SEN<br />\n10) WENDY DONIGER<br />\n11) FREIDRICH WILHELM NIETZSCHE<br />\n12) IMMANUEL KANT<br />\n13 ) BARUCH SPINOZA<br />\n14) ALBERT EINSTEIN<br />\n15) ISAAC NEWTON<br />\n16) GUGLEILMO MARCONI<br />\n17) CHARLES DARWIN<br />\n18) KARL MARX<br />\n19) MAX WEBER<br />\n20) THOMAS ALVA EDISON<br />\n21) FIBONACCI<br />\n22) BARKHA DUTT<br />\n23) ADMIRAL LN RAMDAS , WIFE LALITA AND DAUGHTER KAVITA.<br />\n24) EDWARD BERNAYS<br />\n25) JOHN DEWEY<br />\n26) GEORGE IVANOVICH GURDJEIFF<br />\n27) PETER D OUPENSKY<br />\n28) OPRAH WINFREY<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">29) RICHARD BANDLER AND JOHN GRINDER</span></b><br />\n30) CHRISTIANE AMANPOUR<br />\n31) STEPHEN HAWKING<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nNOTE: MENTAL MIDGETS LIKE ROMILA THAPAR , IRFAN HABIB , RAMACHANDRA GUHA, SHELDON POLLOCK, WENDY DONIGER , BARKHA DUTT , RAMDAS FAMILY MUST BE THANKFUL THAT THEY ARE INCLUDED AMONG A LIST OF CEREBRAL GIANTS<br />\n<br />\n#########################<br />\n<br />\nBBB ) HERE ARE PEOPLE WHO MADE A DENT IN THE UNIVERSE\u2014 THEY GET THE \"VADAKAYIL PRIZE\". THIS IS NOT A VESTED \u201cNOBEL PRIZE \u201c<br />\n<br />\n1) NIKOLA TESLA<br />\n2) DIMITRI MENDELEYEEV<br />\n3) IE IRODOV<br />\n4) ARYABHATTA<br />\n5) SRINIVASAN RAMANUJAN<br />\n6) CHANAKYA<br />\n7) ADI SHANKARACHARYA<br />\n8) APOLLONIUS ( AN INDIAN SAGE \u2013WHO LEGACY WAS SHIFTED ON TO A COOKED UP JESUS IN 325 AD )<br />\n9) \"JOHN DOE\"<br />\n10) JULIAN ASSANGE<br />\n11) SWAMI CHINMAYANANDA<br />\n<br />\nCCC) DOWN THE SHIT HOLE----<br />\n<br />\n1) SUHEL SETH<br />\n2) PRITISH NANDI<br />\n3) DILIP CHERIAN<br />\n4) PRANNOY JAMES ROY<br />\n5) AROON PURIE<br />\n6) VINEET JAIN<br />\n7) SHEKHAR GUPTA<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A limiting decision is\none that you made in the past when, for some reason, you decided that you were\nunable to do something, because you were too stupid, unfit, poor, or any number\nof other reasons. For example, you may have said: \u2018I can never be slim\u2019 os.\u2019\nThe limiting decision limits your potential, interfering with your success.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This exercise\nintroduces you to a process that helps you to remove the negative emotions you\nmay be holding on to, such as being prone to inappropriate feelings of anger.\nPlease remember to keep an open mind to the answers that your unconscious mind\npresents:---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. Find yourself\nsomewhere safe and quiet to relax, and think of a mildly negative emotion you &nbsp;experienced in the past.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. Check with yourself\nthat learning from the event and releasing the emotion is okay. When you relax,\nask your unconscious mind, \u2018Is it okay for me to let go of this anger?\u2019<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. Ask your unconscious\nmind, \u2018What\u2019s the root cause of this problem, which when I\u2019m disconnected from\nit, is going to cause the problem to disappear? Was it before, during, or after\nmy birth?\u2019<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;When you ask your unconscious mind whether the\nroot cause was before, during, or after your birth, please keep an open mind\nabout the answer you receive. Your unconscious mind absorbs a lot of\ninformation and makes a lot of decisions without your conscious awareness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4. When you obtain the\nroot cause, float way above your time line so that you can see your past and\nyour future stretching below you.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5. Still above your\ntime line, float back along it until you\u2019re above the SEE (location 2 in Figure\n). Take on-board what you saw, felt, and heard.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6. Ask your unconscious\nmind to learn what it needs to from the event in order for it to let go of the\nnegative emotions easily and quickly.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">7. Float to location 3\nin Figure , which is above and 15 minutes before the SEE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">8. As you float above\nyour time line at location 3, turn and face the present so you can see the root\ncause in front of you and below you.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">9. Give yourself\npermission to let go of all the negative emotions associated with the event and\nnotice where the negative emotions, if any, are now.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Have all the other negative emotions\nassociated with the event also disappeared?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">10. If other negative\nemotions remain, use each \u2018out\u2019 breath to release all the emotions that are\nassociated with the SEE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">11. Stay at location 3\nuntil you feel, or know, that all the negative emotions have dissipated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">12. When you\u2019re ready,\nand by that we mean when you feel you have released the negative emotions,\nfloat back to location 1.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Go only as fast as your unconscious mind can\nlearn from similar events and let go of all the associated emotions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">13. Come back down into\nthe room.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">14. Just test \u2013 go into\nthe future to when an event would have triggered the emotions you let go, and\nnotice that the emotions have gone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;If you don\u2019t get the results you hoped for,\nyou may need to ask your unconscious mind to present you with the reason why\nyou haven\u2019t let go of the emotions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The best time for this\nis when you\u2019re dropping off to sleep, are deeply relaxed, or meditating. If you\ndon\u2019t get an answer that you understand, you may need to work with a coach or\ntherapist to clear issues from your past that are stopping you from getting the\nresults you want.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;This exercise can also be used for getting rid\nof a limiting decision. For example, you may have decided to stay poor or\nunhealthy, or made some other self-defeating decision such as \u2018I can never be\ntruly successful.\u2019 Follow the above process, using the limiting decision in\nplace of the negative&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">emotions.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>BULLSHIT !<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_24M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://draft.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. font-size: large;\"><b>IT TOOK A CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL TO DECLARE THAT INDIAN NUCLEAR BRAIN HOMI BHABHA WAS MISSILED OUT OF THE SKY</b></span><br />\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/11/homi-bhabha-in-air-india-flight-ai-101.html</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nOUR CRYOGENIC ROCKET ENGINE WAS SET BACK BY DECADES , BECAUSE WE FELL FOR THE OLDEST TRICK IN THE BOOK</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/09/isro-spy-case-s-nambinarayanan.html</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">ALSO PROFILE OUR COLLEGIUM JUDGES \u2013AND RATE THEIR DESH BHAKTI<br /><br />DO NOT GIVE CIVILIAN CASES LIKE THAT OF BRILLIANT ISRO SCIENTIST NAMBINARAYANAN TO SUSPECT JUDGES</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H_Al095Nm14</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nINDIA MUST INVEST ( 6 BILLION USD ) IN A FAB LAB TO MAKE CHIPS.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\ncapt ajit vadakayil</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n..</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Travelling in Time to\nImprove Your Life ---<span style=\"background-color: white;\"> shit &nbsp;NLP method-</span>-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Imagine what you\u2019d see,\nhear, and feel when the event causing you anxiety is over and has been successful.\nThen, when you travel forward above your time line to beyond the successful\nconclusion of the event, you find that the anxiety no longer exists. Using\nFigure as a reference, follow these steps:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. Find yourself\nsomewhere safe and quiet to relax, and think of an event about which you\u2019re\nfeeling anxious; check with your unconscious mind that letting go of the\nanxiety is okay.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. Now float way above\nyour time line so that you can see your past and your future stretching below\nyou.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. Still above your\ntime line, float forward along it until you\u2019re above the event that\u2019s making\nyou anxious.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4. Ask your unconscious\nmind to learn what it needs to from the event in order for it to let go of the\nanxiety easily and quickly.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5. When you have the\nnecessary information, float farther into the future, along your time line\nuntil you\u2019re 15 minutes after the successful conclusion of the event about\nwhich you were feeling anxious.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6. Turn and look\ntowards it now and notice that you\u2019re calm and no longer anxious.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;In the unlikely event that some anxiety\nremains, relax deeply and allow your unconscious mind to present you with the\nreason why you haven\u2019t let go of the anxiety. It may be that you need some\nskills to boost your confidence. If you have a history of not being your best \u2013\nat least in your opinion \u2013 at similar past events, go back along your time line\nto uncover negative emotions or limiting decisions before doing the exercise\nagain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">7. When you\u2019re ready,\nfloat back to your present.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">8. Just test \u2013 go into\nthe future to the event and confirm that the anxiety no longer exists.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b> BALLS !!</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Creating a better\nfuture\u2014 shit NLP fuckin\u2019 method--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you know how to\ntravel your time line, imagine taking some irresistible, compelling goals and\nputting them into your future, and how great that would be:---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. Find somewhere safe\nand quiet to relax and design your goal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;2. Float way above your time line so that you\ncan see your past and your future stretching below you.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. Still above your\ntime line, float forward along your time line until you\u2019re over the time by\nwhich you want to have achieved your goal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4. Turn and look back\nto now and allow all the events along your time line to align so that they\nsupport your goal, noting any actions you may have to take along the way.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5. When you\u2019re ready,\nfloat back to your present and back down into the room.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Always check your motives when setting and\nobtaining your goals, in order to ensure that they fit within all areas of your\nlife<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4. This process is\ncalled the ecology check. By really examining your reasons, you can ensure that\nno hidden negative emotions are driving you. For instance, if you\u2019re focusing\non making a lot of money, you may want to know that the desire stems from\nwanting to be comfortably secure and able to help those less fortunate than\nyourself, and not because you\u2019re trying to escape a poverty-stricken childhood.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>BALLS&nbsp; !!</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ZCWDcAsO0T4/WU5j89jqqwI/AAAAAAABUgg/LuMAhwF51QsP_XG2h83LerIsm_nY5jg4gCLcBGAs/s1600/nlp-tooltmmodrivechange-170129164337-thumbnail-4.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"576\" data-original-width=\"768\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ZCWDcAsO0T4/WU5j89jqqwI/AAAAAAABUgg/LuMAhwF51QsP_XG2h83LerIsm_nY5jg4gCLcBGAs/s640/nlp-tooltmmodrivechange-170129164337-thumbnail-4.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Trying the visual\nsquash technique\u2014&nbsp;<span style=\"background-color: white;\">shit NLP method</span> -<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In principle, this\nexercise involves identifying the parts involved in a conflict and discovering\ntheir common intention before integrating them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. Identify two parts\nof yourself that may be in conflict.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;For instance, a part of you wants you to be\nhealthy while another part of you puts up an almighty fight when you want to\nexercise.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. Sit in a quiet place\nwhere you\u2019re unlikely to be disturbed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. Ask the problem part\nto come out and stand on one hand.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;In the example in step 1, this problem is the\npart averse to exercise.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4. Imagine the part as\na person and see what the person looks like, sounds like, and what feelings\nthat person has.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5. Ask the non-problem\npart to come out and stand on the other hand.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;In the example in step 1, this is the part\nthat wants to be healthy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6. Imagine this part as\na person and see what the person looks like, sounds like, and what feelings\nthat person has.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">7. Starting with the\nproblem part, ask each part \u2018What\u2019s your positive intention and purpose?\u2019 Keep\nrepeating the question and building a hierarchy until both parts realise that\nthey have the same intention.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The part averse to exercise may say things\nsuch as, \u2018I get tired\u2019, \u2018it\u2019s important to conserve energy\u2019, or \u2018I want to make\nthe world a better place.\u2019 In contrast, the part that wants to be healthy may\nsay, \u2018I like the buzz I get\u2019, \u2018I have more energy\u2019, or \u2018I want to make the\nworld a better place.\u2019<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">8. Ask each part what\nresources it has that the other part would find useful in attaining the common,\npositive purpose of each part.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The part averse to\nexercise may say things like, \u2018I have the imagination to design better\nsolutions\u2019 or \u2018I understand the problems people may experience.\u2019 Whereas the\npart that wants to be healthy may say, \u2018I have the energy to put into changing\nthe world\u2019 or \u2018I have the discipline it takes to make the world a better\nplace.\u2019<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">9. Bring both your\nhands together and fully integrate the parts and their resources, seeing a new\nyou, hearing what that new you may say, and recognising new feelings that you\nmay have.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">10. Now &nbsp;go back to before your conception and travel\nalong your time line to now, with the new, integrated you, changing your\nhistory along your time line.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Remember that your\nmemories are only a construction of your mind. If, in the past, you chose to\nmake a decision \u2013 such as \u2018exercise is tiring\u2019 \u2013 your whole time line is based\non that decision. If you then resolve this issue by integrating it with a\ndecision you make to be healthy, you can change your time line to accommodate\nthe new, healthy you. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Richard Bandler and\nJohn Grinder, the co-creators of NLP, discovered that when people speak, three\nkey processes happen naturally, which they labelled deletion, generalisation,\nand distortion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People delete\ninformation by not giving the whole story, make generalisations by extrapolating\nfrom one experience to another, and distort reality by letting their\nimaginations run wild.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NLP says that the most\npowerful words in the English language are \u201cthat\u2019s right\u201d. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Embedded commands or\nquestions are sentences that are constructed so as to contain within them the\noutcome that Erickson wanted from the client, as with the italicised parts of\nthe following sentences:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">### \u2018I\u2019m curious about\nwhether you will learn to relax and let yourself be comfortable in a few\nmoments.\u2019<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">### \u2018What is\ninteresting is when did you last learn so easily?\u2019<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The purpose of the\nembedded command is to send directions straight to the unconscious mind,\nwithout the conscious mind blocking them. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; Examples? the Queen Mother, Queen Elizabeth II, Prince Charles, and Prince William etc<br />\n<br />\nMost autistic babies are left-handed<br />\n<br />\nMany people who are left-handed draw figures that face to the right.<br />\n<br />\nLeft-handers are more likely to be dyslexic and to stutter.<br />\n<br />\nUltrasounds show that in the womb, babies which suck the left thumb inside the womb ( a sign that they have eaten their twin \u2013 vanishing twin syndrome ) become homosexual left handers and mean adults\u2014prone to become alcoholics, schizophrenic, delinquent, and dyslexic. They are also more likely to have Crohn\u2019s disease, ulcerative colitis, or mental disabilities.<br />\n<br />\nWhen placed on their tummies, right-handed babies tend to turn their heads to the right.<br />\n<br />\nThe brains of left-handers process emotions differently than those of right-handers and are more susceptible to negative emotions, such as anger<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS TOLD FOR THE FIRST TIME ON THIS PLANET.<br />\n<br />\nMY REVEATIONS NOW JUMP TO 50.2%<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_111M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. direction, concentrating on very specific\ndetails. &nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: deliberately adopts language in which\nthe meaning is vague. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE LINGUISTICS PART OF\nNLP&nbsp; - FOUNDED BY &nbsp;BANDLER AND GRINDER ARE DERIVED FROM NOAM\nCHOMSKYs LINGUISTIC SHIT&nbsp; -&nbsp; TRANSFORMATIONAL GRAMMAR, &nbsp;SYNTAX AND DELETION PHENOMENA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Transformational\ngrammar is a theory of grammar that accounts for the constructions of a\nlanguage by linguistic transformations and phrase structures.. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Noam Chomsky's BULLSHIT book Syntactic\nStructures on transformational grammar dominates the field of linguistics today<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Noam Chomsky\u2019s BULLSHIT\n&nbsp;book Aspects of the Theory of Syntax\ndeveloped the idea that each sentence in a language has two levels of\nrepresentation \u2014 a deep structure and a surface structure.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The deep structure\nrepresents the core semantic relations of a sentence, and is mapped onto the\nsurface structure..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">THIS BLOGSITE CAN SEE\nTHE NAKED EMPEROR \u2013ALWAYS !</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The cognitive\nrevolution is the name for a PSEUDO intellectual movement six decades ago. It\nbegan in the modern context of greater interdisciplinary communication and\nresearch. The relevant areas of interchange were the combination of psychology,\nanthropology, and linguistics ( bullshit of Noam Chomsky ) with approaches\ndeveloped within the then-nascent fields of artificial intelligence, computer\nscience, and neuroscience. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS WAS MINDLESS\nREVERSE ENGINEERING OF THE HUMAN THOUGHT PROCESS. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE CONMEN DAZZLED\nEVERYBODY WITH THEIR BRILLAINCE , MADE SURE NOBODY UNDERSTOOD IT \u2013AND BY THE\nMID EIGHTIES THE COGNITIVE SHIT HAD BECOME ZE DOMINANT RESEARCH LINE OF INQUIRY\nIN MOST PSYCHOLOGY RESEARCH FIELDS <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The five key ideas that\nmade up the cognitive revolution:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"The mental world\ncan be grounded in the physical world by the concepts of information,\ncomputation, and feedback.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"The mind cannot\nbe a blank slate because blank slates don't do anything.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"An infinite range\nof behavior can be generated by finite combinatorial programs in the\nmind.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Universal mental\nmechanisms can underlie superficial variation across cultures.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"The mind is a\ncomplex system composed of many interacting parts.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALL ABOVE WAS WORSE\nTHAT MAD MAN CHARLES DARWINS SHIT \u2013WHICH WE STILL TEACH IN OUR NCERT TEXT BOOKS\n( IN THIS DNA AGE )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN INTELLIGENT PEOPLE\nOUTSIDE THIS CLOSED GRUP\u2014ASKED WHAT THE FUCK IS ALL THIS COGNITIVE SHIT\u2014THEY GOT\nCAUGHT WITH THEIR PANTS DOWN AND SEAMLESSLY CROSSED OVER TO POSTCOGNITIVISM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">PEOPLE LIKE NOAM\nCHOMSKY MUST BE SHOT WITH THEIR OWN SHIT</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Human problem solving\nand expertise depend on our background sense of the context, of what is\nimportant and interesting given the situation, rather than on the process of\nsearching through combinations of possibilities to find what we need.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AT SEA PEOPLE STILL\nTALK ABOUT CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL\u2014WHO NEVER SOUGHT ATTENTION IN A MEETING\u2014HE ONLY\nSOUGHT THE INTEREST<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">NO CAPTAIN AT SEA COULD\nHOLD THE INTEREST OF HIS CREW FOR MORE THAN 15 MINUTES. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">I USED\nTO HAVE A BET WITH MY CHIEF OFFICERS ,&nbsp; &nbsp;HAVE STANDING MEETING FOR FOUR HOURS OR\nMORE.&nbsp; ENGINE CREW USED TO FIGHT TO\nATTEND THESE MEETING IN MID SEA ON THE BRIDGE\u2014FULL COMPLEMENT EXCEPT ONE\nWATCHKEEPER IN THE ENGINE CONTROL ROOM. .</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">I asked my officers and\ncrew to trust their gut feelings </span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b>I HONED MY CREWs\nINTUITIONS SO THAT THEY COULD FORESEE COMING SHADOWS</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b>&nbsp;I TAUGHT THEM TO GO FROM TELESCOPE TO\nMICROSCOPE MODE WHEN WARRANTED.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b>IT WAS EASY AS MY WHOLE\nMANAGEMENT NAY LEADERSHIP STYLE WAS PREDICTIVE AND PROACTIVE\u2014MY CREW FORGOT ALL\nCOMPANY RULES AND SIMPLY SIZED UP A SITUATION AND ACTED . &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">THEY KNEW CAPTAIN WILL PROTECT THEM IF THEY\nDID SOMETHING PROACTIVE , &nbsp;IN </span><span style=\"background-color: white;\">GOOD FAITH</span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">.</span></b></span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The human sense of the\nsituation, &nbsp;is based on our goals, our\nbodies and our culture\u2014all of our unconscious intuitions, attitudes and\nknowledge about the world. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 20, 2017 at 10:26 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_56MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nFIGHT BETWEEN COACH AND CAPTAIN<br />\n<br />\nTIME TO LET OUT A SECRET --WHY CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL WAS MOST POWERFUL AT SEA --30 YEARS IN COMMAND<br />\n<br />\nTHROUGHOUT MY COMMAND CAREER AT SEA -THE TOP HONCHO GAVE ME AN UNWRITTEN CONTRACT<br />\n<br />\n\" CAPTAIN--YOU WORD IS LAW \"<br />\n<br />\nI ASK MY READERS TO WATCH THE COWBOY MOVIE APPALOOSA<br />\n<br />\nVIRGIL COLE GOT THE SAME CONTRACT--BUT IN WRITING --SIGNED<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Appaloosa_(film)</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br />https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a16jACPxSig</span></div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_56MN\" kind=\"m\"><br /><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Hollywood movie\n( western ) the gun man Virgil Cole refused to take over the job of Sheriff\nunless he gets a written and signed contract from the town council that HIS\nWORD IS LAW.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At sea Capt Ajit\nVadakayil got the same UNWRITTEN contract .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is a measure of the\ntrust reposed on me that I would NOT abuse such extreme powers given to me<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALL MY CAPTAINS TOLD ME\n&nbsp;\u201cAJIT, RUN THE SHIP THE WAY YOU WANT . &nbsp;WHEN I HAVE A CHIEF OFFICER LIKE YOU I WOULD LIKE\nTO RELAX \u201c<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">My crew never went to\ncaptain\u2014the buck stopped on the Chief Officer\u2019s table.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A new Captain joined\nwhen I was in SCI\u2014a very senior captain\u2014 he looked more like a white man , tall\nwith a silver beard , and I could see that he was a ALPHA personality . Soon\nthere would be a clash of two mighty forces , in which he would lose .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This new Captain called\nme as soon as the previous Captain and his wife signed off. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He said \u201c Chief Mate ,\nI have been told that you do the Captains job and all I am supposed to do is to\nsign of the dotted line of the Bill of Lading \u201c. This is NOT my style\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This fellow says \u2013 \"BADA MAALIM SAAB KOH BOL DOH- &nbsp;KAAM HO JAYEGA &nbsp;. &nbsp;I have half a mind to punish him for insubordination\n\u201c&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I replied \u201c He will\nreport to you in the next 10 minutes \u2013first to do the job and then to accept punishment\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; I know you are really in charge . Let us\ncontinue as before\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once my senior took\nover from me as Chief Officer.&nbsp; &nbsp;He was told to do a parallel voyage with me for\nten days&nbsp; . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After a week he asked\nme \u201c Ajit, how come the crew has not thrown your overboard till now ? You are\nso goddamn tough with them . &nbsp;And they\nhappily take your bullshit \u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">MY CREW WOULD TOLERATE\nANY PUNISHMENT FROM ME.&nbsp; &nbsp;THEY KNEW PUNISHMENT WAS SWIFT AND TO THE MEASURE\u2014NOT\nAN IOTA LESS, NOT AN IOTA MORE.&nbsp; </b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS HAPPENS ONLY IF\nTHERE IS A FATHER FIGURE TYPE BONDING .&nbsp;\nSUCH IS THE MYSTERY OF HUMAN BEHAVIOR<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I ASK MY READERS \u201d IF\nYOU FUCKED IT UP AS A CHILD , &nbsp;&nbsp;AND YOUR FATHER WAS JUST INDIFFERENT TO YOU ,\nHOW WILL YOU FEEL\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YOU WOULD RATHER GET A\nSUITABLE PUNISHMENT AND GET ON WITH YOUR LIFE AT HOME, RIGHT?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">AT SEA IF SOMEONE\nFUCKED IT UP AND I REMAINED INDIFFERENT HE WOULD FALL SICK.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-HKOOV-94ApU/WUnNW9AR5YI/AAAAAAABUdA/X1DMU-PyxNwb-jAB4hAxIGuqEySBqx2ogCLcBGAs/s1600/downlsoad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"255\" data-original-width=\"198\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-HKOOV-94ApU/WUnNW9AR5YI/AAAAAAABUdA/X1DMU-PyxNwb-jAB4hAxIGuqEySBqx2ogCLcBGAs/s400/downlsoad.jpg\" width=\"310\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I HAVE PROVED THIS TO\nFELLOW OFFICERS WHO HAVE HEARD OF THIS AND WANTED TO SEE IT THEMSELVES. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THEY\nTHEMSELVES WOULD COME TO ME AFTER TWO DAYS AND SAY \u201c PUNISH THE POOR GUY , YOUR\nINDIFFERENCE HE CANNOT SUFFER. &nbsp;HE WANTS\nPUNISHMENT \u201c<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AS A TWO STRIPER , BOTH\nTHREE AND FOUR STRIPERS LEFT ME ALONE . &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THEY DARED NOT ENTER THE CARGO CONTROL ROOM\nWHEN I WAS THERE.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AGAIN AN UNWRITTEN CONTRACT\u2014\u201c AJIT, HANDLE\nYOUR WATCH. WE KNOW YOU ARE COMPETENT , EVEN TO DO TECHNICAL REPAIRS DURING YOUR\nWATCH\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once a new Parsi three\nstriper joined .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was warned by the previous Chief Officer and the current captain\nnot to enter the CCR when Second Mate in on watch . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I guess it did NOT suit his Parsi style. &nbsp;Rothschild had made them feel that they are superior Indians&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So we were on the very\nlarge crude carrier loading crude oil at mighty 20,000 tonnes and hour. The\nship could hold nearly 3 lakhs tonnes of oil.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ship was a Juaymah ( Saudi\nArabia deep sea terminal ) . Since Chief Officer decided to show me who is my\nboss, I told him \u201c I want to check the forward SBM mooring. . I will go by\ncycle and return in five minutes. &nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">DO NOT TOUCH ANY CONTROLS . &nbsp;SIX CARGO TANKS ARE OPEN</span></b> \u201c<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I guess he did not\nappreciate such orders from his dark skinned junior\u2014as he had one more stripe than me. He\nhad just joined the previous day. I was doing my tenth month on board..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I took the cycle and reached\nthe manifold at midships. &nbsp;&nbsp;The manifold\nwas vibrating like mad.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One tank\namidships which was already topped up to 98% sprayed oil. &nbsp;I knew the Chief Officer has shut 4 tanks and\nnow we were loading only two. With manifold pressure guage skyrocketing. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I immediately abandoned\nthe cycle and sprinted towards the CCR. &nbsp;I literally kicked him away from the console , and\nreopened the 4 tanks he had shut ( to prove his authority as a three striper in charge of cargo work ). &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I shouted to shore terminal STOP CARGO on VHF.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then I ran back on deck to the local control and\nhydraulically locked one LEAKY tank valve , of the tank which has started spraying . &nbsp;I was covered with oil, the whole crew was on\ndeck.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A subdued Chief Officers tells me\nin front of Captain &nbsp;\u201c Ajit , thank you\nfor everything \u201c<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The terminal stopped the\ncargo as there was too much back pressure and one pipeline joint ashore had\nsquirted oil. &nbsp;Luckily the underwater\npipeline and the flexible did not burst .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These are tales which carry on \u2013the stuff\nof legend and lore.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Oil goes in water and the fine is ONE BILLION USD ( P&amp;I\ncover ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>SOMEONE ASKED ME \u2013 HOW DO YOU LOAD AT SUCH\nHEAVY RATES?<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>ARE YOU NOT AFRAID OF OVERLOW?<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">NOT IF YOU ARE COMPETENT !</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As a one striper (\ncadet promoted to third mate ) &nbsp;I had\nfull authority to what I wanted \u2013only because I knew more that all combined\ntogether . It is not only the ship\u2019s crew who notices this\u2014but shore terminal\nstaff too.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Once in Bharati Dock\nChennai , at 1820 hrs , Chief Officer, Captain and Chief Engineer were in the\nshore leave launch with a lot of crew. &nbsp;The boatman would NOT shove off.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Captain ordered him to\nshove off.&nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The Tamilian boat coxswain tells him off in broken Hindi &nbsp;\u201c Third\nmate will come down soon. &nbsp;Only then the\nboat will shove off. &nbsp; We know he runs the\nship and you senior people don\u2019t know shit \u201c<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>This was told to be by\nthe Captain\u2019s wife the next day --she was in the boat.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The Tamil boatman was right. &nbsp;In 1975\ntankers were new concepts . &nbsp;The senior\nofficers had NOT sailed on tankers . &nbsp;</i></span><br />\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>They\nwere all pretenders .</i><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HERE IS THE BULLSHIT\nDEFINITION OF NLP-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NEURO concerns your\nneurological system. NLP is based on the idea that you experience the world\nthrough your senses and translate sensory information into thought processes,\nboth conscious and unconscious. Thought processes activate the neurological\nsystem, which affects physiology, emotions, and behaviour.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">LINGUISTIC refers to\nthe way you use language to make sense of the world, capture and conceptualise\nexperience, and communicate that experience to others. In NLP, linguistics is\nthe study of how the words you speak and your body language influence your\nexperience.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PROGRAMMING draws\nheavily from learning theory and addresses how you code or mentally represent\nyour experiences. Your personal programming consists of your internal processes\nand strategies &nbsp;thinking patterns) that\nyou use to make decisions, solve problems, learn, evaluate, and get results.\nNLP shows you how to recode your experiences and organise your internal\nprogramming so that you can get the outcomes you want.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
