max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6345058884509698191\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_213M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"http://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/06/ethical-nlp-neuro-linguistic_20.html?showComment=1498190373908#c6345058884509698191\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 23, 2017 at 9:29 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_213MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/06/ethical-nlp-neuro-linguistic_20.html<br />\n<br />\nSOMEONE CALLED ME AND SAID--<br />\n<br />\nIT IS MINDBOGGLING TO KNOW THAT YOU AS A SHIP CAPTAIN WAS GIVEN CARTE BLANCHE UNWRITTEN POWERS TO CHANGE AND CREATE YOUR OWN RULES ON THE SHIP-- &nbsp;IF I CAN GIVE ONE EXAMPLE ?<br />\n<br />\nWELL A COUPLE OF DAYS AGO , I JOKED WITH ONE OF MY READERS THAT I AM NOT KALKI AVATAR 9.5 ASHORE-- &nbsp; BUT WOULD HAVE BEEN KALKI AVATAR 9.6 AT SEA<br />\n<br />\nWELL IT WAS NO JOKE AT ALL . &nbsp; I WAS KALKI 9.7 ...<br />\n<br />\nI INTRODUCED HUNDREDS OF CHANGES AT SEA --WITHOUT CARING FOR PRECEDENT--WITHOUT CARING FOR RETRIBUTION FROM IMO CUNTS<br />\n<br />\nThe International Maritime Organization (IMO), is a specialised agency of the United Nations responsible for regulating shipping. The IMO was established in Geneva in 1948 and came into force ten years later, meeting for the first time in 1959. Headquartered in London, United Kingdom, the IMO has 172 Member States and three Associate Members. The IMO's primary purpose is to develop and maintain a comprehensive regulatory framework for shipping and its remit today includes safety, environmental concerns, legal matters, technical co-operation, maritime security and the efficiency of shipping.<br />\n<br />\nMANY TIMES , PORT STATE CONTROL INSPECTORS AND OIL MAJOR VETTING INSPECTORS WOULD POINT OUT TO A CHANGE I INTRODUCED AS A DEFICIENCY AND NOTE IT DOWN AS ONE. &nbsp; &nbsp; I WOULD BE FORCED TO CORRECT IT ON THE SPOT ( LICKING BACK MY OWN SPIT ) . &nbsp; &nbsp; AS SOON AS THAT CUNT WITH NUISANCE POTENTIAL GOT OFF MY SHIP, I WENT BACK TO THE ORIGINAL CHANGE I INTRODUCED . &nbsp; &nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">SAILORS LIVES MATTER .</span></b><br />\n<br />\nEXAMPLE ?<br />\n<br />\nIN THE SEVENTIES AROUND 400 BULK CARRIERS( HUGE SHIPS ) SANK.<br />\n<br />\nTHEORETICALLY THERE SHOULD HAVE BEEN 800 LIFERAFTS FLOATING AROUND FOR ATLEAST ONE OR TWO MONTHS.<br />\n<br />\nTHESE 800 LIFERAFTS WERE MISSING--WHICH MEANT THEY SANK ALONG WITH THE SHIP AND ALL LIVES ON BOARD<br />\n<br />\nIN THE POST BELOW ,I REPRODUCE A MESSAGE I SENT TO MY COMPANY--THIS IS NO BULLSHIT<br />\n<br />\nCHECK OUT THE CLEAR \"<b><span style=\"color: red;\">VADAKAIL BINDU THINKING</span></b> \" INVOLVED .<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/naive-sailor-sinking-ships-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nEXAMPLE NO 2<br />\n<br />\nHUNDREDS OF SAILORS DIED AT SEA BECAUSE MAN OVERBOARD PROCEDURES WERE STILL IN THE \"GREASE AND TACKLE \" AGE . &nbsp; &nbsp;NOBODY AT SEA HAD THE BRAINS TO INTEGRATE MODERN TECHNOLOGY. &nbsp; &nbsp;IT REQUIRED KALKI 9.6<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/naive-sailor-man-overboard-capt-ajit.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/naive-sailor-gps-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\nI JUST GAVE TWO EXAMPLE AMONG HUNDREDS OF CHANGES I BROUGHT AT SEA. &nbsp; PEOPLE WHO SAILED WITH ME SPREAD THESE CHANGES --LIKE HOW FOLLOWERS OF A MESSIAH DO IT .<br />\n<br />\nYES- &nbsp;I HAD UNLIMITED POWERS AT SEA-- &nbsp;I DID NOT MISUSE IT --<br />\n<br />\nwise people who gave it to me knew i wont misuse it.<br />\n<br />\nI WAS WORTH IT.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BUT THESE NLP\nLINGUISTIC CUNTS LIKE NOAM CHOMSKY DO NOT KNOW THAT SANSKRIT MANTRAS AFFECT THE\nHUMAN BY \u201cSOUND\u201d --&nbsp;&nbsp; NOT \u201cMEANING\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ANYBODY WHO TRIES\nSTUNTS WITH NLP LINGUISTICS IS A CUNT OF THE FIRST ORDER\u2014 USING PATHETIC \u201cTAG\nQUESTIONS \u201c <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A NLP tag question is\nadded to the end of a statement to invite agreement.&nbsp; Tag questions are a deliberate device that\ndistracts the conscious mind of recipients with something they can agree with.\nThe effect is that the statement in front of the tag question goes directly to\nthe unconscious mind and is acted upon (<b style=\"background-color: white;\"> BALLS</b> ) :<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">## This is easy, isn\u2019t\nit?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2001, Robbins filed\na lawsuit against The Vancouver Sun newspaper, alleging defamation and libel.\nThe judge determined the Vancouver Sun defamed Robbins ( gave 20,000 USD in\ndamages ) when it called him an \"adulterous, wife-stealing\nhypocrite\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Robbins has no academic\nbackground\u2014only a glib tongue. He was a janitor ( his mother kicked him out of the home and chased him with a knife ) &nbsp;with mental skills for this low level job. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;During Thanksgiving his family was too poor to have food, leave alone fat turkey. His mother was an alcoholic and he had four stepfathers.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tony Robbins made more than 500 million US&nbsp; dollars by conning the asses off na\u00efve white\npeople. He scoots around in a plush private jet .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tony Robbins used\nEricksonian hypnosis to put his subject into a trance without their knowing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NLP is a slimy\ntechnique of layering subtle meaning into spoken or written language so that\nyou can implant suggestions into a person\u2019s unconscious mind without them\nknowing what you\u2019re doing.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is just a con job<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">An NLP con guru knows\nhow to &nbsp;cause a person to drop their\nguard and enter a state of openness and suggestibility.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">In their own personal lives all are complete\nfailures. Their children hate them. Their wives cheat.<o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>SLIME DOES NOT WORK AT HOME</b></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once rapport by deceit\nis achieved, the NLP conman will then begin subtly leading the interaction.\nHaving mirrored the other person, they can now make subtle changes to actually\ninfluence the other person\u2019s behavior. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Combined\nwith subtle language patterns, leading questions and a whole slew of other\ntechniques, a skilled NLP conman can at this point steer the other person\nwherever they like, as long as the other person isn\u2019t aware of what\u2019s happening\nand thinks everything is arising organically, or has given consent.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The classical hypnosis\ndepends in the process of putting the subjects in the alpha state so that their\nmind becomes more suggestive to the commands and can be programmed. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whereas, the\nNeuro-Linguistic Programming (NLP) techniques is capable of covertly inducing\nthe thoughts in the subject's unconscious mind that are consciously\nunnoticed.&nbsp; The persuasive power is high\nin the neuro-linguistic programming, and this technique is far more used in the\nbusiness, marketing, socializing, etc. .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NLP founder Bandler\nused shock tactics \u2013 he used his gun in NLP sessions in order to produce\ndramatic psychological changes in clients\u2014a technique that was later mirrored\nby Hollywood in the movie Fight Club, in which Brad Pitt\u2019s character pulls a\ngun on a gas station attendant and threatens to kill him if he doesn\u2019t pursue\nhis dreams in life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1986 Bandler was at\nthe home of Corine Christensen, the girlfriend to his drug dealer, James\nMarino. Christensen was a prostitute and also Bandler\u2019s bookkeeper. Bandler and\nMarino were arguing. That night Corine Christensen was shot dead. Each man\naccused the other of pulling the trigger. Bandler stood trial for murder with\nMarino being the state witness. The jury reached their decision quickly.\nBandler was innocent.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Violence has been a\ntheme in Bandler\u2019s life. He was brought up in a tough neighborhood in New\nJersey. In his childhood he says, \u201c\u201dI had every bone in my body broken by\nadults\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He admits to and\njustifies using a level of violence in theraputic and training environments to\nget his message across.&nbsp; Bandler\nsays:\u201dI\u2019ve slapped a client across the face \u2013 just to wake him up.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In crude terms, Bandler\u2019s\nNLP explores the relationships between how we think (neuro), how we communicate\n(linguistic) and our patterns of behaviour and emotions (programmes)\u2014which is\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">BULLSHIT</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bandler himself still\nteaches NLP regularly, and claims to be able to \"erase\" traumatic\nmemories, improve your relationships and even ' \"cure\" schizophrenia\nand paralysis (he taught himself to walk again using NLP after a stroke put him\nin a wheelchair).&nbsp; <b><span style=\"color: red;\">LIES </span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bandler has beaten up\nhis students, been admitted for drug abuse rehab and even stood trial for\nmurder. But in NLP circles Bandler is hailed as a sort of Messiah\u2014his own self\npromotion.. NLP gurus have their propaganda dept repeating again and again --\n\"NLP changed my life\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NLP practitioners \u2013\nwhose vocabulary is littered with phrases such as \"installing\nstrategies\", \"behavioural technologies\",\n\"cybernetics\", \"deletion\", \"content reframing\"\nand \"hypnosis\" \u2013 &nbsp;are scary\npeople<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Grinder is long out of\nthe NLP picture; the gruesome pair acrimoniously parted ways following a bitter\ncopyright lawsuit in 1997 \u2013 proof that even NLP experts don't have solutions\nfor everything<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"How many of you\nare not artistic?\" Bandler asks from the stage at a typical NLP session. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hands are raised.\n\"Is that because you weren't born with the 'art gene'?\" It's a\nleading question. A table on the stage is kitted out with brushes, paints and\npaper and four non- artistic volunteers are plucked to sit at it, then put into\na trance. \"Every time you hear yourself saying 'I'm not the kind of person\nwho...',\" he murmurs to the budding artists, \"I want you to laugh\nbecause it's just like masturbating one stroke at a time, it'll never get you\nthere...\" This is typical of the way Bandler talks. Crude quips, detailed\nanecdotes and seemingly random digressions spill out relentlessly, punctuated\nby sound effects, imitations and expletives.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There's the one about\nhow he punched a man (\"Thwack!\") who hit his own daughter because she\nwas speaking to invisible angels (the girl was cured, naturally, by Bandler);\nthe smut (the following day on stage he'll motivate a young man to clear out\nhis garage by thinking about breasts) and the tales to discredit\npsychotherapists (cue the account of the time he smuggled rubber snakes into a\nschizophrenic's shower at a mental hospital to prove that he didn't require\ndrugs for sanity, but simply the opportunity to differentiate between\nhallucinated and actual serpents)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"You all know my\ncure for schizophrenia is to alter reality not hallucinations,\" he says to\nhis audience. \"A lot of patients with mental issues simply don't have\nproper strategies.\" He's a little scary, but his thinking is persuasive.\nAnd it seems to be working on stage,too \u2013 the budding artists are \u2013 surprise\nsurprise \u2013 confidently expressing themselves via the medium of acrylic paint.\nThere had been similar turnarounds at the end of yesterday's session: the BRIBED\nwoman from Baghdad who thanked Bandler for \"giving her life back\"\nafter he'd erased a horrific image from her mind; the delegate who had been\npetrified of heights but, by day three, was embracing several of Orlando's most\ndramatic roller coasters.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bandler used to get pissed\noff when people pulled him up for smoking \u2013 a habit NLP is popular for ridding\npeople of. \"I knew how to stop, I just didn't want to!\" he says.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bandler tells the\nIndependent newspaper,&nbsp; \u201cif I wasn\u2019t this\nimperfect I wouldn\u2019t have had room for improvement.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The NLP CONMEN use a\nspecific pattern of words that seems normal but are more suggestive and\npermissive. The hot words that are more connected with the senses are more\nsuggestive.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The words like hear this, see that, feel free, eventually, means,\nnow, as, because, etc. could invoke a certain state of mind like feeling,\nexperiencing,&nbsp; imagining and perception\nin the mind. They also use certain vague words to control your thoughts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Listen\u2014anybody can fool\npeople<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What does a magician \u2013\na con man --do?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He fools people!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Are we to make a\nmagician the PM of India or worship him ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Triple Sri called for a\nvolunteer to come up on stage for a \u201cpatented\u201d magic oil surprise\ndemonstration.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of the students\nfrom the back rows of the auditorium was chosen to share the dais.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The chosen volunteer, a\nmale student wearing a black t-shirt with horizontal white stripes, was asked\nto extend his arm parallel to the floor, clinch his fist and resist the pulling\ndown of his arm. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Triple Sri&nbsp; gripping the volunteer\u2019s arm near the wrist,\nwas able to pull down his arm easily over and over again, much to the\namusement&nbsp; of the na\u00efve audience. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He then produced from\nhis pocket a small vial containing some oil.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-yPWfeJSjIW8/WUVE82UAtTI/AAAAAAABUaA/BN4-e9mmaZIFMaIlK4gMOsGTs9mhuYbsQCLcBGAs/s1600/big1.1EE97dd3221.3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The volunteer was then\nasked to rub and spread this oil over his arm. After the volunteer took a step\nback and a deep breath to relax, the whole exercise was repeated again \u2013 except\nthis time Triple Sri with his gargantuan paunch struggled quite hard to pull\ndown the volunteer\u2019s arm, amazing the vast audience.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The volunteer, visibly\nimpressed and believing that he had in fact become stronger in a matter of\nseconds after the application of the oil, went onto fall at the feet (cultural\npractice of surrender) of the extraordinary messiah Triple Sri.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Following the\nthundering applause from his gullible audience, Mr. Ravishankar went on to urge\nstronger volunteers to come forth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The next male volunteer\nalso went on to fall at the feet of Mr. Ravishankar after his new found\nstrength.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The frenzy in the arena\nattracted a male \"skeptic\" from the audience to volunteer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was visibly\nunimpressed by the arm pull down test and the claim of instantaneous\nimprovement of strength and vigor following the application of a few drops of\noil. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Ajit Vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">October 20, 2014 at\n4:55 PM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALL READERS--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I HAD FOOLED A FEMALE\nIN THE GYM USING THE SAME METHOD OF TRIPLE SRI, TWO YEARS BEFORE HE DID IT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SO I KNOW.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">she used to OVER\nexercise and was extravagantly proud of her figure- wearing spandex tights\nflaunting her CAMEL TOE .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I WORE A BRACELET AND\nTHIS GIRL WANTED TO KNOW WHAT IT IS .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">then i made her wear my\nbracelet.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">by now the entire gym\nof 20 people were watching us in a circle.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">and all wanted to buy\nthat bracelet off my hand-- any amount ,, kuch bhi-- and some of them were very\nrich.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TRIPLE SRI just used\nmagic ( sic ) Shakti oil.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/u-c3p1d-Sb4/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/u-c3p1d-Sb4?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nGetting back--<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By mirroring body\nlanguage and linguistic patterns, the NLPer is attempting to achieve one very\nspecific response: \u201crapport by deceit\u201d.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\nRapport is the mental and physiological state that a human enters when\nthey let their social guard down, and it is generally achieved when a person\ncomes to the conclusion that the person they\u2019re talking to is just like them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Combined with subtle\nlanguage patterns, leading questions and a whole slew of other techniques, a\nskilled NLPer can at this point steer the other person wherever they like, as\nlong as the other person isn\u2019t aware of what\u2019s happening and thinks everything\nis arising organically, or has given consent.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is slimy BREACH OF TRUST\ngoing on here. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/j25qV5RO-nU/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/j25qV5RO-nU?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eliciting happens when\nan NLPer uses leading and language to engineer an emotional state\u2014for instance,\nhunger. Once a state has been elicited, the NLPer can then anchor it with a\nphysical cue\u2014for instance, touching your shoulder.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In theory, if done right, the NLPer can then\ncall up the hungry state any time they touch your shoulder in the same way.\nIt\u2019s conditioning, plain and simple. This works till the NLP conman cheats you.\n&nbsp;By the time you realize this he would\nhave scooted with your moolah or even your wife .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NLP conmen love to win by\nmaking an ass out of you. Trust means nothing to them. Usually trust takes\nyears to build. The NLP conman put you fog where you confused instant rapport (\nby cheating ) &nbsp;with trust. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-mQP8dYGwzOs/WUXdPeNf5MI/AAAAAAABUao/KwQKR6Z5VDgjO7SPOh9LEsJIzWP9iuG6QCLcBGAs/s1600/imssages.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"266\" data-original-width=\"190\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-mQP8dYGwzOs/WUXdPeNf5MI/AAAAAAABUao/KwQKR6Z5VDgjO7SPOh9LEsJIzWP9iuG6QCLcBGAs/s400/imssages.png\" width=\"285\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wait 24 hours before\nmaking any decisions, especially financial ones.&nbsp;&nbsp; Do NOT let yourself get swept up into making\nan emotional decision in the spur of the moment. When a unknown person gets too\nfriendly have your guard up.&nbsp;&nbsp; Sales\npeople are armed with NLP techniques specifically for engineering impulse buys.\nDon\u2019t do it. Leave, and use your rational mind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/02/jealousy-growing-ulcer-within-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/02/jealousy-growing-ulcer-within-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOG_video_class\" contentid=\"a4124b69fe8a4a85\" height=\"266\" id=\"BLOG_video-a4124b69fe8a4a85\" width=\"320\"></object></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WANNA HEAR OF BIZARRE\nNLP SHIT ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE: &nbsp;Picture confidence as a golden aura around you\nImagine a very, extremely confident person. Let\u2019s call this imaginary person\nConfido. Picture him walking up to a group of strangers at a party and start\ntalking with them. They instantly love him, because he is so friendly and\nconfident. It is clear that Confido knew everyone would love him before he even\nstarted speaking. Picture a golden aura surrounding him that only you can see.\nThis is his confidence. You can take this aura and bring it over yourself. Feel\nhow the confidence flows around you. Everything feels natural and you are\nconfident to do anything you want. UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">BRRAAAAYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYY\n!</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/6kSq7dPlw0A/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/6kSq7dPlw0A?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HERE IS MORE\u2014( LIFTED\nFROM YOGA NIDRA )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE:&nbsp; Press your left thumbnail into your left\nindex finger in a pulsing motion. Take a memory where you were doing something\nyou really enjoy and feel safe about. Maybe reading a good book on the beach,\nor talking to a close friend in a comfortable setting. What can you see? . Make\nthis feeling of confidence as strong and vivid as you can before moving on. Continue\nto reinforce this anchor, and every time you feel the confidence, press the\nanchor again. Each time you do so, let the feeling of confidence double and\nsurge. You must associate the emotional feeling of confidence with the physical\nsensation of the anchor. : UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>HEY HOW ABOUT PUTTING A NLP FINGER UP THE NLP ASSHOLE ?</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/dy75GtKsOAw/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/dy75GtKsOAw?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">NLP TECHNIQUE TO MAKE A\nCHOOT OUT OF YOURSELF</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE:&nbsp; Visualise the fat globules seeping through\nyour insides, oozing their way through your blood vessels and adding themselves\ninto heaving, pale yellow piles of fat under your skin. Imagine the sound of\nall the saturated animal fats congealing into a sickly putty and clogging up\nyour arteries. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How do you imagine that\nprocessed fat smells once it\u2019s stripped of its artificial flavours and sugars? &nbsp;Focus on the negative aspects of the food, and\nthey will soon outweigh the positive aspects. NLP learning let\u2019s pretend it\ndoes. In reality, your fat deposits are broken down by your body to gain energy\nfor the processing of the celery.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What is your favourite\naspect of celery? If you hate the taste, then use a different vegetable for\nthis example, possibly a carrot or piece of lettuce. Picture the celery being\nnicely broken down and literally turning old fat deposits into pure water.\nConcentrate on the taste.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Say words like \u201cmmm\ndelicious!\u201d and really mean them. Act like it is the most delicious piece of\nfood you have eaten in your entire life. Tell other people how great it tastes.\nEven if you don\u2019t quite believe yourself, put on the performance of a lifetime.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your body will react by\ngenuinely starting to like celery. &nbsp;UNQUOTE\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NLP CLAIMS TO HAVE MADE\nALL SMOKERS QUIT USING THIS BULLSHIT NLP TECHNIQUE\u2014A FOUL LIE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE:&nbsp; This feeling should be associated with the\nfollowing visualisation. You know the cigarette tar that forms in your lungs\nthat you try to cough up? Imagine coughing up all that tar and spitting it into\na bucket over the course of several days. Vividly picture that bucket of regurgitated\ntar and phlegm sopping around in the bucket. How does that cigarette tar smell?\nWhat sound does it make if you stir the bucket with a large wooden spoon?\nUnpleasant?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Well how about this -\ntake a mouthful of that thick, hot, sticky, smelly tar, and chew it. Feel the\ntar sticking to the roof of your mouth as the bitter taste fills your mouth.\nThe smell will be overwhelming, but keep chewing it anyway. Hear the \u201csplatch\nsplatch\u201d sound of the vile tar squelching in your mouth. Take a big drag on a\ncigarette at the same time, with the taste of the smoke intertwining with the\ntar.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now see the\ndisappointment in the eyes of your loved ones as you take a step closer to an\nearly grave.As you inhale the smoke, feel and visualise the smoke carrying all\nthat disgusting tar down into your lungs. Picture the tar sticking to the\ntissue of your lungs and burning away chunks of your lung tissue.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hear the hissing sound\nof the boiling tar corroding through your lungs and making them bleed. Exhale\nand truly feel the pain of the specks of smokey tar searing its way through\nyour throat, infecting your mouth and poisoning the delicate tissues in your\nnose. Try to cough up all that dried tar stuck toyour lungs. &nbsp;Feel the burning pain of the fermented smoke\nscabs peeling off your insides and retching their way up your throat. : UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; 940 <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><i style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Nonnulli\nmemorant adipem prodesse leonis</i>.&nbsp; UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">QUOTE:\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Write on a piece of paper ABRACADABRA.&nbsp;\nThen repeat this word as&nbsp; many\ntimes as there are letters in the word, but each time taking off a letter, so\nthat the whole thing takes the form of a MERU TRIANGLE .&nbsp; This done, hang the piece of papyrus around\nthe neck of the patient with a linen thread</span>.UNQUOTE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">PEOPLE WHO RIDICULE -- THAT MERU INSIDE A TAVEEZ , IS HEATHEN SUPERSTITION READ THE STUFF ABOUT PASCALS TRIANGLE IN THE POST BELOW--</b></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Proactive people are not idle observers, they\nare active participants.<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">In order to be proactive, you must get\ninvolved.&nbsp; You have to take initiative\nand be a part of the solution.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">On ships I commanded I had NO place for\nreactive people. I wanted self starters, proactive people with initiative and\nhuman spirit</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Proactive people\nforesee potential obstacles and exert their power to find ways to overcome them\nbefore those obstacles turn into concrete roadblocks.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">YOU CANNOT BE A CHANGE LEADER IF YOU ARE\nREACTIVE</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/change-management-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/change-management-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/04/domino-effect-in-change-management-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/04/domino-effect-in-change-management-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-H8Vj38AL32I/WUHeJjCb6KI/AAAAAAABUVc/s7SEsgFeknAvWI2Y4NEnW7GlQJ651vDkACLcBGAs/s1600/downWAload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
