, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">PROACTIVE LEADERSHIP IS CALLED BLUE OCEAN\nLEADERSHIP</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/blue-ocean-leadership-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/blue-ocean-leadership-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6JMCTHs7myw/WUHd1Ev6eyI/AAAAAAABUVY/A0gQ8KKnhSgIjpk-nvt4bvosJcC4XjvdACLcBGAs/s1600/WWimages.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"191\" data-original-width=\"264\" height=\"289\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6JMCTHs7myw/WUHd1Ev6eyI/AAAAAAABUVY/A0gQ8KKnhSgIjpk-nvt4bvosJcC4XjvdACLcBGAs/s400/WWimages.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">A REACTIVE CUNT CANNOT MANAGE TIME</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/managing-time-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/managing-time-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-HKOlCVy820w/WUHdB1OmRrI/AAAAAAABUVU/npQ1LhqHN_sbFspi4dO6XiIk8RDeH_wUQCLcBGAs/s1600/SSdownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-HKOlCVy820w/WUHdB1OmRrI/AAAAAAABUVU/npQ1LhqHN_sbFspi4dO6XiIk8RDeH_wUQCLcBGAs/s400/SSdownload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">PROACTIVE PEOPLE CREATE THEIR OWN BRAND.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">AT SEA THE <b>VADAKAYIL BRAND </b>WILL LAST FOR EVER<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/personal-branding-me-inc-capt-ajit.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/personal-branding-me-inc-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-cHbCVDjG528/WUHchBQR7XI/AAAAAAABUVQ/khSf85-gXn8-36zQkJb9jXHtgq62ES_KQCLcBGAs/s1600/dEEownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"194\" data-original-width=\"259\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-cHbCVDjG528/WUHchBQR7XI/AAAAAAABUVQ/khSf85-gXn8-36zQkJb9jXHtgq62ES_KQCLcBGAs/s400/dEEownload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Proactive people are\nrarely caught by surprise.&nbsp; They can\nanticipate problems and events. Understand how things work; look for patterns;\nrecognize the regular routines, daily practices and natural cycles that exist\nin your business.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-dIYWWeDBASA/WUHhn5iKDLI/AAAAAAABUVg/3O-PZAihyQUTlnKlZYP-CyR0y7NywEJaACLcBGAs/s1600/downlvvxoad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"212\" data-original-width=\"238\" height=\"356\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-dIYWWeDBASA/WUHhn5iKDLI/AAAAAAABUVg/3O-PZAihyQUTlnKlZYP-CyR0y7NywEJaACLcBGAs/s400/downlvvxoad.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Proactive people are\nself starters and initiators.&nbsp; You are\nfully committed to the present and tend not to worry too much about what will\ncome later down the line.&nbsp;&nbsp; You focus on\nthings that are real \u2013 things that are concrete and things you know to be\ntrue.&nbsp; You concentrate on the tasks you\nare currently accomplishing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-S20Pxzc2NgI/WUHiCjJFdhI/AAAAAAABUVk/6tr9OvedoXMamdEuLa0cDyo-vngEEjnuQCLcBGAs/s1600/imBEages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"251\" data-original-width=\"201\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-S20Pxzc2NgI/WUHiCjJFdhI/AAAAAAABUVk/6tr9OvedoXMamdEuLa0cDyo-vngEEjnuQCLcBGAs/s400/imBEages.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reactive people wait\nfor others to initiate .&nbsp; They are NOT\nself starters.&nbsp; They&nbsp; spend substantial time considering and\nanalyzing without acting.&nbsp; They want to\nfully understand and assess before acting. They believe in chance or luck.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">At sea I called them <span style=\"color: red;\">DEADWOOD</span> and <span style=\"color: red;\">SPENT\nFORCES</span></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-rW_cv7QVuU0/WUHjvvjg5mI/AAAAAAABUVo/lKACl8rY3uIIatXME7XhoLintFdSlQKmwCLcBGAs/s1600/h2fc0a3c69.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"347\" data-original-width=\"500\" height=\"277\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-rW_cv7QVuU0/WUHjvvjg5mI/AAAAAAABUVo/lKACl8rY3uIIatXME7XhoLintFdSlQKmwCLcBGAs/s400/h2fc0a3c69.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The proactive person is\nperceptive . He has a sharp mind which anticipates the events that are about to\nhappen .&nbsp; His mental radar is on to pick\nup fore coming shadows.&nbsp; He is ready with\nboth a response and a plan to deal with the outcome.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-rk1pIMu7KCs/WUHkfXLV0uI/AAAAAAABUVs/7KiiZTbh668Rw1yd47D2ryn7LwMd59o9QCLcBGAs/s1600/imagxbdes.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"209\" data-original-width=\"242\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-rk1pIMu7KCs/WUHkfXLV0uI/AAAAAAABUVs/7KiiZTbh668Rw1yd47D2ryn7LwMd59o9QCLcBGAs/s1600/imagxbdes.png\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Self-starters are often\nadmittedly more interested in managing processes than people. In any\norganization , the most valuable employees are the ones who are proactive. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They control situations\nby causing things to happen rather than waiting to respond after things\nhappen.&nbsp;&nbsp; People who are proactive don\u2019t\nsit around waiting for answers to appear; they stand up, put one foot in front\nof the other, and find the answers.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nThey hold their own torch and create their own path<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-fLOJkcyKvgY/WUHlJWs8luI/AAAAAAABUVw/eOpP3l4kCIEmB7R6kx775DuX5d0YJt9PACLcBGAs/s1600/imaceges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"252\" data-original-width=\"188\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-fLOJkcyKvgY/WUHlJWs8luI/AAAAAAABUVw/eOpP3l4kCIEmB7R6kx775DuX5d0YJt9PACLcBGAs/s400/imaceges.jpg\" width=\"298\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Use your imagination\nwhen anticipating future outcomes. &nbsp;Don\u2019t simply expect the past to always be an\naccurate predictor for the future; use your creativity and logic. &nbsp;Come up with\nmultiple scenarios for how events could unfold. &nbsp;Proactive people are always on\ntheir toes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-wwVoSNeh9KQ/WUHmiTCLIyI/AAAAAAABUV0/Ub08n6JKc_kcVwgW3SoZkR6WBbad7VRpwCEwYBhgL/s1600/ima4vsges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-wwVoSNeh9KQ/WUHmiTCLIyI/AAAAAAABUV0/Ub08n6JKc_kcVwgW3SoZkR6WBbad7VRpwCEwYBhgL/s400/ima4vsges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reactive people are\nessentially like characters in a movie, playing out the script. They often\nresemble powerless victims, having their lives run by external factors. &nbsp;They have little control over their emotions.&nbsp; Their emotions are dictated by someone or\nsomething else; by circumstance and the outside environment. They lack\ninitiative&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-lfG9yCgTER0/WUHnpPb4f2I/AAAAAAABUV4/VK8vXx-WYp0xrIkcbMQ_ltLf6LKxVwmYwCLcBGAs/s1600/dsownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"238\" data-original-width=\"212\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-lfG9yCgTER0/WUHnpPb4f2I/AAAAAAABUV4/VK8vXx-WYp0xrIkcbMQ_ltLf6LKxVwmYwCLcBGAs/s400/dsownload.jpg\" width=\"356\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When we\u2019re proactive,\nwe only concern ourselves with things that are inside our sphere of influence,\nrather than worrying about things we can\u2019t do anything about.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-KqDkqL71F6o/WUHovsZeNmI/AAAAAAABUWA/6-XjC8lrSvQnO3KSyQWINqcWpHgp-MA_ACLcBGAs/s1600/im5ages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"240\" data-original-width=\"190\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-KqDkqL71F6o/WUHovsZeNmI/AAAAAAABUWA/6-XjC8lrSvQnO3KSyQWINqcWpHgp-MA_ACLcBGAs/s320/im5ages.jpg\" width=\"253\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We look towards\nwhat we are able to control and change, and this includes the way we react to\nany given situation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-dflS5xjxn7M/WUHod2IM_LI/AAAAAAABUV8/GjVNvBIiLVkFNdB9IjTI8ImOq1qiHEpcwCLcBGAs/s1600/imrrages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-dflS5xjxn7M/WUHod2IM_LI/AAAAAAABUV8/GjVNvBIiLVkFNdB9IjTI8ImOq1qiHEpcwCLcBGAs/s400/imrrages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Being proactive is not\na case of being a robot and having no emotions. Rather, it\u2019s being in complete\ncontrol over your emotions. It\u2019s making the transition \u2013 from other people and\ncircumstances being in charge, to being in charge of yourself.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-L38rfsRPB7g/WUHpQf7UkZI/AAAAAAABUWE/pmMPGMI_LHcI62kaVIEq4PGUvvBIEroTACLcBGAs/s1600/imc1ages.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"160\" data-original-width=\"314\" height=\"203\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-L38rfsRPB7g/WUHpQf7UkZI/AAAAAAABUWE/pmMPGMI_LHcI62kaVIEq4PGUvvBIEroTACLcBGAs/s400/imc1ages.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Being reactive means\nthat you don\u2019t take any initiative or make strategic decisions in life, you\njust go where life kicks you; and then you react to what happens to you,\nsometimes with positive, but more often with negative feelings\u2014bitching about\nliPe \u2013 nay life<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-8yBHRavtfbc/WUHpr1RmH5I/AAAAAAABUWI/OgcGei-mJ24mardJ4y0xQV1tWeOIRYVTgCLcBGAs/s1600/ima19nges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"259\" data-original-width=\"194\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-8yBHRavtfbc/WUHpr1RmH5I/AAAAAAABUWI/OgcGei-mJ24mardJ4y0xQV1tWeOIRYVTgCLcBGAs/s400/ima19nges.jpg\" width=\"299\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The proactive man uses\nhis imagination , he asks himself &nbsp;what\u2019s\nlikely to happen and he acts accordingly to get the best possible outcome. &nbsp;You must act before a situation becomes a\nsource of frustration or crisis.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-_nqtZhMOJ_I/WUHqRR6lgwI/AAAAAAABUWM/OtcNS1CdqXss7ZAE8F72AYCnjum5zKXbQCLcBGAs/s1600/dobmrwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"213\" data-original-width=\"237\" height=\"287\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-_nqtZhMOJ_I/WUHqRR6lgwI/AAAAAAABUWM/OtcNS1CdqXss7ZAE8F72AYCnjum5zKXbQCLcBGAs/s320/dobmrwnload.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With proactive\nbehavior, you become aware that life doesn\u2019t just happen, but that you\u2019re the\none who designs your life, you\u2019re the one making choices.&nbsp; With proactive thinking, you focus on things\nyou can change, you make a plan of how you\u2019ll really change them and then go\nafter your goals, while at the same time accepting the things you can\u2019t change.\n&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He knows how to trims his sails. He wont\nbitch about the direction of wind<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-JLCSKGBq1qY/WUHqwGNOu6I/AAAAAAABUWQ/myej4ryHHGw-zNaf4CpNU9CELtHcDZPpQCLcBGAs/s1600/do32wnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-JLCSKGBq1qY/WUHqwGNOu6I/AAAAAAABUWQ/myej4ryHHGw-zNaf4CpNU9CELtHcDZPpQCLcBGAs/s320/do32wnload.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reactive thinkers wait\nfor life or things to happen to them before taking any steps. The main problem\nwith this type of behaviour and way of thinking is that these people never\nreally face up to their responsibility as they are in a constant battle to\nresolve the previous issue.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They are\nnever really in a position to resolve their problems as they are always being\nbombarded with new ones because they still haven\u2019t resolved the previous issue.\nThis situation often makes the reactive person feel as though they are stuck in\na rut.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This person does not prepare well and will well blame external factors\nas the root of their problems. He is the quintessential carpenter who blames hi\nstools.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-rlAezMEHyCQ/WUHrXiv2_PI/AAAAAAABUWU/N5QwKw9bWdgLu2DBDzEUZVf8-Xj-7kYvQCLcBGAs/s1600/dowc42nload.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-rlAezMEHyCQ/WUHrXiv2_PI/AAAAAAABUWU/N5QwKw9bWdgLu2DBDzEUZVf8-Xj-7kYvQCLcBGAs/s400/dowc42nload.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Proactive actions are\nbased on our own (personal) values and are less influenced by current affairs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sit ass reactive\nlanguage &nbsp;\u201c That\u2019s the way I am\u201d ( nobody\non the ship ever dared to pull this dialogue with me )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reactive people are\noften affected by their physical environment. If the weather is good, they feel\ngood. If it isn\u2019t, it affects their attitude and their performance. Proactive\npeople can carry their own weather with them. Whether it rains or shines makes\nno difference to them. They are value driven; and if their value is to produce\ngood quality work, it isn\u2019t a function of whether the weather is conducive to\nit or not.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Mpgxqs_b4qY/WUH0MS7SmRI/AAAAAAABUWc/_DMXiK9slVIOvURwROPqHqWxHOqg4J59QCLcBGAs/s1600/imassges.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Mpgxqs_b4qY/WUH0MS7SmRI/AAAAAAABUWc/_DMXiK9slVIOvURwROPqHqWxHOqg4J59QCLcBGAs/s400/imassges.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ability to\nsubordinate an impulse to a value is the essence of the proactive person.\nReactive people are driven by feelings, by circumstances, by conditions, by\ntheir environment. Proactive people are driven by values-carefully thought\nabout, selected and internalized values.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-627c9aPJLdY/WUJPoj5dVhI/AAAAAAABUW4/rJxEqZOgWlsXYgDBmcbkVdvSJjPN2vs2ACLcBGAs/s1600/b6download.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"258\" data-original-width=\"195\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-627c9aPJLdY/WUJPoj5dVhI/AAAAAAABUW4/rJxEqZOgWlsXYgDBmcbkVdvSJjPN2vs2ACLcBGAs/s400/b6download.jpg\" width=\"302\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reactive people are\naffected by the social environment, by the \u201csocial weather.\u201d When people treat\nthem well, they feel well, when people don\u2019t, they become defensive or protective.\nReactive people build their emotional lives around the behavior of others,\nempowering the weaknesses of other people to control them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-sUAsqcLrV-M/WUJM6w5qnZI/AAAAAAABUWs/_cOGrRI0MEImAmZqIfR-IDnvAkPN9vOugCLcBGAs/s1600/downlv4oad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"188\" data-original-width=\"188\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-sUAsqcLrV-M/WUJM6w5qnZI/AAAAAAABUWs/_cOGrRI0MEImAmZqIfR-IDnvAkPN9vOugCLcBGAs/s400/downlv4oad.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Proactive people are\nstill influenced by external stimuli, whether physical, social, or\npsychological. But their response to the stimuli, conscious or unconscious, is\na value-based choice or response. Proactive people think about solutions or\noptions.&nbsp; They have a \u201ccan-do\u201d attitude<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-010nogye1gQ/WUJOn901_dI/AAAAAAABUWw/0IBjPjkSTYYq9YCjh2pwkBP5UP5RdROWwCLcBGAs/s1600/dowbbdnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-010nogye1gQ/WUJOn901_dI/AAAAAAABUWw/0IBjPjkSTYYq9YCjh2pwkBP5UP5RdROWwCLcBGAs/s400/dowbbdnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Proactive people take\ncontrol of their lives.&nbsp; They are not\neasily offended.&nbsp; They take responsibility\nfor their choices and think before they act. They can bounce back when\nsomething bad happens. They find a&nbsp; way\nto make it happen.&nbsp;&nbsp; They focus on things\nthey can do something about, and don\u2019t worry about things they can\u2019t.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ZH6IfyeYe8A/WUJPZ3n8oWI/AAAAAAABUW0/Vw_7VA8OrmokeAWa1KQANhuRq0jMlYm6ACLcBGAs/s1600/downlonad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"224\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"398\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ZH6IfyeYe8A/WUJPZ3n8oWI/AAAAAAABUW0/Vw_7VA8OrmokeAWa1KQANhuRq0jMlYm6ACLcBGAs/s400/downlonad.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-size: large;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/old-sea-dog-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/old-sea-dog-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reactive people make\nchoices based on impulse.&nbsp; They blame\nothers for their&nbsp; problems&nbsp; \u2013 being a victim. They suffer from\npersecution mania and even blame their tools.&nbsp;\nDon\u2019t be a victim. Stay away from the \u201cVictimitis Virus\u201d \u2013 a feeling\nthat you are doomed.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-JspzPND3EV0/WUJZTshCnyI/AAAAAAABUXY/GAFORmJ-XSUjFKOrSyzLM6ThuHymCQkeQCLcBGAs/s1600/imagves.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"158\" data-original-width=\"318\" height=\"316\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-JspzPND3EV0/WUJZTshCnyI/AAAAAAABUXY/GAFORmJ-XSUjFKOrSyzLM6ThuHymCQkeQCLcBGAs/s640/imagves.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People inflicted with Victimitis believe that everyone has\nit in for them and that the world owes&nbsp;\nthem.&nbsp; Besides feeling like\nvictims, reactive people are easily offended. The whine and moan.&nbsp; They blame others, fly into a rage and say\nthings they later regret.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-6Y8r1TQmjeI/WUJS5DAAbFI/AAAAAAABUXA/wwdxVRDGTtIiOTnMUj4lIMlug1W0weWpwCLcBGAs/s1600/imuages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-6Y8r1TQmjeI/WUJS5DAAbFI/AAAAAAABUXA/wwdxVRDGTtIiOTnMUj4lIMlug1W0weWpwCLcBGAs/s400/imuages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some go into a deep sulk and is the indifferent\nmember of the team.&nbsp;&nbsp; They wait for\nthings to happen</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;to them.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp; &nbsp;They c</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">hange only\nwhen they have to or are armtwisted to. &nbsp;Such a <span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b>DRIFTWOOD</b></span> is called a PRICK</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Ppo36eV4om0/WUJRjA7O6AI/AAAAAAABUW8/dxpje4WhJ6wdEUgfZ2b9HLVD0Q0CzsWewCLcBGAs/s1600/downledoad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"249\" data-original-width=\"202\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Ppo36eV4om0/WUJRjA7O6AI/AAAAAAABUW8/dxpje4WhJ6wdEUgfZ2b9HLVD0Q0CzsWewCLcBGAs/s400/downledoad.jpg\" width=\"324\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Listen to the language.\nYou can hear the difference between proactive and reactive people. Reactive\npeople usually sound negative. Proactive people sound positive.&nbsp; Reactive language takes the power away from\nyou.&nbsp; Proactive language puts you in\ncontrol. This has nothing to do with NLP shit.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-CvZf5tk8bkU/WUJWUOWwQSI/AAAAAAABUXI/8jSmYtUxMXUo3dNU22_1D6cAVIR_ZL-ewCLcBGAs/s1600/do00wnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"223\" data-original-width=\"224\" height=\"398\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-CvZf5tk8bkU/WUJWUOWwQSI/AAAAAAABUXI/8jSmYtUxMXUo3dNU22_1D6cAVIR_ZL-ewCLcBGAs/s400/do00wnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reactive people are\nessentially like characters in a movie, playing out the script. They often\nresemble powerless victims, having their lives run by external factors. They\nhave little control over their emotions. Instead their emotions are dictated by\nsomeone or something else; by circumstance and the outside environment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-vn8v583pebU/WUJWEKuz8kI/AAAAAAABUXE/pGGKK0-WWfkQLva3RKwRr6a_nY-0erd5ACLcBGAs/s1600/dcownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"180\" data-original-width=\"280\" height=\"257\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-vn8v583pebU/WUJWEKuz8kI/AAAAAAABUXE/pGGKK0-WWfkQLva3RKwRr6a_nY-0erd5ACLcBGAs/s400/dcownload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Proactive means taking\nresponsibility for everything in life. Proactive people make choices based upon\nvalues. &nbsp;They go the extra mile. . They\nare &nbsp;excellent problem solvers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Expect children to be\nreactive. They are not yet fully civilized nor adequately experienced.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The reactive person\nresponds after something has happened by which time it is mostly too late to\nprevent the full impact of an event which if anticipated, could have been\neasily averted.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-PiWqEhdXV94/WUJX0xOZ4VI/AAAAAAABUXM/LGqV6rAVB5szekXntImtk-5IsMdmI3MBQCLcBGAs/s1600/dowzznnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"239\" data-original-width=\"211\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-PiWqEhdXV94/WUJX0xOZ4VI/AAAAAAABUXM/LGqV6rAVB5szekXntImtk-5IsMdmI3MBQCLcBGAs/s320/dowzznnload.jpg\" width=\"282\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Proactive behaviour is\ninfluenced by a lifestyle choice, whereas reactive behaviour waits for choices\nto be made and then responds \u2013 hence the reaction part.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The proactive approach\nis one that deals with things from the inside-out perspective.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-UZebqarmC1U/WUJZOLmRTbI/AAAAAAABUXU/Ff1-TXyT7XQRh8sCPXSOg42vs_Svr6AIQCLcBGAs/s1600/imambges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"225\" data-original-width=\"225\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-UZebqarmC1U/WUJZOLmRTbI/AAAAAAABUXU/Ff1-TXyT7XQRh8sCPXSOg42vs_Svr6AIQCLcBGAs/s320/imambges.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are no inherently\ngood or bad events. Only our judgements of those events make them good or bad,\nand we are free to choose. Being proactive means you have taken careful,\nthoughtful steps to choose the appropriate path; you\u2019re not just reacting\nimpulsively to your environment<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Don\u2019t allow yourself to\nget swept up in a feeling of powerlessness. When challenges approach, take\ncontrol and confront them head on before they grow into overwhelming problems.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>THINK AS A TEAM MEMBER,\nNOT AN EMPLOYEE. &nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">THERE MUST BE THIS FEELING \" WE ARE ALL IN IT TOGETHER\"&nbsp;</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-rzvi1IdcXzg/WUJZIi5-5XI/AAAAAAABUXQ/-MTI_6zKQVgSY1So1fgezPmfpcLgu8bVwCLcBGAs/s1600/imb7ages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"169\" data-original-width=\"298\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-rzvi1IdcXzg/WUJZIi5-5XI/AAAAAAABUXQ/-MTI_6zKQVgSY1So1fgezPmfpcLgu8bVwCLcBGAs/s1600/imb7ages.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>WE WILL NOT ALLOW NLP\nCONMEN TO EQUATE A CONSCIOUS HUMAN BRAIN WTH THAT OF A DOG ( <span style=\"color: red;\">NON-CONSCIOUS\nBRAIN WHICH CANT PASS COLOUR/ MIRROR TEST </span>) &nbsp;UNDERGOING PAVLOVs EXPERIMENT. &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-RChlrnfsUaY/WUKN5Mlho0I/AAAAAAABUXo/BXV4_1VVT6EP5Z9yADO5zuyQ244L_yYoQCLcBGAs/s1600/Jmaxresdefault.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"900\" data-original-width=\"1600\" height=\"360\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-RChlrnfsUaY/WUKN5Mlho0I/AAAAAAABUXo/BXV4_1VVT6EP5Z9yADO5zuyQ244L_yYoQCLcBGAs/s640/Jmaxresdefault.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>NLPs FOUNDATION IS ROOTED IN IGNORANCE AND\nDECEIT<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/YFd_uCI-XOY/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/YFd_uCI-XOY?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">KUTTE KO CHOOIYA BANAAYA&nbsp;</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">AB HUM TERE KOH CHOOTIYA BANAYENGA !</b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-BqZyl_67mRA/WUKOSfI1dJI/AAAAAAABUXs/w4UGumQRvswhxx74qCiOrGByTsuhdqlvwCLcBGAs/s1600/classicaRRRl-conditioning.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"1073\" data-original-width=\"1600\" height=\"428\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-BqZyl_67mRA/WUKOSfI1dJI/AAAAAAABUXs/w4UGumQRvswhxx74qCiOrGByTsuhdqlvwCLcBGAs/s640/classicaRRRl-conditioning.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">NLP teaches you STEP BY STEP to con a person\n..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">QUOTE: When you meet someone and are building\na relationship \u2013 socially or in business \u2013 knowing how to calibrate them is\nuseful.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;NLP\ndefines calibration as the process of discovering how to read other people\u2019s\nresponses. Good communicators learn how to heighten their skills of observation.\nInstead of guessing how somebody else is feeling, they notice and recognise the\nsubtle cues and facial expressions of the people they mix with.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">If you\u2019re negotiating a deal in business,\ntake the time to get to know the people with whom you\u2019re negotiating. Friendly,\nsocial questions asked at the coffee machine or in the lift can help you\ncalibrate people\u2019s body language and develop your awareness of their responses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Try\nthis quick game with a friend to calibrate their states. As you do so, notice the\nchanges in their physiology \u2013 what happens to their facial movements and colour\nchanges, as well as their body language:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">1. First notice their starting position \u2013 to\ncheck what your friend looks like in neutral.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;To get\nthe person into a neutral state, ask a mundane silly question like: \u2018What\ncolour are your socks today?\u2019 or \u2018How many pens do you keep in your desk\ndrawer?\u2019<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">2. Ask them to think for a minute about\nsomeone they really like, whose company they enjoy \u2013 paying attention to any\npictures, sounds, or feelings that arise.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Give\nthe person time to really get into the experience.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">3. Get your friend to stand up and shake that\nfeeling out.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;NLP\ncalls this breaking state.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">4. Ask them to think for a minute about\nsomeone they really dislike, whose company they don\u2019t enjoy \u2013 paying attention\nto any pictures, sounds, or feelings that arise.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">5. Observe your friend and compare the\ndifferences in their reaction to a positive and a negative experience.&nbsp; UNQUOTE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>WHAT THE FUCK IS ALL THIS ?<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>MIND YOU--- ALMOST ALL WESTERN NLP CONMEN\nHAVE RUINED THEIR OWN FAMILY AND SOCIAL LIVES .. &nbsp;JUST LIKE AMWAY SALESMEN</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">Wanna read some NLP\nSHIT ?</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE : To prevent BURN\nOUT -- hre\u2019s an exercise to work through an issue with the help of music:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. Think of an issue or\na decision that\u2019s bothering you \u2013 rate it on a worry scale of 1 to 10 and note\nthe score on a piece of paper.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. Select three pieces\nof music of very different styles, from mellow to lively.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;For example, try some baroque, jazz\ninstrumentals, heavy rock, or soft vocals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brainwaves, from alpha\nto delta You have four types of brainwave, measured in cycles per second:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. Alpha brainwaves \u2013\nclear, calm, and relaxed \u2013<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">8\u201312 cycles per second<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. Beta brainwaves \u2013\nalert and problem solving \u2013<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">13\u201330 cycles per second<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. Theta brainwaves \u2013\ncreative and imaginative \u2013<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4\u20139 cycles per second<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4. Delta brainwaves \u2013\ndeep sleep \u2013 less than 6 cycles per second<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. Play the first piece\nof music while thinking about your issue, and then rate your thoughts on a\nscale of 1 to 10. Make a note of how you now see the issue and feel about it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4. Play the second\npiece of music while thinking about your issue, and then rate your thoughts on\na scale of 1 to 10. Make a note of how you now see the issue and feel about it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5. Play the third piece\nof music while thinking about your issue, and then rate your thoughts on a\nscale of 1 to 10. Make a note of how you now see the issue and feel about it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Has your thinking\nshifted? Which music was most powerful for you to become more resourceful?\nUNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">THERE MUST BE &nbsp;A LIMIT TO\nMAKING CHOOTS OUT OF PEOPLE\u2014&nbsp; ALL THE\nWHILE FLEECING THEM OF THEIR MONEY !</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Though out the NLP\nconmen have dipped into Vedanta and tried a rehash of the most stupid\nproportions !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;
