margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"400\" data-original-width=\"400\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-NotwPllTJDY/WUOSY3MqW0I/AAAAAAABUYU/-wnSRzeWyqAj_H-JeJ9xrT25508Hf0lsQCLcBGAs/s400/aXALnLP_SW700b.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WANNA KNOW HOW NLP CUNT\nGURUS GET RID OF YOUR BACK ACHE ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HOLD YOUR BREATH<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE: Getting rid of\nthat backache<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This process can be\nused for other symptoms such as headaches brought on by too much stress, or\nmuscles that are stiff from maintaining the same position for too long or from\noveruse.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;This process is great for alleviating\ndiscomfort quickly, without needing to wait for a doctor\u2019s appointment or\nresorting to medication, but if your symptoms persist or for peace of mind, do\nconsult your GP.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. Calibrate your\nbackache on a scale of 1 to 5.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. Make a picture of\nthe backache.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. From the form in the\nlater section \u2018Submodalities Worksheet\u2019, note the submodalities of the\nbackache.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4. Change each\nattribute of the backache, one at a time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Part III: Opening the\nToolkit<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;If the pain has a colour, what happens when\nyou give it a different colour, such as healing blue? What happens if you see\nthat band of steel break up into strips of ribbon, fluttering in the wind? If\nthe pain is a dull ache, can you change the feeling to a tingle? If it feels\nhot, can you change that feeling into one of a cool breeze blowing over the\narea?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These changes can\nreduce your backache, if it hasn\u2019t already gone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5. Now imagine that\nyou\u2019re sitting in front of a cinema screen: remove the backache from your body\nand project a picture of the backache on to the screen.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6. Make the picture on\nthe screen smaller and smaller until it becomes the size of a balloon.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">7. Now watch the\nballoon float up into the sky, and as you see it floating away your backache is\ngetting less and less.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">8. As the balloon\nreaches the clouds, calibrate your backache to just a 1.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">9. As the balloon\ndisappears from sight, the backache fades to just the faintest memory.&nbsp; \u201cUNQUOTE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">BACKACHE IS GONE\u2014 GONNNAY--- GONE\n!<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">FUCKIN\u2019&nbsp; NLP &nbsp;CUNTS !</span></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/snow-shovelling-and-backache-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/snow-shovelling-and-backache-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-5o-2uVN6P54/WUOOYvAItNI/AAAAAAABUYE/DmU-s9OBe-A7HcH-JLWl1BfW6fkb3tNbgCLcBGAs/s1600/33Ddownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"194\" data-original-width=\"259\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-5o-2uVN6P54/WUOOYvAItNI/AAAAAAABUYE/DmU-s9OBe-A7HcH-JLWl1BfW6fkb3tNbgCLcBGAs/s400/33Ddownload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b>WANNA KNOW ABOUT NLP\nSWISH ?</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE: Using the swish<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The swish is a powerful\ntechnique \u2013 based like a lot of NLP on behavioural psychology \u2013 for making\nlasting changes in habits and behaviours. The swish pattern is designed to\nchange a problematic behaviour that\u2019s driven by a trigger.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The idea behind the\nswish is to attach a self image to the trigger so that every time the trigger\nis activated, you see a new way of behaving and you change your behaviour\neffortlessly.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Say that you bite your nails.\nThe swish enables you to use a picture of the trigger \u2013 such as seeing you run\na finger along a nail and finding a jagged edge or a response to getting\nnervous that creates the unwanted behaviour (biting your nails) \u2013 to create a\nnew, desired pattern of behaviour or new image (your hands looking immaculate).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;You can use the swish pattern to change that\nfeeling of exhaustion after a day\u2019s work into one of being relaxed and ready to\nenjoy your evening.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. Identify the\nunwanted behaviour.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;You may want to stop biting your nails, stop\nsmoking, or stop yourselfgetting angry at small transgressions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. Check with yourself\nthat going ahead with the change is okay.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Simply ask yourself: \u2018Is it okay for me to\nchange in this context?\u2019<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3. Identify the trigger\nthat initiates the unwanted behaviour and make an associated picture (check out\nthe \u2018Associating or dissociating\u2019 section earlier in this chapter). This image\nis the cue picture.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;You may see yourself running your finger along\na nail or in a situation that makes you nervous or angry.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4. Play with the image\nto discover a critical submodality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;As you become more experienced, you\u2019ll be able\nto change one or two critical submodalities, but for now start off with one.\nYou change the submodalities of the image to make the cue picture more\ncompelling.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;5. Break state.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Break state means to\nchange the state or frame of mind that you\u2019re in. You can stand up and give\nyour body a good shake or move around the room when going from one phase of an\nexercise to another, allowing a natural break from the pictures and emotions of\nthe first stage of the exercise.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6. Think of the desired\nimage. Create a dissociated image of you doing a preferred behaviour or looking\na certain way.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;7. Break state.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">8. Recall the cue\npicture. Make sure that you\u2019re associated into it and place a frame around it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">9. Create an image of\nthe desired outcome.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">10. Squash the desired\nimage into a very small, dark dot and place it in the bottom left corner of the\ncue picture. (<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b> HOW ABOUT MY ASSHOLE ?</b></span>) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;11. With a swishhhh sound, propel the small,\ndark dot into the big picture so that it explodes, covering the cue picture. (\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b>CAN WE MAKE BRRRRR SOUND \u2013 BOLOH TOH-- PRRRRR ?</b></span>)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;12. Break state.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">13. Repeat the process\nseveral times speedily.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;If you display more kinaesthetic tendencies\nthan visual or auditory, you may find the swish more effective when you keep\nyour hands far apart at the start of this exercise. Then, as you swishhhh,\nbring your hands together quickly. UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">HEY CUNT NLP GURU --- &nbsp; ITNA SARAL ?</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>BRAAAAAAYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYY\n!</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-oOwTVCvrkZw/WUOOJ8zzJrI/AAAAAAABUYA/TXO36bTZIYsMGBkPVO9d5aa_K6t1WSSwwCLcBGAs/s1600/75031Q1cd7bd4de66f573e84313cf20fb0f51313675316f546bf22f1d38d40172.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"440\" data-original-width=\"625\" height=\"450\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-oOwTVCvrkZw/WUOOJ8zzJrI/AAAAAAABUYA/TXO36bTZIYsMGBkPVO9d5aa_K6t1WSSwwCLcBGAs/s640/75031Q1cd7bd4de66f573e84313cf20fb0f51313675316f546bf22f1d38d40172.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">CHECK OUT HOW NLP CUNT\nGURUS SORT OUT FIGHTS BETWEEN HUSBAND AND WIFE </b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE:&nbsp; &nbsp;Imagine that you\u2019re in a relationship that\nisn\u2019t working.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You can use the concept\nof logical levels to help you find the best way forward.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here\u2019s how the process\nworks:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. Recognise that\nthings are out of alignment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;You know this situation is the case when\nyou\u2019re uncomfortable withyour partner and you know that you want things to be\ndifferent.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. Discover what can be\ndifferent.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Ask yourself certain questions that can help\nyou pinpoint exactly what you want to be different. If you both simply moved to\na new flat or different city would things improve? For example, does one set of\nin-laws make too many demands on your time and stop you from developing your\nrelationship as a couple? Or do you have a fundamental difference in your\nvalues? Each logical level has certain types of questions. (Headto the later\nsection \u2018Finding the Right Lever for Change\u2019 to help you work through the\nindividual logical levels.)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;3. When you\u2019ve identified the logical level,\nbring that level back in alignment with the others.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;At the lower levels, say at environment or\nbehaviour, you may both be able to adjust some simple habits in order to have a\nharmonious relationship. You may ask your partner to be more tidy at home, for example,\nwhile you share the administration of bill paying. Building your skills in an\narea such as talking freely about your feelings or learning DIY may take more\ntime and effort. Also, working with an individual coach can be valuable, to\nhelp you examine your beliefs and values or develop a stronger identity for\nyourself.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Fran was shocked when her husband of ten years\nannounced that he was leaving home and moving in with one of her good friends.\nShe felt that if they were to move house (change the environment level) and\nspend more time together (the behaviour level) all would be well. Through some\nrelationship work, she came to realise that her husband had always had\ncompletely different values (the beliefs and values level) from her. He was\nfrom a large, boisterous family environment, and Fran focused all her attention\non her work. She never wanted to be a mother or homemaker (the identity level)\nand felt her sense of purpose was achieved through her work in corporate\nlitigation.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">In the end, they decided to divorce and amicably go their separate\nways because they each wanted a fundamentally different relationship.</span> UNQUOTE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>TEE &nbsp; &nbsp;HEEEEEEEEE !</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-GFENG2yoZ1g/WUTCIHQzuhI/AAAAAAABUY4/HikM38h1bsQFN1lGU-oDMjq8Vf8JiBRGgCLcBGAs/s1600/NLPTOiOLS.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"586\" data-original-width=\"900\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-GFENG2yoZ1g/WUTCIHQzuhI/AAAAAAABUY4/HikM38h1bsQFN1lGU-oDMjq8Vf8JiBRGgCLcBGAs/s1600/NLPTOiOLS.gif\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-bkshdUrv6QU/WUOSDbhXtwI/AAAAAAABUYQ/cO3oaHjXXKwM-V5RPW8lxc70E0I96vBrgCLcBGAs/s1600/downl33oad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An \"eye accessing\ncue chart\" as it appears as an example in Bandler &amp; Grinder's Frogs\ninto Princes (1979). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The six directions\nrepresent \"visual construct\", \"visual recall\",\n\"auditory construct\", \"auditory recall\", \"kinesthetic\"\nand \"auditory internal dialogue\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is bullshit !<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-_6wdHRZdFso/WUTBuD65QcI/AAAAAAABUY0/3wxbMqOwuOA4NX-h3hBimULYknQzWHoVwCLcBGAs/s1600/eye_acchhess2.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"600\" data-original-width=\"960\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-_6wdHRZdFso/WUTBuD65QcI/AAAAAAABUY0/3wxbMqOwuOA4NX-h3hBimULYknQzWHoVwCLcBGAs/s640/eye_acchhess2.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are eye cues,\nhowever .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once my Punjabi Chief\nOfficer \u2013a great bullshit master\u2014told my wife that a famous Bollywood heroine\nsat next to him in his final year at school.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When my wife told me\nthis\u2014I said\u2014 \u201cI will ask him a question , tonight when I call him for a beer\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So so so\u2014while having\nbeer I asked him \u201c My wife said that this woman actress was your class mate.\nWhich side of you did she sit on the same bench ?\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I watched his eyes<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Later I told my wife\u2014\u201c\nHe speaks the truth \u201c<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\nThe eye cue has to be double checked with a facial muscle movement--one of the 42.<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-5e_XcfGeFYw/WUS_L1y1K8I/AAAAAAABUYo/IxdN93w-T5A-9m_-CoSf5wpQcEAnd7cxQCLcBGAs/s1600/bedffeedd5aad3e9e315b5f3287d45728.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"661\" data-original-width=\"726\" height=\"582\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-5e_XcfGeFYw/WUS_L1y1K8I/AAAAAAABUYo/IxdN93w-T5A-9m_-CoSf5wpQcEAnd7cxQCLcBGAs/s640/bedffeedd5aad3e9e315b5f3287d45728.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/04/body-language-howlers-capt-ajit.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/04/body-language-howlers-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/05/body-language-secrets-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/05/body-language-secrets-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/m4onZ7NcmTY/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/m4onZ7NcmTY?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Capt Ajit Vadakayil says -- NLP gurus are\nconmen who fleece na\u00efve people off their money. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;
